data.source_sentence: 맹검법을 사용한 연구들에서 스타틴은 위약과 비슷하게 근육통을 일으켰으며, 맹검법을 사용하지 않는 경우에만 근육통이 증가하는 양상을 보인다.

data.mt_sentence: In inpatient medicine and value-based health care, the term that connotes safety and efficiency together is “value”.

data.source_sentence: 가치라고 하면 철학적이거나 추상적인 개념으로 생각되지만, 의료에서는 다음의 공식으로 가치를 정의하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Value is thought of as a philosophical or abstract concept, but in medicine, value is defined by the following formula.
data.target_sentence: Values are thought of as philosophical or abstract concepts, but in medicine, values are defined by the formula:

data.source_sentence: 우리나라에서도 건강보험심사평가원에 서 폐렴, 뇌졸중, 심근경색 등의 주요 질병의 지표 분석 결과를 공개하는 의료기관평가가 이루어지고 있는데, VBP와 같은 맥락의 활동이라고 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In Korea, too, the Health Insurance Review and Assessment Service is conducting evaluations of medical institutions that disclose the results of analysis of major diseases such as pneumonia, stroke, and myocardial infarction.
data.target_sentence: In Korea, the Health Insurance Review and Assessment Service is conducting a medical institution evaluation that discloses the results of index analysis of major diseases such as pneumonia, stroke, and myocardial infarction, and it can be seen as an activity in the same context as VBP.

data.source_sentence: 진료의 안전과 효율을 제고하기 위한 또다른 활동은 “현명한 선택(Choosing Wisely) 캠페인”이다.
data.mt_sentence: Another activity to improve the safety and efficiency of care is the “Choosing Wisely Campaign”.
data.target_sentence: Another activity to increase the safety and efficiency of diagnosis is the 'Wise Choice Campaign'.

data.source_sentence: 입원 의학 영역에서도 미국입원의 학회(Society of Hospital Medicine)와 입원 의학저널(Journal ofHospital Medicine)이 입원 환자에서 관습적으로 시행되는 검사와 치료 중 불필요하다고 판단되는 것을 “things we do forno reason (TWDFNR)” 이라는 카테고리로 분류하여 정기적으로 선정, 공개하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the field of inpatient medicine, the Society of Hospital Medicine and the Journal of Hospital Medicine regularly select and disclose what is considered unnecessary among tests and treatments routinely performed in in hospitalized patients under the category "things we do for no reason (TWDFNR)."
data.target_sentence: In the field of inpatient medicine, the Society of Hospital Medicine and the Journal of Hospital Medicine customarily conduct examinations and treatment of inpatients. Among them, tests and treatments that are deemed unnecessary are classified under the category of “things we do forno reason (TWDFNR)” and are regularly selected and disclosed.

data.source_sentence: 공동 진료(co-management)입원 전담 전문의의 안전 및 효율 제고 효과가 입증된 또다른 영역은 외과계 공동 진료(surgical co-management)이다.
data.mt_sentence: Co-management Another area where hospitalization specialists have been shown to be effective in improving the safety and efficiency of co-management is surgical co-management.
data.target_sentence: Another area where co-management hospitalists have proven effective in improving the safety and effectiveness of co-management is surgical co-management.

data.source_sentence: 최근 메타 분석에서 입원 전담 전문의를 포함하는 다학제 공동 진료가 재원 기간 단축뿐 아니라 사망률 감소 효과도 있다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In a recent meta-analysis, it was reported that multidisciplinary joint care including hospitalization specialists not only shortened hospital stay but also reduced mortality.
data.target_sentence: In a recent meta-analysis, there is a report that multidisciplinary joint treatment including hospitalization specialists not only shortens the hospitalization period but also reduces the mortality rate.

data.source_sentence: 결과에 힘입어, 공동 진료의 대상이 외과계뿐 아니라 신경과나 다른 내과 전문 분과와 같은 비(비)입원 전담 전문의 환자들까지로 더 넓어졌다.
data.mt_sentence: Thanks to the results, the target of joint care has been expanded not only to the surgical field, but also to non-(non-) hospitalized patients such as neurologists and other internal medical specialties.
data.target_sentence: As a result, the subject of joint treatment expanded not only to the surgical field, but also to patients who were not hospitalized, such as internal medicine specialists such as neurologists.

data.source_sentence: 공동 진료를 효과적이고 안전하게 운영하기 위해서는 대상 환자의 선택, 입원 전담 전문의와 외과의의 역할 분담 그리고 의사소통 방법에 대해 사전에 책임을 구분하고 합의하는 과정이 필수적이다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to effectively and safely operate joint care, it is essential to identify and agree on responsibilities in advance on the selection of target patients, the division of roles between hospitalization specialists and surgeons, and communication methods.
data.target_sentence: In order to effectively and safely operate joint treatment, it is essential to identify and agree on responsibilities in advance for the selection of target patients, the division of roles between hospitalization specialists and surgeons, and communication methods.

data.source_sentence: 고령화가 빠르게 진행하고 있는 우리나라도 복합 만성 질환 및 고위험 환자군에 대한 수술과 입원이 지속적으로 증가할 것으로 전망되기에, 머지 않아 공동 진료가 활성화될 것으로 예상된다.
data.mt_sentence: In Korea, where an aging population is rapidly progressing, surgery and hospitalization for complex chronic diseases and high-risk patients are expected to continue to increase, so joint treatment is expected to be activated in the near future.
data.target_sentence: In Korea, where an aging population is rapidly progressing, the number of surgeries and hospitalizations for patients with complex chronic diseases and high-risk groups is expected to increase continuously, and joint treatment is expected to be activated in the near future.

data.source_sentence: 전문가주의(professionalism)입원 진료의 가치를 높이기 위한 입원 전담 전문의들의 병원 혁신이 성공하기 위해서는 고도의 전문가주의가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Professionalism In order for hospitalization specialists to succeed in innovating hospitals to increase the value of inpatient care, a high degree of professionalism is required.
data.target_sentence: Expertise Hospitalists need a high level of expertise to successfully transform hospitals and increase the value of inpatient care.

data.source_sentence: 애초에 의학 자체가 “do no harm”이라는 상징적인 문구를 포함해, 환자 중심, 근거 기반 의학(evidence-based medi-cine), 질 개선 노력, 이해 충돌(conflict of interest) 회피 등 높은 수준의 전문가 주의를 요구하는 학문이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the first place, medicine itself contains the symbolic phrase “do no harm”, with a high level of expert attention such as patient-centeredness, evidence-based medi-cine, quality improvement efforts, and avoidance of conflicts of interest. It is a discipline that requires
data.target_sentence: First of all, medicine itself contains a symbolic phrase 'do no harm' that requires high professional attention, such as patient-centredism, evidence-based medicine, quality improvement efforts, and prevention of conflicts of interest.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 진료 과정에서 위협적이거나(intimidating) 분열을 유발하는(disruptive) 행동에 대해서는 단호한 태도가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, a firm attitude toward intimidating or disruptive behavior is required in the treatment process.
data.target_sentence: A strong attitude towards threatening or destructive behavior is required, especially during the treatment process.

data.source_sentence: 동료와 환자를 존중하는 문화를 유지하기 위해서는 위협적인 혹은 분열 유발 행동을 용인하지 않는 문화와 함께(zerotolerance), 해당 사례 발생 시 이를 처리하는 공식적인 절차를 사전에 마련해 두는 것이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to maintain a culture of respect for colleagues and patients, it is necessary to have a culture of zero tolerance for intimidating or disruptive behavior and to have formal procedures in place to deal with such incidents when they occur.
data.target_sentence: Maintaining a culture of respect for colleagues and patients, along with a culture that does not tolerate threatening or disruptive behavior (zerotolerance), requires that formal procedures be in place in advance to deal with such cases as they arise.

data.source_sentence: 좋은 리더는 표 3과 같은 측면에서 관리자(manager)와는 구별되는 특성을 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: A good leader has characteristics that distinguish it from a manager in the aspect shown in Table 3.
data.target_sentence: A good leader has characteristics that distinguish him from a manager in <Table 3>.

data.source_sentence: 이는 “좋은 리더는 관리자와 달라야 한다”는 것이 아니며, 오히려 동기 부여를 통해 실질적인 성과를 내고 목표를 달성하기 위해서는 리더와 관리자의 역할을 모두 소화할 수 있어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: This does not mean that “a good leader must be different from a manager”, rather, in order to achieve practical results through motivation and achieve goals, it is necessary to be able to fulfill both the roles of a leader and a manager.
data.target_sentence: This does not mean that 'a good leader must be different from a manager', but must be able to perform the roles of a leader and a manager at the same time in order to achieve practical results through motivation and achieve goals.

data.source_sentence: 미국에서는 안전성과 효율성을 내포하는 “의료의 가치(value) 제고”라는 사회적 요구를, 입원 전담 전문의들이 성공적으로 수행해 입원 진료의 새로운 표준이 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the United States, the social demand for “improving the value of medical care” that includes safety and efficiency has become a new standard for inpatient care as hospitalized specialists have successfully implemented it.
data.target_sentence: In the United States, societal demands for “improving the value of healthcare,” including safety and efficiency, have been successfully implemented by inpatients, setting new standards for inpatient care.

data.source_sentence: 그와 함께 입원 의학도, 의료에서의 가치 개념을 이해하고 이를 제고하기 위한 전략을 포함하는 학문으로 성장해 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: At the same time, inpatient medicine has grown into a discipline that includes strategies to understand and enhance the concept of value in medicine.
data.target_sentence: At the same time, inpatient medicine has grown into a discipline that includes strategies to understand and enhance the concept of value in medicine.

data.source_sentence: 입원 의학의 성공 사례는 입원 전담 전문의가 부족한 인력의 대체제가 아니라, 입원 진료를 책임지고 더 나아가 시스템을 혁신할 수 있는 전문가로서 성장해야 한다는 것을 보여주었다.
data.mt_sentence: The success stories of inpatient medicine have shown that inpatient specialists must grow as professionals who can innovate and take charge of inpatient care, not as a replacement for the shortage of personnel.
data.target_sentence: The success stories of inpatient medicine show that inpatient specialists need to grow into professionals who can innovate and take care of inpatient care rather than replacing the shortage of human resources.

data.source_sentence: 머지 않아 국내에서도 입원 전담 전문의들이 행정, 연구, 교육등 다양한 방면에서 활약하며 병원을 혁신하고 입원 의학의 가치를 입증할 것을 기대한다.
data.mt_sentence: It is expected that in the near future, hospitalization specialists will be active in various fields such as administration, research, and education in Korea, innovating hospitals and proving the value of inpatient medicine.
data.target_sentence: In the near future, hospitalization specialists in various fields such as administration, research, and education in Korea are expected to innovate hospitals and prove the value of inpatient care.

data.source_sentence: 폐암은 현재까지 세계적으로 암으로 인한 사망의 가장 큰 원인이 되는 암종이다.
data.mt_sentence: Lung cancer is currently the leading cause of cancer deaths worldwide.
data.target_sentence: Lung cancer is currently the leading cause of cancer death worldwide.

data.source_sentence: 폐암도 조기에 발견하여 치료하면 완치가 가능하고, 생존율도 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: If lung cancer is detected and treated early, it can be cured and the survival rate is increased.
data.target_sentence: If lung cancer is detected and treated early, it can be cured and the survival rate is increased.

data.source_sentence: 특히 1A병기 조기 폐암의 경우 5년 생존율이 75%가 넘기 때문에, 조기 발견 및 적절한 치료가 폐암으로 인한 사망률을 줄일 수 있는 가장 효과적인 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, in the case of stage 1A early lung cancer, the 5-year survival rate exceeds 75%, so early detection and appropriate treatment are the most effective ways to reduce the death rate from lung cancer.
data.target_sentence: In particular, in the case of stage 1A early lung cancer, the 5-year survival rate exceeds 75%, so early detection and appropriate treatment are the most effective ways to reduce lung cancer mortality.

data.source_sentence: 세계적으로 무증상기의 조기 폐암을 빨리 발견하여 진단하기 위한 효과적인 검진 방법을 개발하고 증명하기 위한 시도들이 오랜 시간 이어져 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Attempts have been made worldwide to develop and prove effective screening methods for early detection and diagnosis of asymptomatic lung cancer for a long time.
data.target_sentence: Attempts to develop and prove effective screening methods for early detection and diagnosis of asymptomatic lung cancer have been attempted worldwide for a long time.

data.source_sentence: 이 연구는 55-74세의 30갑년 이상의 흡연자에서 LDCT를 이용한 폐암 검진이 유의하게 폐암으로 인한 사망률을 줄일 수 있음을 밝히면서 크게 주목받았다.
data.mt_sentence: This study drew attention as it revealed that lung cancer screening using LDCT could significantly reduce lung cancer mortality in smokers aged 55-74 years with 30 pack-years or more.
data.target_sentence: This study drew attention by revealing that lung cancer screening using LDCT could significantly reduce lung cancer mortality among smokers aged 55 to 74 years over 30 pack years.

data.source_sentence: 근거에 기반한 폐암 검진의 효과와 동향, 세계적으로 폐암을 조기에 발견하기 위한 시도들은 1970년대부터 있었고, 초기에는 흉부 X선이나 객담 세포 검사를 이용한 검진이 시도되었으나 연구를 통해 효과가 없음이 밝혀졌다.
data.mt_sentence: Evidence-based lung cancer screening effects and trends, and attempts to detect lung cancer early worldwide have been made since the 1970s, and early tests using chest X-rays or sputum cell tests have been attempted, but studies have shown that they are not effective.
data.target_sentence: Effects and trends of evidence-based lung cancer screening, worldwide attempts to detect lung cancer early have been around since the 1970s. In the early stages, examination using chest X-ray or sputum cytology was attempted, but it was found to be ineffective through research.

data.source_sentence: 이에 대규모 RCT를 통하여 LDCT를 이용한 폐암 검진이 폐암으로 인한 사망률을 감소시킬 수 있는지 평가하고자 하는 노력들이 2000년대 들어서 시작되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Efforts to evaluate whether lung cancer screening using LDCT can reduce lung cancer mortality through large-scale RCT began in the 2000s.
data.target_sentence: Efforts to evaluate whether lung cancer screening using LDCT can reduce lung cancer mortality through large-scale RCT began in the 2000s.

data.source_sentence: 현재까지 우리나라를 비롯한 다수의 국가와 단체들에서 사용하는 폐암 검진 권고안은 나이와 흡연력에 따라 수검 대상자를 결정하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Until now, lung cancer screening recommendations used by many countries and organizations, including Korea, have determined the subjects of the examination according to age and smoking history.
data.target_sentence: Lung cancer screening recommendations, which have been used in many countries and institutions, including Korea, have been determined according to age and smoking history.

data.source_sentence: 기준은 NLST와 같은 대규모 임상 연구의 기준에서 비롯된 것으로, 보다 현실적이고 적용이 쉬운 장점도 있으나, 이분법적으로 대상자를 결정하게 되고, 흡연과 나이 외의 다른 폐암의 위험 인자들이 고려되지 않는 단점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The criteria originated from the standards of large-scale clinical studies such as NLST, and there are advantages that are more realistic and easy to apply, but they are dichotomously determined, and risk factors for lung cancer other than smoking and age are not considered.
data.target_sentence: The criteria are derived from those of large-scale clinical studies such as the NLST, and have the advantage of being more realistic and easier to apply. However, there is a disadvantage in that subjects are determined dichotomously and risk factors for lung cancer other than smoking and age are not considered.

data.source_sentence: 최근에는 이러한 단순한 선택 기준만으로 인구 집단 수준에서 검진 대상자를 검진의 효과를 극대화하기가 어렵다는 의견들이 설득력을 얻고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, opinions that it is difficult to maximize the effect of screening for screening subjects at the population group level only with these simple selection criteria are gaining persuasive power.
data.target_sentence: Recently, it is gaining persuasive opinion that it is difficult to maximize the effect of target selection at the level of the population group only with these simple selection criteria.

data.source_sentence: 현재의 USPSTF 권고에서도 검진으로 인한 조기 폐암의 진단율을 높이는 이득은 최대화하고, 검진으로 인한 위해는 최소화하기 위해서 검진 대상으로 삼을 폐암 고위험군을 정확하게 분류해 내는 것이 중요함을 강조한다.
data.mt_sentence: The current USPSTF recommendation also emphasizes the importance of accurately classifying the high-risk group for lung cancer to be screened in order to maximize the benefit of increasing the screening rate for early lung cancer and minimize the risks from screening.
data.target_sentence: In addition, the current USPSTF recommendation emphasizes the importance of accurately classifying the high-risk group for lung cancer screening to maximize the effect of increasing the early lung cancer screening rate and minimize the screening risk.

data.source_sentence: LLP 모델과 PLCOM2012 모델은 실제로 유일하게 전향적인 LDCT 폐암 검진 연구에 적용이 시도된 두 모델이기도 하다.
data.mt_sentence: The LLP model and the PLCOM2012 model are actually the only two models that have been attempted to be applied to the prospective LDCT lung cancer screening study.
data.target_sentence: The LLP model and the PLCOM2012 model are actually two models that we attempted to apply to prospective LDCT lung cancer screening studies.

data.source_sentence: LLP 모델은 2008년도에 영국 리버풀 지역에 기반한 연구로 개발되었으며, 흡연 기간, 폐렴 진단력, 석면 노출력, 개인의 암 진단력, 폐암 가족력을 인자로 하여 5년 폐암 발생 위험률을 계산한다.
data.mt_sentence: The LLP model was developed as a study based in Liverpool, England in 2008, and the 5-year lung cancer risk is calculated using the smoking period, pneumonia diagnosis, asbestos exposure, individual cancer diagnosis, and family history of lung cancer as factors.
data.target_sentence: The LLP model was developed as a study based in Liverpool, UK in 2008 and calculates a 5-year lung cancer risk using factors such as duration of smoking, diagnosis of pneumonia, asbestos exposure, individual cancer diagnosis, and family history of lung cancer.

data.source_sentence: 이는 NLST 연구의 대상자 선정 기준보다 PLCOM2012와 같은 위험 예측 모델을 이용하여 검진 대상을 선정하는 것이 폐암 진단에 더 효율적임을 제시한 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: This suggests that selecting a screening target using a risk prediction model such as PLCOM2012 is more effective in diagnosing lung cancer than the target selection criteria of the NLST study.
data.target_sentence: This suggests that screening subjects using risk prediction models such as PLCOM2012 are more effective in diagnosing lung cancer than target selection criteria in NLST studies.

data.source_sentence: AAA 연구는 추적 관찰 기간 동안 6.5%의 폐암 누적 발생률을 보여 NLST의 4.0%보다 높은 빈도로 폐암이 진단되었음을 보고하였고, 진단된 폐암 중 제한 병기(1기 또는 2기)로 진단된 암의 비율도 77%로 NLST의 57%보다 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: The AAA study reported that lung cancer was diagnosed at a higher frequency than 4.0% of the NLST with a cumulative incidence of 6.5% during the follow-up period, and the proportion of cancer diagnosed as limited-stage (stage I or II) among the diagnosed lung cancers was also 77%, higher than 57% in the NLST.
data.target_sentence: According to the AAA study, lung cancer was diagnosed at a higher frequency than 4.0% of the NLST during follow-up, with a cumulative incidence of 6.5%, and the proportion of cancers diagnosed as restrictive (stage I or II) among all cancers was reported. Diagnosed lung cancer was also 77% higher than 57% for NLST.

data.source_sentence: 이처럼 검증된 폐암 위험 예측 모델을 이용한 폐암 검진 대상자 선정은 폐암 검진의 효과를 극대화하고 단점을 최소화하는 방법으로 기대받으며 많은 후속 연구들이 이뤄지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Lung cancer screening target selection using this proven lung cancer risk prediction model is expected to maximize the effectiveness of lung cancer screening and minimize shortcomings, and many follow-up studies are being conducted.
data.target_sentence: Lung cancer screening target selection using this proven lung cancer risk prediction model is expected to maximize the effectiveness of lung cancer screening and minimize shortcomings, and many follow-up studies are underway.

data.source_sentence: 현재까지의 증명된 주요 모델들은 서양에서 개발된 것으로, 여성과 비흡연자에서 발생하는 폐암, 간유리음영결절이나 부분고형결절의 형태로 발생하는 폐선암의 발생 빈도가 높은 우리나라를 비롯한 아시아 국가에서도 이러한 폐암 예측 모델이 우수한 효과를 보일 수 있을지는 미지수이다.
data.mt_sentence: Major proven models have been developed in the West, and it remains to be seen whether this lung cancer prediction model will be effective in Asian countries, including Korea, where lung cancer occurs in women and non-smokers, and lung adenocarcinoma in the form of liver glass shaded nodules or partial solid nodules.
data.target_sentence: The main models proven so far were developed in the West. It is unknown whether this lung cancer prediction model can show excellent effects in Asian countries, including Korea, where the incidence of lung cancer in women and non-smokers and lung adenocarcinoma in the form of ground glass shaded nodules or partial solid nodules is high.

data.source_sentence: 앞으로 인종, 지역, 국가별 상황에 맞는 다양한 폐암 위험 예측 모델의 개발과 이에 기반한 고위험군 선별과 폐암 검진이 필요한 이유이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is why it is necessary to develop various lung cancer risk prediction models suitable for race, region, and country in the future, and to screen for high-risk groups and screen for lung cancer based on it.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, it is necessary to develop various lung cancer risk prediction models suitable for race, region, and country in the future, and based on this, high-risk group screening and lung cancer screening are needed.

data.source_sentence: 효과적인 폐암 검진을 위한 가장 중요한 전제 조건은 LDCT의 정확한 판독이다.
data.mt_sentence: The most important prerequisite for effective lung cancer screening is accurate reading of LDCT.
data.target_sentence: An accurate reading of LDCT is the most important prerequisite for effective lung cancer screening.

data.source_sentence: 중요한 것은 LDCT 검진에서 발견되는 대부분의 폐결절은 그 크기가 작다는 것이 다.
data.mt_sentence: Importantly, most pulmonary nodules found on LDCT examinations are small in size.
data.target_sentence: Importantly, most lung nodules found on LDCT examinations are small.

data.source_sentence: 여러 전향적 연구들에 따르면 검진에서 발견되는 폐결절의 50% 이상이 직경 5 mm 이하이거나 부피로 측정하였을 때 50 mm3 이하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to several prospective studies, more than 50% of lung nodules found in screening were less than 5 mm in diameter or less than 50 mm3 when measured in volume.
data.target_sentence: Several prospective studies have shown that more than 50% of pulmonary nodules found at screening were less than 5 mm in diameter or less than 50 mm3 in volume.

data.source_sentence: 검진에서 발견되는 폐결절이 실제 폐암일 가능성은 높지 않다.
data.mt_sentence: It is unlikely that the lung nodules found on examination are actually lung cancer.
data.target_sentence: It is unlikely that the lung nodules found on examination are actually lung cancer.

data.source_sentence: NLST에서는 4 mm 이상의 폐결절을 검진 양성으로 설정하였는데, LDCT 폐암 검진을 진행하는 기간 동안 총 수검자의 39.1%에서 폐결절이 발견되었지만, 실제로 발견된 폐결절 중 3.6%만이 최종적으로 폐암으로 진단되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In NLST, lung nodules of 4 mm or more were set to be screening positive, and lung nodules were found in 39.1% of total examinees during the LDCT lung cancer screening, but only 3.6% of the lung nodules actually found were finally diagnosed with lung cancer.
data.target_sentence: In the NLST, lung nodules larger than 4 mm were set as screening positive, and during the LDCT lung cancer screening, pulmonary nodules were found in 39.1% of the total examinees. However, only 3.6% of the lung nodules actually found were finally diagnosed as lung cancer.

data.source_sentence: 폐암 검진 중 발견된 폐결절을 어떻게 추적하고 필요 시침습적 진단을 시도할 것인지에 대해서는 여러 연구와 학회단체에서 권고안을 제시해 왔으며, 이 권고안들은 새로운 연구 결과들이 나오면서 지속적으로 업데이트되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Several studies and academic groups have suggested recommendations on how to track lung nodules found during lung cancer screening and attempt an invasive diagnosis when necessary, and these recommendations are constantly being updated as new research results emerge.
data.target_sentence: Several studies and academia have proposed recommendations on how to track lung nodules found during lung cancer screening and attempt an invasive diagnosis when needed, and these recommendations are constantly being updated as new research results emerge.

data.source_sentence: AAA 연구를 대표격으로, 유럽에서 시행된 몇 개의 연구들에서는 CT 영상에서 3차원적으로 결절의 부피를 측정하는 방법으로 폐결절의 크기를 정의하는 것의 유용성을 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA study as a representative, several studies conducted in Europe suggested the usefulness of defining the size of a pulmonary nodule as a method of measuring the volume of a nodule in three dimensions on a CT image.
data.target_sentence: Several studies conducted in Europe, representing the AAA study, suggest that it is useful to define the size of the lung nodule as a three-dimensional method of measuring the volume of the nodule on a CT image.

data.source_sentence: FFF는 미국영상의학회에서 제작한 표준화된 판독 및 분류 시스템으로서, 폐암 검진 CT의 결과와 관리가 필요한 폐결절의 추적을 위해 최적화된 권고안이다.
data.mt_sentence: FFF is a standardized reading and classification system produced by the American Society of Radiologists, and it is an optimized recommendation for the tracking of lung nodules that require management and the results of lung cancer screening CT.
data.target_sentence: FFF is a standardized reading and classification system created by the American Society of Radiologists, and is an optimized recommendation for pulmonary nodule tracking and lung cancer screening CT results that require management.

data.source_sentence: 검진에서 발견된 폐결절은 결절의 크기, 성상, 발견 시기에 따라 범주화하고, 소견을 크게 0, 1, 2, 3, 4A, 4B, 4X의 범주로 분류하여, 각 범주에 맞는 진료 계획을 권고한다.
data.mt_sentence: Pulmonary nodules found during screening are categorized according to the size, characteristics, and time of discovery, and findings are largely classified into categories 0, 1, 2, 3, 4A, 4B, and 4X, and a treatment plan suitable for each category is recommended. .
data.target_sentence: Pulmonary nodules discovered on examination are categorized according to the size, characteristics, and time of discovery. And, findings are classified into categories of 0, 1, 2, 3, 4A, 4B, and 4X, and a treatment plan suitable for each category is recommended.

data.source_sentence: 2019년부터 시작된 우리나라 국가 폐암 검진의 LDCT 판독 및 결절 관리 지침도 우리나라의 진료 환경에 맞추어, Lung-RADS ver-sion 1.0을 일부 조정하여 반영되도록 채택하여 시작하였고, 지속적인 업데이트가 이루어지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The LDCT reading and nodule management guidelines for national lung cancer screening, which began in 2019, were also adopted to partially adjust and reflect Lung-RADS ver-sion 1.0 according to Korea's medical environment, and continuous updates are being made.
data.target_sentence: The guidelines for LDCT reading and nodule management for national lung cancer screening, which started in 2019, were also adopted to partially adjust and reflect Lung-RADS version 1.0 according to the Korean medical environment, and continuous updates are being made.

data.source_sentence: 더불어 최근에는 인공지능을 이용하여 검진 LDCT의 소견들 판독과 폐결절의 특성 분류, 나아가 악성 위험도를 평가에도 도움을 받을 수 있는 시스템을 개발하는 것이 학계의 많은 관심을 받고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, recently, using artificial intelligence, the development of a system that can be used to read the findings of screening LDCT, classify the characteristics of lung nodules, and even evaluate the risk of malignancy is receiving a lot of attention from academia.
data.target_sentence: Also, recently, the development of a system that can read LDCT screening results using artificial intelligence, classify the characteristics of lung nodules, and even evaluate the risk of malignancy is receiving a lot of attention from academia.

data.source_sentence: 이후 2020년 3월 코로나19 발병을 국제 공중 보건의 비상 사태로 선언하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In March 2020, the COVID-19 outbreak was declared an international public health emergency.
data.target_sentence: In March 2020, the COVID-19 outbreak declared an international public health emergency.

data.source_sentence: 이후 2020년 9월부터 영국, 남아프리카공화국, 브라질, 인도 등에서 여러 돌연변이를 가진 변이 바이러스가 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Since September 2020, mutant viruses with multiple mutations have been identified in the UK, South Africa, Brazil, and India.
data.target_sentence: Since September 2020, mutant viruses with multiple mutations have been identified in the UK, South Africa, Brazil and India.

data.source_sentence: 코로나19 바이러스의 잠복기를 나타내는 무증상 전파(asymptomatic transmission)는 증상이 없는 사람에게서 바이러스가 전파되는 것을 말하며, 바이러스에 노출된 후 증상이 나타나기까지의 시간은 1일-14일 (평균 5-7일)로 보고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Asymptomatic transmission, which indicates the incubation period of the COVID-19 virus, refers to the spread of the virus in people without symptoms, and the time from exposure to symptoms is reported to be 1 to 14 days (average 5-7 days).
data.target_sentence: Asymptomatic transmission, which indicates the incubation period of the COVID-19 virus, refers to the transmission of the virus to people without symptoms, and is reported to take 1 to 14 days (average 5 to 7 days) after exposure to symptoms.

data.source_sentence: 코로나19 바이러스는 증상 발생 1-3일전부터 호흡기 검체에서 검출되며 증상이 나타나는 시기에 바이러스 양이 많으므로 감염 초기에 쉽게 전파된다고 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Corona 19 virus is detected in respiratory specimens from 1-3 days before the onset of symptoms and is known to spread easily in the early stages of infection because the amount of virus is large at the time symptoms appear.
data.target_sentence: Corona 19 virus is detected in respiratory specimens from 1 to 3 days before symptom onset, and it is known that the virus spreads easily at the early stage of infection due to the large amount of virus at the time of symptom onset.

data.source_sentence: 우리나라 방역대책본부의 경우 추정 또는 확진 환자의 증상 발생 2일 전부터 증상 발생 후 14일간 추정 또는 확진 환자와 1미터 거리에서 15분 이상 접촉한 경우 등을 접촉자(contact)로 정의하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of Korea's Quarantine Countermeasures Headquarters, a contact is defined as a contact with an estimated or confirmed patient from 2 days before the onset of symptoms for 14 days after the onset of symptoms for more than 15 minutes from a distance of 1 meter or more.
data.target_sentence: In the case of Korea's Quarantine Countermeasure Headquarters, contact is defined as a person who has been in contact with a presumed or confirmed patient at a distance of 1 meter for 15 minutes or more from 2 days before symptom onset to 14 days after symptom onset.

data.source_sentence: AAA 등의 체계적 문헌 고찰과 메타 분석에 의하면 1m 이상의 물리적 거리 두기로 바이러스 전파율 낮았음을 보고하여 사회적 거리 두기의 기준으로 인용된다.
data.mt_sentence: According to a systematic literature review and meta-analysis of AAA, etc., it was reported that the virus transmission rate was low with a physical distance of 1 m or more, and it is cited as a standard for social distancing.
data.target_sentence: According to systematic literature review and meta-analysis such as AAA, it is reported that the transmission rate of the virus is low at a physical distance of 1m or more, and it is being mentioned as a standard for social distancing.

data.source_sentence: 코로나19의 진단은 유전자 검사에 의하여 이루어지며 상기도나 하기도에서 채취된 검체에서 RT-PCR 방법을 사용하여 SARS-CoV-2의 특정 유전자를 검출하여 진단된다.
data.mt_sentence: The diagnosis of COVID-19 is made by genetic testing, and it is diagnosed by detecting a specific gene of SARS-CoV-2 using RT-PCR in a sample collected from the upper or lower respiratory tract.
data.target_sentence: Diagnosis of COVID-19 is made through genetic testing, and diagnosis is made by detecting a specific gene of SARS-CoV-2 using RT-PCR in a sample collected from the upper or lower respiratory tract.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 환자들(약 80%)은 별다른 특별한 치료 없이 회복되나, 5명 중 1명 정도는 중증으로 진행될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Most patients (about 80%) recover without any special treatment, but about 1 in 5 may progress to severe disease.
data.target_sentence: Most people (about 80%) recover without special treatment, but about 1 in 5 may progress to a serious illness.

data.source_sentence: 고령자나 고혈압, 심폐질환, 당뇨병이나 암과 같은 기저 질환이 있는 사람들은 중증으로 진행될 가능성이 높다.
data.mt_sentence: Older adults and people with underlying medical conditions such as high blood pressure, cardiopulmonary disease, diabetes or cancer are more likely to develop severe disease.
data.target_sentence: Older adults and people with underlying medical conditions such as high blood pressure, cardiopulmonary disease, diabetes, or cancer are more likely to develop severe illness.

data.source_sentence: 2020년 3월 23일 스코틀랜드에서는 일차 치과 의료 기관에서 코로나19 감염이 없는 환자에게도 에어로졸 생성술식을 포함한 통상적인 치과 치료를 중단하도록 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: On March 23, 2020, in Scotland, primary dental institutions were required to discontinue conventional dental treatment, including aerosol-producing procedures, even in patients without COVID-19.
data.target_sentence: On 23 March 2020, in Scotland, primary dental institutions were forced to discontinue conventional dental care, including aerosol-generating procedures, even for patients without COVID-19.

data.source_sentence: 2020년 8월 3일 발표된 세계보건기구(WHO)의 임시 가이드라인에서는 필수 치과치료 (essential oral healthservice)만 시행하고 에어로졸 형성술식은 최소화하도록 권고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The interim guidelines of the World Health Organization (WHO) published on August 3, 2020 recommended that only essential oral health service be performed and that the aerosol formation procedure should be minimized.
data.target_sentence: The World Health Organization (WHO) interim guidelines issued on 3 August 2020 recommended that only essential oral health services be performed and aerosol-forming procedures should be minimized.

data.source_sentence: 우리나라 중앙방역대책본부에서도 2020년 8월 3일 『코로나바이러스감염증-19에 대한 치과 의료기관 감염예방·관리에 대한 지침』을 공지하였으며, 내용은 WHO임시 가이드라인과 거의 일치하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The Korea Central Quarantine Countermeasures Headquarters also announced the 『Guidelines for the Prevention and Management of Infection Prevention and Management at Dental Medical Centers for Coronavirus Infectious Disease-19』 on August 3, 2020, and the contents were almost consistent with the WHO Provisional Guidelines.
data.target_sentence: The Central Quarantine Countermeasures Headquarters also announced the 『Prevention and Management Guidelines for the Prevention and Management of Infection Prevention and Management of Novel Coronavirus Infectious Disease-19 at Dental Clinics』 on August 3, 2020, and the contents were almost consistent with the WHO Provisional Guidelines.

data.source_sentence: 치과 치료는 필수적인 치료만 제한하여 제공하며, 참여 의료 인력도 필수인력으로만 제한하고, 에어로졸 생성시술 후에는 종료 후 소독하고 환기하는 것으로 권고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was recommended that dental treatment be provided by limiting only essential treatment, limiting the participating medical personnel to only essential personnel, and disinfecting and ventilating after the aerosol generating procedure was completed.
data.target_sentence: It was recommended that dental treatment be restricted to essential treatment only, and the participating medical staff should be limited to essential personnel, and disinfection and ventilation should be performed after the aerosol generation procedure is completed.

data.source_sentence: 확진 의심 환자가 아닌 일반 내원 환자에서 에어로졸이 발생하는 진료를 시행하는데 대한 명확한 지침이 없으며 매 환자 진료 후 환자가 접촉한 표면은 소독한다.
data.mt_sentence: There are no clear guidelines for conducting aerosol-producing treatment in general visiting patients other than confirmed/suspicious patients, and the surface contacted by the patient after each patient's treatment is disinfected.
data.target_sentence: There are no clear guidelines for aerosol-generating treatment for general patients except for confirmed patients, and surfaces in contact with patients are disinfected after each patient's treatment.

data.source_sentence: 이후 2021년 7월 13일 미국 질병관리센터에서는 치과 의료시설에서 환자의 코로나19 감염여부에 관계없이 모든 환자에 대해 에어로졸이 생성되는 술식을 피해야 한다는 이전의 문구를 삭제하고 지침을 업데이트하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Subsequently, on July 13, 2021, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention deleted the previous statement that aerosol-generating procedures should be avoided for all patients at dental facilities, regardless of whether the patient was infected with COVID-19, and updated the guidelines.
data.target_sentence: Then, on July 13, 2021, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) deleted its existing statement and updated its guidelines stating that aerosol-generating procedures should be avoided for all patients in dental facilities, regardless of whether the patient is infected with COVID-19.

data.source_sentence: 2021년 7월 16일 영국 NHS 에서는 치과 진료에 있어서 회복하는 단계로의 이행(transition to recovery) 과정에서 치과 표준 치료방법(dental standard operatingprocedure)을 발표하였다.
data.mt_sentence: On July 16, 2021, the British NHS announced a dental standard operating procedure in the transition to recovery process in dental care.
data.target_sentence: On 16 July 2021, the UK NHS published the Dental Standard Operating Procedures in the transition from dental care to the recovery process.

data.source_sentence: 『코로나 바이러스감염증-19 치과 의료 기관 감염예방·관리(2020-08-03)』에서도 치과 진료 도중 에어로졸 생성술식에 개인 보호구 착용의 명확한 권장 범위가 나와 있지 않다.
data.mt_sentence: Even in 『Coronavirus Infectious Disease-19 Infection Prevention and Control at Dental Medical Institutions (2020-08-03)』, there is no clear recommendation range for wearing personal protective equipment during the aerosol generating procedure during dental treatment.
data.target_sentence: Even in 『Dental Medical Institutions Corona 19 Infection Prevention and Management (2020-08-03)』, there is no clear recommendation range for wearing personal protective equipment when aerosol occurs during dental treatment.

data.source_sentence: 구강악안면외과 영역에서 코로나19 감염 예방 및 관리 관련 문헌 및 지침에 대해 서술하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the field of oral and maxillofacial surgery, we would like to describe the literature and guidelines related to the prevention and management of COVID-19 infection.
data.target_sentence: We would like to explain the literature and guidelines on the prevention and management of COVID-19 infection in the field of oral and maxillofacial surgery.

data.source_sentence: 구강악안면외과 의사가 가장 궁금한 것은 “코로나19 대유행 이후의 시대에 구강악안면외과의 수술을 어떻게 진행할 할 수 있는가?”하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The most curious question for oral and maxillofacial surgeons is, “How can oral and maxillofacial surgery be performed in the post-COVID-19 pandemic?”
data.target_sentence: The question most often asked by oral and maxillofacial surgeons is “How can oral and maxillofacial surgery be performed in the post-COVID-19 pandemic era?”

data.source_sentence: 현재까지도 일상적인 치과 치료나 elective surgery(선택적 수술)에 있어서 에어로졸로 인한 코로나19 바이러스 전파의 위험성과 안전성에 대한 충분한 근거 자료나 과학적인 데이터가 부족하므로 팬데믹 이전의 의료 환경으로 돌아갈 가능성은 낮다고 보여진다.
data.mt_sentence: Until now, there is a lack of sufficient evidence or scientific data on the risk and safety of COVID-19 transmission due to aerosol in routine dental treatment or elective surgery, so it is unlikely to return to the pre-pandemic medical environment.
data.target_sentence: A return to the pre-pandemic medical environment is unlikely due to the lack of sufficient evidence or scientific data on the risk and safety of aerosol-induced transmission of COVID-19 in routine dental care or elective surgery so far.

data.source_sentence: 다행스럽게도 2020년 7월 6일 미국 National Pub-lic Radio 보도에 따르면, 코로나 대유행이 한참이던 이 시기까지 세계보건기구(WHO)와 미국 질병관리센터가 치과 진료실에서 코로나19 전파가 확인된 증례가 없었다고 보도하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Fortunately, according to the U.S. National Pub-lic Radio report on July 6, 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) and the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reported that there were no confirmed cases of COVID-19 transmission in dental clinics until this time of the COVID-19 pandemic.

data.source_sentence: 호흡기 비말(respiratorydroplet)은 직경 >5-10μm인 반면, 직경이 5μm 미만인 비말은 비말 핵(droplet nuclei) 또는 에어로졸이라고 한다.

data.target_sentence: Respiratory droplets >5-10 μm in diameter and droplets less than 5 μm in diameter are called droplet nuclei or aerosols.

data.source_sentence: 50μm 이상 크기의 비말을 splatter 라고 하며 육안으로 관찰될 수 있는 물과 공기 그리고 고형성 물질의 혼합을 의미한다.

data.mt_sentence: Health care workers inform patients and caregivers about mask wearing and respiratory etiquette in waiting rooms and treatment rooms, and provide hand hygiene related items.
data.target_sentence: Medical staff inform patients and caregivers about wearing masks and respiratory etiquette in waiting rooms and treatment rooms, and provide hand hygiene related items.

data.source_sentence: 검진 및 진료 중 개인 보호구를 착용한다.
data.mt_sentence: Wear personal protective equipment during examinations and treatment.
data.target_sentence: Wear personal protective equipment during examination and treatment.

data.source_sentence: 환자 진료 전에 코로나19 발생국가 또는 지역 방문력이나 확진 환자 접촉력, 임상 증상 등을 확인한다.
data.mt_sentence: Before treating a patient, check the history of visiting countries or regions where COVID-19 occurred, contact history with confirmed patients, and clinical symptoms.
data.target_sentence: Before treating a patient, check the history of visiting the country or region where COVID-19 occurred, contact history with a confirmed person, and clinical symptoms.

data.source_sentence: 진료실 및 장비 감염 관리를 위하여 오염된 표면을 소독하고 관련 폐기물 및 의료 폐기물을 기준에 맞게 처리한다.
data.mt_sentence: Disinfect contaminated surfaces and dispose of related waste and medical waste in accordance with standards for infection control in clinics and equipment.
data.target_sentence: Disinfect contaminated surfaces and dispose of related and medical waste in accordance with infection control standards for clinics and equipment.

data.source_sentence: 개인 보호 장구를 착용하는 진료실을 제외하고 방문객 사이에 최소 1m 거리를 유지하는 것이 원칙이나, multi-chair 이거나 접수대 같은 경우처럼 최소 거리를 유지하기 힘든 경우, 투명 스크린과 같은 물리적인 가림막 설치를 고려한다.
data.mt_sentence: In principle, it is difficult to maintain a minimum distance of 1 m between visitors, except for a clinic wearing personal protective gear, but if it is difficult to maintain a minimum distance, such as a multi-chair or reception desk, consider installing a physical screen, such as a transparent screen.
data.target_sentence: In principle, it is difficult to maintain a distance of at least 1m between visitors, except for clinics wearing personal protective equipment, but in cases where it is difficult to maintain a minimum distance, such as a multi-chair or reception counter, a physical screen such as a transparent screen.

data.source_sentence: 호흡기 에어로졸(<5 μm)도 타인에게 전파될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Respiratory aerosols (<5/> μm) can also be transmitted to others.
data.target_sentence: Respiratory aerosols (<5/>μm) can also be transmitted to others.

data.source_sentence: 코로나19 감염 저위험 환자들에게는 에어로졸 생성술식을 시행하더라도 원칙적으로 술식 후 진료 중단 시간을 가질 필요가 없다.
data.mt_sentence: In principle, even if an aerosol-producing procedure is performed for patients at low risk of COVID-19 infection, there is no need to have a treatment suspension time after the surgery.
data.target_sentence: Even if an aerosol generating procedure is performed for patients with a low risk of infection with COVID-19, in principle, there is no need to stop treatment after surgery.

data.source_sentence: 그럼에도 불구하고 최근 무증상 확진자 및 백신을 접종 완료자도 코로나19에 감염된 사례(돌파 감염, breakthrough infection)가 보고되고 있으므로 에어로졸 생성술식시 환기에 유의하는 것이 추천된다.
data.mt_sentence: Nevertheless, since asymptomatic confirmed cases and vaccine-vaccinated patients have recently been reported to be infected with COVID-19 (breakthrough infection), it is recommended to pay attention to ventilation during the aerosol generating procedure.
data.target_sentence: Nevertheless, as it has been reported that asymptomatic confirmed cases and vaccinated patients have recently been infected with COVID-19 (sudden infection), it is recommended to pay attention to ventilation during the aerosol generation procedure.

data.source_sentence: 코로나19 감염 고위험 환자 대하여 에어로졸 생성술식을 진행해야 한다면 음압 격리실이 이상적이며, 진료실에 기계적인 환기와 자연적인 환기(창문), 이 두 가지 중 하나는 반드시 있어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: A negative pressure isolation room is ideal if an aerosol generating procedure is to be performed on a high-risk patient for COVID-19 infection, and one of the two must be provided in the treatment room, mechanical ventilation or natural ventilation (window).
data.target_sentence: Negative pressure isolation rooms are ideal for performing aerosol-generating procedures on patients at high risk for COVID-19, one of which should be provided in the treatment room, mechanical ventilation, or natural ventilation (windows).

data.source_sentence: 코로나19 시대에 적절히 대응하기 위하여 가장 중요한 요소는 바이러스 전파를 예방하고, 관련 질병 및 사망을 최소화하여 임상 진료 과정에서 코로나19 확산을 통제하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to respond appropriately in the era of COVID-19, the most important factor is to control the spread of COVID-19 in the course of clinical care by preventing the spread of the virus and minimizing related diseases and deaths.
data.target_sentence: In order to respond appropriately in the era of COVID-19, it is most important to prevent the spread of COVID-19 in the course of clinical treatment and to control the spread by minimizing related diseases and deaths.

data.source_sentence: 특히 구강 점막과 비강까지 수술에 포함되는 구강악안면외과 영역의 경우 SARS-CoV-2 바이러스의 에어로졸화 위험을 항상 염두에 두어야 하며 에어로졸 생성술식 관련하여 아래와 같이 요약할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, in the case of oral and maxillofacial surgery, where the oral mucosa and nasal cavity are included in surgery, the risk of aerosolization of the SARS-CoV-2 virus must always be kept in mind, and the aerosol generation method can be summarized as follows.
data.target_sentence: In particular, in the case of oral and maxillofacial surgery where oral mucosa and nasal cavity are involved in surgery, the risk of aerosolization of SARS-CoV-2 virus must always be kept in mind, and the aerosol generation method is summarized as follows.

data.source_sentence: 일반적인 치과 치료 중 에어로졸이 생성되는 대표적인 술식은 초음파 스케일러를 사용한 스케일링, 고속핸드피스를 사용한 외과적 발치 등의 술식, air pol-isher를 사용 술식 등이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Typical procedures that generate aerosols during general dental treatment include scaling using an ultrasonic scaler, surgical extraction using a high-speed handpiece, and a procedure using an air pol-isher.
data.target_sentence: Typical dental procedures that generate aerosols include scaling using an ultrasonic scaler, surgical extraction using a high-speed handpiece, and procedures using an air polisher.

data.source_sentence: 코로나19 무증상이나 코로나 접촉/노출이 있었던 환자의 경우는 코로나19 감염 중등도 위험 환자로 간주한다.
data.mt_sentence: Patients with COVID-19 asymptomatic symptoms or COVID-19 contact/exposure are considered patients at moderate risk of COVID-19.
data.target_sentence: Patients with asymptomatic COVID-19 symptoms or contact/exposure to COVID-19 are considered patients at moderate risk of COVID-19.

data.source_sentence: 국내 입원 환자에서 영양 불량 환자는 22~61%로 보고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Inpatients in Korea are reported to have malnutrition in 22 to 61%.
data.target_sentence: It is reported that 22~61% of hospitalized patients in Korea are malnourished.

data.source_sentence: 선진국의 경우 입원 환자의 약 1/3에 해당되는 환자가 영양 불량이라는 보고가 있으며 영양 불량은 환자 치료 결과에 부정적 효과를 미치는 중요한 원인 중 하나인 것은 잘 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In developed countries, about 1/3 of hospitalized patients are reported to be malnourished, and it is well known that malnourished is one of the important causes that negatively affect patient treatment results.
data.target_sentence: In developed countries, it is reported that approximately one-third of hospitalized patients are malnourished, and malnutrition is well-known as one of the major causes of negative impact on patient outcomes.

data.source_sentence: 환자의 영양 불량은 의학적 치료 결과에 부정적 영향을 미치므로 영양불량의 원인이 되는 영양학적 문제점을 해결하여 치료 효과를 극대화하고자 의사, 영양사, 약사, 간호사가 한 팀이 되어 영양 집중 지원팀(Nutritional Support Team, NST)을 조직하여 다학제 자문 활동을 하고 있으며, 다양한 질병을 가진 환자의 삶의 질과 치료 성적 향상에 크게 기여하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Because malnutrition in patients negatively affects the results of medical treatment, doctors, nutritionists, pharmacists, and nurses work as a team to solve the nutritional problems that cause malnutrition and maximize the treatment effect. , NST) to provide multidisciplinary advisory activities, and the NST greatly contributes to improving the quality of life and treatment outcomes of patients with various diseases.
data.target_sentence: Malnutrition of patients has a negative effect on the results of medical treatment, so it is necessary to maximize the treatment effect by solving nutritional problems that cause malnutrition. To this end, a team of doctors, nutritionists, pharmacists, and nurses has formed a Nutritional Support Team (NST) to provide multidisciplinary advisory activities. These activities greatly contribute to improving the quality of life and treatment results of patients with various diseases.

data.source_sentence: NST 다학제 자문 활동으로 인한 치료의 긍정적 효과를 인정받아 보건복지부 고시에 따라 2014년 8월부터 국내 집중 영양 치료료 수가가 신설되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In recognition of the positive effects of treatment from NST's multidisciplinary advisory activities, the domestic intensive nutrition treatment fee was newly established in August 2014 according to the notification of the Ministry of Health and Welfare.
data.target_sentence: In recognition of the positive effects of treatment due to NST multidisciplinary advisory activities, a new fee for intensive nutrition treatment in Korea was established in August 2014 according to the notification of the Ministry of Health and Welfare.

data.source_sentence: 집중 영양 치료료 수가를 받기 위해서 NST는 다직종 4인 이상으로 구성하고, 약사는 영양 관련 교육을 이수한 후 전문성이 확보된 인력에 한하여 NST의 구성원의 참여를 필수로 하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to receive the intensive nutrition treatment fee, the NST consists of 4 or more multi-professionals, and the participation of NST members is mandatory for pharmacists who have completed nutrition-related education and secured expertise.
data.target_sentence: NST consists of 4 or more multi-tasking workers and receives intensive nutrition treatment expenses. Pharmacists require NST members to participate only if they have completed nutrition-related education and secured expertise.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 미국에서 2011년 8월에 시행한 정맥 영양 수액 공급 관련 설문 조사에서 응답한 자의 72%가 조제 정맥 영양 수액을 투여하는 것으로 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The AAA reported that 72% of respondents to a survey on intravenous nutritional fluid supply in the United States conducted in August 2011 were receiving formulated IV fluids.
data.target_sentence: The AAA reported that 72% of respondents were receiving formulated IV fluids in an Intravenous Nutrient Fluid Delivery Survey conducted in the United States in August 2011.

data.source_sentence: 국내의 경우 병원약학교육연구원 영양약료분과의 2020년 연구보고에 따르면, 입원 환자 중 12.4%가 정맥 영양 수액을 투여받고 있었으며 정맥 영양 수액 사용자의 96.5%가 상품형 정맥 영양 수액을 사용하였고 집중 영양 치료를 자문한 환자는 29.3%였음을 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In Korea, according to a 2020 study report of the Nutrition and Pharmacy Division of the Hospital Pharmacy Education Research Institute, 12.4% of hospitalized patients were receiving intravenous nutritional fluids, and 96.5% of intravenous nutritional fluid users used commercial products, and intensive nutritional treatment. It was reported that 29.3% of patients who consulted
data.target_sentence: In Korea, according to a 2020 research report by the Nutrition and Pharmacy Division of the Hospital Pharmacy Education Research Institute, 12.4% of hospitalized patients were receiving intravenous nutritional infusions. In addition, it was reported that 96.5% of users of intravenous nutrition fluids used commercially available intravenous nutritional fluids, and 29.3% of patients advised intensive nutrition therapy.

data.source_sentence: 국내외에서 집중 영양 치료 시 경제적 비용에 대한 보고는 거의 없으며, 국내의 경우 2014년 8월 집중 영양 치료료 수가가 신설된 이후 집중 영양 치료료 수가와 관련된 현황 보고가 현재까지 없다.
data.mt_sentence: There are few reports on the economic cost of intensive nutrition treatment at home and abroad, and in Korea, since the intensive nutrition treatment fee was newly established in August 2014, there has been no report on the current status of the intensive nutrition treatment fee.
data.target_sentence: There are hardly any reports on the economic cost of nutritional intensive treatment costs at home and abroad, and there has been no report on the status of intensive nutrition treatment costs in Korea since the establishment of the nutritional strong and weak intensive treatment costs in August 2014.

data.source_sentence: 병원에서 조제 공급하는 정맥 영양 수액의 관리와 조제, 투여 후 감시는 병원 약사에 의해 이뤄지고 있으나 국내에서 현황 조사 관련 연구가 없다.
data.mt_sentence: The management, preparation, and post-administration of intravenous nutritional fluids prepared and supplied by hospitals are monitored by hospital pharmacists, but there are no studies related to current status investigations in Korea.
data.target_sentence: Hospital pharmacists monitor the management, dispensing, and administration of intravenous nutrient solutions prepared and supplied by hospitals, but there are no studies related to current status investigations in Korea.

data.source_sentence: 이는 병원 내 조제 정맥 영양 수액은 조제약이지만, 급여 청구 코드가 병원마다 다르고 통일되어 있지 않아 실태 파악이 어렵기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is because, although intravenous nutritional fluids dispensed in hospitals are pharmaceuticals, it is difficult to understand the actual situation because the reimbursement claim codes differ from hospital to hospital and are not uniform.
data.target_sentence: This is because, despite the fact that intravenous nutrient solutions prepared in hospitals are pharmaceuticals, it is difficult to ascertain the actual situation as the reimbursement claim codes differ from hospital to hospital and are not uniform.

data.source_sentence: 각 병원에서 조제 공급하는 정맥 영양 수액 실태는 주사제 무균조제료(1건당)-고영양 수액제TPN 수가 현황을 살펴봄으로써 간접적으로 파악할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The status of intravenous nutritional infusions dispensed and supplied by each hospital can be indirectly identified by examining the number of sterile injectables (per case)-highly nutritious infusions TPN.
data.target_sentence: By examining the number of sterile injection (per case)-high nutrient solution TPN, you can indirectly check the status of intravenous nutrient solution prepared and supplied by each hospital.

data.source_sentence: 진료 행위 코드 중 입원 환자에서 발생한 집중 영양 치료료-상급 종합 병원, 집중 영양 치료료-종합 병원, 주사제 무균조제료(1건당)-고영양 수액제TPN에 대해 연도별, 성별, 청구 환자수, 청구 금액과 청구 건수, 요양기관 소재의 자료를 수집하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Intensive nutrition treatment fee incurred by inpatients among the code of practice - tertiary hospital, intensive nutrition treatment fee - general hospital, aseptic injection for injection (per case) - high nutritional infusion solution TPN by year, gender, number of patients billed, and amount charged We collected data on the number of medical bills, the number of claims, and the location of medical institutions.
data.target_sentence: Data were collected by year, sex, number of claims, amount and number of claims, and location of nursing institutions for the following situations that occurred in inpatients among treatment practice codes: Intensive Nutrition Treatment Fee - Advanced General Hospital, Intensive Nutrition Treatment Charge -General hospital, aseptic preparation for injections (per case) -high-nutrition infusion TPN, etc.

data.source_sentence: 병원 내 조제 정맥 영양 수액은 조제약이지만, 급여 청구 코드가 병원에 따라 다르고 통일되어 있지 않아 주사제 무균조제료(1건당)-고영양 수액제TPN으로 간접적으로 병원 내 조제 정맥 영양 수액 사용의 변화 추이와 현황을 확인하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Although intravenous nutritional fluids dispensed in hospitals are pharmaceuticals, the reimbursement claim code differs from hospital to hospital and is not uniform, so the trend and status of changes in the use of intravenous nutritional fluids dispensed in hospitals indirectly with sterile injection (per case)-high-nutrition infusion solution TPN wanted to confirm.
data.target_sentence: In-hospital dispensed intravenous nutrition is a pharmaceutical product, but the reimbursement claim codes differ from hospital to hospital and are not uniform. Therefore, we tried to ascertain the trend and current status of the use of intravenous nutrient solution indirectly prepared in hospitals with aseptic preparation for injection (per case)-high nutrient infusion TPN.

data.source_sentence: 집중 영양 치료료 수가가 신설된 것은 2014년 8월에 신설되어 1년간 자료가 모두 수집된 2015년을 기준으로, 2020년의 청구 현황을 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The new fee for intensive nutritional treatment was newly established in August 2014, and based on 2015, when all data were collected for one year, the status of claims in 2020 was compared.
data.target_sentence: In August 2014, the newly established intensive nutritional treatment cost was compared with the 2015 when all data for one year were collected.

data.source_sentence: 2015년에서 2020년까지 연도마다 청구 환자수, 청구 건수, 청구 금액 모두 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Each year from 2015 to 2020, the number of patients claimed, the number of claims, and the amount of claims all increased.
data.target_sentence: From 2015 to 2020, the number of claims, the number of claims, and the amount of claims all increased each year.

data.source_sentence: 년도별 청구 건수를 청구 환자수로 나누었을 때 1인당 청구 건수는 2014년 1.7건에서 2020년 2.1건으로 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the number of claims by year was divided by the number of claimed patients, the number of claims per person increased from 1.7 in 2014 to 2.1 in 2020.
data.target_sentence: If the number of claims per year is divided by the number of claims, the number of claims per person increased from 1.7 in 2014 to 2.1 in 2020.

data.source_sentence: 20세 기준으로 나누어 비교하였을 때 19세 이하에서 1인당 청구 건수는 2.6건을 차지하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When compared by dividing by the age of 20, the number of claims per person under the age of 19 accounted for 2.6 cases.
data.target_sentence: When compared by the age group under 20, the number of claims per person under the age of 19 was 2.6.

data.source_sentence: 요양기관 소재지별 집중 영양 치료료 총 청구 건수는 서울 40.2%, 경기 19.9%, 부산 9.6%, 대구 4.0%, 경남 3.7% 순이었으며 서울, 경기, 부산 지역의 청구 건수가 전체 청구 건수의 70%를 차지하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The total number of claims for intensive nutrition treatment by location of nursing institutions was 40.2% in Seoul, 19.9% in Gyeonggi, 9.6% in Busan, 4.0% in Daegu, and 3.7% in Gyeongnam, and 70% of the total claims in Seoul, Gyeonggi, and Busan.
data.target_sentence: The total number of claims for intensive nutrition treatment by location of the nursing institution was 40.2% in Seoul, 19.9% in Gyeonggi, 9.6% in Busan, 4.0% in Daegu, and 3.7% in Gyeongnam. Claims from Seoul, Gyeonggi, and Busan accounted for 70% of the total number of claims.

data.source_sentence: 요양 기관 소재지별 소재지별 상급 종합 병원의 집중 영양 치료료 청구 건수 분포는 서울(42.2%), 경기(15.7%), 부산(11.2%), 광주(5.3%), 대구(5.0%) 순이었고 서울과 경기의 수도권이 57.9%를 차지하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The distribution of the number of claims for intensive nutrition treatment at tertiary general hospitals by location of nursing institution was in the order of Seoul (42.2%), Gyeonggi (15.7%), Busan (11.2%), Gwangju (5.3%), and Daegu (5.0%), followed by Seoul (42.2%). and the metropolitan area of Gyeonggi Province accounted for 57.9%.
data.target_sentence: The distribution of claims for intensive nutrition treatment fees in tertiary general hospitals by location by location of nursing institutions is as follows: Seoul (42.2%), Gyeonggi (15.7%), Busan (11.2%), Gwangju (5.3%), and Daegu (5.0%). ), followed by Seoul and the Gyeonggi metropolitan area with 57.9%.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 2018년부터 2020년까지 청구 환자수, 청구 건수의 지속적 감소 추세가 관찰되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, a continuous decrease in the number of patients and claims was observed from 2018 to 2020.
data.target_sentence: In particular, from 2018 to 2020, the number of patients and claims continued to decrease.

data.source_sentence: 주사제 무균조제료(1건당)-고영양 수액제TPN 수가가 2015년 9월 2,940원에서 5,470원으로 상향되어, 2020년에는 청구 건수는 감소했으나 청구 금액은 크게 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Injection aseptic preparation (per case) - The price of TPN for high-nutritive sap was raised from 2,940 won in September 2015 to 5,470 won, and the number of claims decreased in 2020, but the amount of claims increased significantly.

data.source_sentence: 집중 영양 치료료와 주사제 무균조제료- 고영양 수액제TPN 수가 청구 환자수와 연령별 비율 2014년부터 2020년 집중 영양 치료료와 주사제 무균조제료- 고영양 수액제TPN의 총 청구 환자수는 각각 602,686명, 126,572명이었다.

data.source_sentence: 주사제 무균조제료-고영양 수액제TPN 청구는 병원 내 조제 정맥 영양 수액제가 환자에게 공급된 경우이다.

data.source_sentence: 집중 영양 치료료 총 청구 환자수는 주사제 무균조제료-고영양 수액제TPN 총 청구 환자수의 4.76배였다.

data.source_sentence: 집중 영양 치료료와 주사제 무균조제료-고영양 수액 집중 영양 치료료와 주사제 무균조제료-고영양수 액제TPN의 급여는 Table 4와 같이 변경되었다.

data.source_sentence: 2015년 대비 2020년 집중 영양 치료비-상급 종합 병원 청구 금액은 10%, 집중 영양 치료비-종합 병원 청구 금액은 7%, 주사제 무균조제비(1건당)-고영양 수액이었음을 알 수 있었다.

data.source_sentence: 병원 약사는 질병의 치료와 예방을 위해 약물 처방 검토, 조제, 투약 등의 고유 업무뿐 아니라 많은 임상 업무를 개발하고 적극적으로 참여하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Hospital pharmacists develop and actively participate in many clinical tasks as well as their own tasks such as review, dispensing, and administration of drug prescriptions for the treatment and prevention of diseases.
data.target_sentence: Hospital pharmacists develop and actively participate in many clinical tasks as well as their own work, such as review, dispensing, and administration of drug prescriptions for the treatment and prevention of diseases.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 집중 영양 치료에서 임상 약사의 경제적, 임상적 효과를 확인하기 위한 연구의 기초 자료로 사용될 수 있도록, 임상 약사의 활동을 간접적으로 파악할 수 있는 집중 영양 치료료와 주사제 무균조제료(1건당)-고영양 수액제TPN 수가 현황을 국내 최초로 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study reported for the first time in Korea the status of intensive nutritional treatments and injectable aseptic drugs (per case)-high nutritional fluid TPN, which can indirectly identify clinical pharmacists' activities to confirm the economic and clinical effects of clinical pharmacists in intensive nutrition treatment.
data.target_sentence: This study establishes basic data for research to confirm the economic and clinical effects of clinical pharmacists in intensive nutrition therapy. For the first time in Korea, the current status of the number of intensive nutrition treatment fees and aseptic preparations for injections (per case)-high-nutritional infusion TPN, which can indirectly identify the activities of clinical pharmacists, was reported.

data.source_sentence: 2014년 8월 1일 집중 영양 치료료가 생긴 이후, 국내에서 집중 영양 치료료를 받은 청구 환자수, 청구건 있음을 확인하였다.

data.source_sentence: 2014년에서 2020년 집중 영양 치료비는 요양기관 종사자수 기준 57.7%, 청구 건수 기준 61.2%, 청구 금액별 분포 중 상급 종합 병원이 차지하는 비율은 청구환자수 기준 67.7%를 차지하였다.

data.source_sentence: 상급 종합 병원에서 집중 영양 치료료 연간 청구 건수는 2017년까지는 빠르게 증가하는 추세였으나 2018년 이후 비슷하게 유지되고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 1인당 청구 건수를 20세 이상과 미만으로 나누어 비교하였을 때 19세 이하는 2.6건이였으나 20세 이상은 2.0건으로 소아와 청소년에서 집중 영양 치료가 더욱 활발하게 이뤄지고 있음을 확인하였다.

data.source_sentence: 주사제 무균조제비- 고영양 수액제TPN 총 청구 건수 중 상급 종합 병원이 차지하는 비율이 총 청구 환자수의 73.0%, 총 청구 건수의 78.7%, 청구 금액의 79.2%로 집중 영양 치료비 보다 상급 종합 병원에서 집중적으로 청구되고 있음을 확인하였다.

data.source_sentence: 주사제 무균조제비-고영양 수액제TPN는 5세 미만에서 가장 많이 청구되고 있으므로 출생아수 감소로 인하여 청수 건수가 감소되었을 것으로 판단된다.

data.source_sentence: 2014년에서 2020년까지 발생한 주사제 무균조제비- 고영양 수액제TPN은 1인당 13회로 고영양 수액제가 1일 1회 공급됨을 고려할 때 평균 13일간 조제 고영양 수액제가 공급됨을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering that the aseptic injection-high-nutrition infusion TPN generated from 2014 to 2020 is 13 times per person, and the highly-nutritious infusion is supplied once a day, it can be seen that the formulated high-nutrition infusion is supplied for an average of 13 days.

data.source_sentence: 유소아에서의 영양 치료는 영양 약료에서도 가장 난이도가 높은 영역 중 하나이므로, 이 연령군에 제공되는 임상 약사의 전문적 영양 약료 활동에 대해 국가와 약사회 차원의 적극적 지원과 배려가 필요할 것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: Nutritional therapy in infants and children is one of the most difficult areas in nutrition and pharmaceuticals, so it is thought that active support and consideration from the national and pharmaceutical societies are needed for the professional nutrition and pharmaceutical activities of clinical pharmacists provided to this age group.
data.target_sentence: Nutritional treatment in infants and children is one of the areas with the highest level of difficulty in nutritional medicine. Therefore, it is thought that active support and consideration at the national and pharmacist association levels are needed for the professional nutritional medicine activities of clinical pharmacists provided to this age group.

data.source_sentence: 지역별 분포에서 집중 영양 치료료-상급 종합 병원과 집중 영양 치료료-종합 병원, 고영양 수액제 무균조제료 청구 금액은 서울이 각각 42.3%, 37.0%, 51.6%, 경기는 15.7%, 26.5%, 10.1%를 차지하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the regional distribution, Seoul accounted for 42.3%, 37.0%, 51.6%, Gyeonggi 15.7%, 26.5%, and 10.1%, respectively, for the claims for intensive nutritional treatment-advanced general hospitals, intensive nutritional treatment-administered hospitals, and aseptic preparation.
data.target_sentence: In the distribution by region, the billed amounts for intensive nutrition treatment fee-superior general hospital, intensive nutrition treatment fee-general hospital, and sterile preparation for high-nutrition infusion are as follows: 42.3%, 37.0%, and 51.6% in Seoul, respectively, and in Gyeonggi, 15.7% 26.5% and 10.1% respectively.

data.source_sentence: 이는 2세 미만의 유소아 환자나 중증 환자의 비율이 서울에 위치한 상급 병원에서 더 집중되기 때문으로 사려된다.
data.mt_sentence: This is thought to be because the proportion of infants under the age of 2 or severely ill patients is more concentrated in higher hospitals located in Seoul.

data.source_sentence: 16개 병원 중 약 68.8%가 수도권에 위치하고 있고 조제 자동화 기계가 있는 병원에서 병원 내 정맥 영양 수액의 조제가 적극적으로 이뤄지고 있어 더 많은 무균조제료-고영양 수액제TPN 수가가 발생하는 것으로 유추할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 보건의료 빅데이터 개방 시스템 자료에서 주사제 무균조제료-고영양 수액제TPN 청구 환자수는 집중 영양 치료료 청구 환자수와 비교 시 약 20% 규모였다.

data.source_sentence: 주사제 무균조제료-고영양 수액제TPN 수가가 발생한 환자는 병원 내 조제 정맥 영양 수액을 공급한 환자이다.
