data.source_sentence: 주사제 무균조제료-고영양 수액제TPN 수가가 발생한 환자는 집중 영양 치료가 이뤄진 환자이다.
data.mt_sentence: Aseptic injection-high nutrient infusions The patients who developed TPN are those who received intensive nutritional treatment.
data.target_sentence: Aseptic injection-hypernutrient injection The patients who developed TPN were those who received intensive nutritional treatment.

data.source_sentence: 집중 영양 치료는 경구 섭취가 어렵고 영양 상태가 불량하거나, 영양상태 악화 위험이 큰 환자를 대상으로 실시한다.
data.mt_sentence: Intensive nutrition therapy is performed for patients who have difficulty in oral intake and who have poor nutritional status or are at high risk of worsening nutritional status.
data.target_sentence: Intensive nutrition therapy is administered to patients who have difficulty taking oral intake or who are undernourished or at high risk of worsening nutritional status.

data.source_sentence: 임상 약사는 집중 영양 치료 적용 후 모니터링을 통해 영양 치료로 인하여 발생할 수도 있는 부작용을 감시하고, 합병증 발생을 최소화해야 하며 환자 상태 변화에 따라 영양 지원의 형태를 변경해야 하는 지속적 관리가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Clinical pharmacists need to monitor side effects that may occur due to nutritional therapy through monitoring after application of intensive nutritional therapy, minimize the occurrence of complications, and continuously manage the nutritional support to change according to changes in the patient's condition.
data.target_sentence: Clinical pharmacists must monitor possible side effects from nutritional therapy through monitoring after application of intensive nutrition therapy, minimize the incidence of complications, and continuously manage nutritional support that changes as the patient's condition changes.

data.source_sentence: 제공된 영양 치료, 특히 임상 약사가 제공한 자문 내용은 객관적으로 의무 기록에 기록되야 하며 임상 연구를 통해 약사의 집중 영양 치료 행위가 비용에 있어 효과적임을 입증해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Nutritional treatment provided, particularly advice provided by clinical pharmacists, should be objectively documented in the medical record and clinical studies should demonstrate that the pharmacist's practice of intensive nutritional therapy is cost-effective.
data.target_sentence: Nutritional treatments provided, particularly advice given by clinical pharmacists, must be objectively documented in medical records, and clinical studies must demonstrate that pharmacists' practice of intensive nutritional treatment is cost-effective.

data.source_sentence: 임상 약사 중 영양 약료 전문 약사의 역할을 확대하기 위해서는 의료인과 환자, 정책 입안자, 보험 급여 관리자에게 영양 약료 전문 약사의 역할과 효과를 널리 알려야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to expand the role of nutrition and pharmaceutical pharmacists among clinical pharmacists, the role and effectiveness of nutrition and pharmaceutical pharmacists should be widely communicated to health care workers, patients, policy makers, and insurance benefit managers.
data.target_sentence: Expanding the role of nutritionists and pharmacists among clinical pharmacists requires that the roles and effectiveness of nutritionists and pharmacists be communicated widely to health care workers, patients, policy makers and insurance benefit managers.

data.source_sentence: 이에 가장 중요한 것이 영양 약료 전문 약사가 제공한 집중 영양 치료의 의학적인 효과와 경제적 효과를 입증하는 연구이다.
data.mt_sentence: The most important thing for this is a study that proves the medical and economic effects of intensive nutritional treatment provided by pharmacists specializing in nutritional medicine.
data.target_sentence: For this, the most important thing is research that proves the medical and economic effects of intensive nutritional therapy provided by pharmacists specializing in nutritional medicine.

data.source_sentence: 이에 본 연구가 그 기초 자료를 제공하는 데 큰 의미가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, this study has great significance in providing the basic data.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, this study has great significance in providing basic data.

data.source_sentence: 향후 전문 약사의 법제화를 기반으로 영양 약료 전문 약사의 제도적 보완으로 집중 영양 치료의 저변 확대를 강화하여 질병의 치료와 의료비 절감을 이뤄내고, 영양약료 전문 약사의 수의 증가와 역할 확대를 도모해야한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the future, based on the legalization of specialized pharmacists, it is necessary to strengthen the base of intensive nutritional treatment through systematic supplementation of nutrition and pharmaceutical pharmacists to achieve treatment of diseases and reduce medical expenses, and to increase the number and role of pharmacists specializing in nutrition and pharmaceuticals.
data.target_sentence: In the future, based on the legalization of professional pharmacists, the base expansion of intensive nutrition treatment will be strengthened by institutional supplementation of pharmacists specializing in nutritional medicine. In addition, treatment of diseases and reduction of medical expenses should be achieved, and the number and role of pharmacists specializing in nutritional drugs should be increased.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 연하장애 환자를 대상으로 구강안면기능을 평가할 수 있는 포괄적 구강안면 기능척도(Comprehensive Oro-Facial Function Scale; COFFS)를 개발하고자 실시되었다.
data.mt_sentence: This study was conducted to develop a Comprehensive Oro-Facial Function Scale (COFFS) that can evaluate oral and facial functions for patients with dysphagia.
data.target_sentence: This study was conducted to develop the Comprehensive Oro-Facial Function Scale (COFFS) to evaluate oral and facial functions of dysphagia patients.

data.source_sentence: 평가 항목의 내적 타당도를 위해 Cronbach’s α값을 산출하였으며, 급간 내 상관계수 (Internal Classification Coefficients; ICC)를 이용하여 검사-재검사 신뢰도 및 검사자간 신뢰도를 구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Cronbach's α value was calculated for the internal validity of evaluation items, and the test-retest reliability and inter-inspector reliability were calculated using the intraclassification coefficients (ICC).
data.target_sentence: Cronbach's α value was calculated for the internal validity of evaluation items, and the test-retest reliability and inter-inspector reliability were calculated using the intraclassification coefficient (ICC).

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 COFFS의 평가 도구는 4개의 영역에서 34개의 문항을 최종적으로 선정하였고, 평가 항목에 따라 3~5점 척도로 개발되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the evaluation tool of COFFS finally selected 34 items in four areas and was developed on a 3-5 point scale according to the evaluation items.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the COFFS evaluation tool finally selected 34 items from 4 areas, and developed a 3-5 point scale according to the evaluation items.

data.source_sentence: 구강 안면 운동의 종류에는 혀 운동, 입술 운동, 볼 운동 등이 있으며 구강 안면 운동은 입술, 혀, 얼굴, 아래턱 주변 근육들의 가동범위와 근력을 증진시키는 것이 목적이다.
data.mt_sentence: Types of oral facial exercises include tongue exercises, lip exercises, and cheek exercises, and oral facial exercises are aimed at enhancing the range of motion and muscle strength of the muscles around the lips, tongue, face, and lower jaw.
data.target_sentence: Orofacial exercises include tongue exercises, lip exercises, and cheek exercises. Orofacial exercises are aimed at strengthening the range of motion and strength of muscles around the lips, tongue, face, and lower jaw.

data.source_sentence: 노화와 구강 운동 기능에 대한 다양한 연구들과 함께 노인들의 구강 운동 기술 및 씹기 기능 유지와 삶의 에 관한 연구 등 인지 기능과의 관련성에 대한 연구들도 다양하게 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition to various studies on aging and oral motor function, various studies on the relationship between cognitive function, such as oral motor skills and chewing function maintenance and life style of the elderly, are being conducted.
data.target_sentence: In addition to various studies on aging and oral motor function, various studies are being conducted on the relationship between cognitive function, such as oral motor ability and maintenance of chewing function, and lifestyles of the elderly.

data.source_sentence: 구강 안면 운동의 효과적 적용을 위해 연하재활을 수행하는 임상가들은 연하장애를 초래하는 해부학적 및 생리학적 이상을 규명하고 정상적인 구강 기능을 방해하는 요인들에 대한 객관적 도출이 필수적이다.
data.mt_sentence: For the effective application of oral and facial exercises, it is essential for clinicians who perform swallowing rehabilitation to identify the anatomical and physiological abnormalities that cause dysphagia and to objectively derive factors that interfere with normal oral function.
data.target_sentence: For the effective application of oral and facial exercises, it is essential for clinicians who perform swallowing rehabilitation to identify anatomical and physiological abnormalities that cause dysphagia and objectively derive factors that interfere with normal oral function.

data.source_sentence: 객관적 평가에 기반한 문제점 도출을 기반으로 대상자에게 최적화된 치료 계획을 수립하고, 치료적 중재의 제공 후 적용된 치료법에 대한 효과성 검증도 뒤따라야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the derivation of problems based on objective evaluation, an optimized treatment plan should be established for the subject, and the effectiveness of the applied treatment should be verified after the provision of therapeutic intervention.
data.target_sentence: Based on problem identification based on objective evaluation, an optimized treatment plan for the subject should be established, and the effectiveness of the applied treatment should be verified after providing a therapeutic intervention.

data.source_sentence: 최근 실시된 연하재활 관련 실태 연구를 살펴보면 작업 치료실에서 주로 사용하는 임상 평가 도구는 3온스 물 삼키기 검사가 가장 많은 비중(69.7%)을 차지하였고, GUSS(Gugging swallowingscreen)를 사용하여 평가하는 경우가 7.9%로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In a recent study on swallowing rehabilitation, the 3 oz water swallow test accounted for the largest proportion (69.7%) of the clinical evaluation tool mainly used in the occupational therapy room, and the case of evaluating using the GUSS (Gugging swallowing screen) was 7.9. % was shown.
data.target_sentence: In a recent study on swallowing rehabilitation, the most frequently used clinical assessment tool in occupational therapy rooms was the 3-ounce water swallow test (69.7%). And, 7.9% of cases were evaluated using Gugging Swallowing Screen (GUSS).

data.source_sentence: 삼킴 단계를 구체적으로 나누어 적용 가능한 평가 도구를 살펴본 연구 결과 평가 도구 중 VFSS(Videofluoroscopy swallow study)는 삼킴 과정을 돕고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the result evaluation tools of the study that examined the applicable evaluation tools by dividing the swallowing stage in detail, the Videoofluoroscopic Swallow study (VFSS) aims to help the swallowing process.
data.target_sentence: Among the evaluation tools, the VFSS (Videoofluoroscopic Swallow study) tried to help the swallowing process.

data.source_sentence: 혀, 볼, 입술의 근력의 객관적인 수치를 얻고자 할 경우 IOPI(IowaOral Performance Instrument)를 사용하여 평가를 실시하기도 하였지만, 구강 단계에서 적용 가능한 평가 도구는 다른 연하 단계의 평가 도구들보다 상대적으로 적게 조사되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Evaluation was conducted using the Iowa Oral Performance Instrument (IPI) to obtain objective values of tongue, cheek, and lip muscle strength, but relatively fewer evaluation tools were found in the oral stage than in other younger stages.
data.target_sentence: Assessments were performed to obtain objective values of tongue, cheek, and lip muscle strength using the Iowa Oral Performance Instrument (IOPI), but relatively fewer assessment tools were found in the oral phase than in the other swallowing phases.

data.source_sentence: 적절한 구강 안면 근육의 기능과 혀의 압력이 음식덩이의 원활한 추진을 통하여 구강단계의 보다 안전한 삼킴으로 이어지는 것을 생각할 때, 관련 근육들의 직접적인 기능을 평가할 수 있는 객관적인 평가 도구의 적용이 추천될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering that proper oral and facial muscle function and tongue pressure lead to safer swallowing in the oral stage through smooth propulsion of food, the application of an objective evaluation tool that can evaluate the direct function of related muscles can be recommended.
data.target_sentence: Considering that proper oral and facial muscle function and tongue pressure lead to safer swallowing in the oral stage through smooth propulsion of food, it is recommended to apply an objective evaluation tool that can evaluate the direct function of the relevant muscles.

data.source_sentence: 이후 1차적으로 개발된 척도의 틀을 가지고 성인과 아동을 대상으로 임상에서 10년 이상 연하장애평 1인이 함께 평가 영역과 항목을 검토하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Afterwards, with the framework of the scale developed primarily, evaluation areas and items were reviewed by one person with dysphagia over 10 years in clinical trials for adults and children.
data.target_sentence: Since then, for more than 10 years, a single person with dysphagia has mainly developed a scale frame in clinical trials targeting adults and children, and reviewed the evaluation areas and items.

data.source_sentence: 문헌 고찰을 통해 조사된 평가 도구의 경우 턱끝근(Mentalis), 구강 안면 촉지 시 통증(Pain with palpation), 언어 능력(Speech), 입천장의 넓이(Widthof palate) 등 삼킴과 관련이 적은 항목들은 본 연구의 평가 항목에 포함시키지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of evaluation tools investigated through literature review, items less related to swallowing, such as mentalis, pain in oral facial touch, speech, and wide of palate, were not included in the evaluation items of this study.
data.target_sentence: In the case of evaluation tools investigated through literature review, items less related to swallowing, such as psychomuscular, pain upon palpation, language, and palatal width, were not included in the evaluation items of this study.

data.source_sentence: 저작 분포와 삼킴 후 목소리 변화 항목의 경우 음식을 저작하는 위치와 빈도(%) 및 발성 상태에 따라 보다 세부적인 분류가 필요하여 1점부터 5점까지의 척도로 분류하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of the distribution of authoring and the change in voice after swallowing, more detailed classification was required according to the location and frequency (%) and vocalization status of food, so it was classified on a scale from 1 point to 5 points.
data.target_sentence: In the case of mastication distribution and change of voice after swallowing, more detailed classification was required according to the location and frequency (%) of food and the state of vocalization, so it was classified on a scale of 1 to 5.

data.source_sentence: 점수 구성은 총점 124점(의사소통 12점, 구조 및 형태 16점, 움직임 수행능력 51점, 저작및 삼킴 45점)이고 기능수준에 따라 높은 점수를 받도록 구성하였으며 최저 점수는 34점이다.
data.mt_sentence: The total score composition is 124 points (12 points for communication, 16 points for structure and form, 51 points for movement performance, 45 points for authoring and swallowing), and the lowest score is 34 points.
data.target_sentence: The total score consists of 124 points (communication 12 points, structure and form 16 points, movement performance 51 points, mastication and swallowing 45 points), with the lowest score being 34 points.

data.source_sentence: COFFS는 AAA에 의해 한국판으로 번안되어 신뢰도와 타당도가 입증된 K-MASA(Korean MannAssessment of Swallowing Ability)에서 의사소통과 관련된 항목(각성수준, 이해도, 협조)과 저작 및 삼킴 영역과 관련된 항목 2개(삼킴 시 호흡, 삼킴 후 목소리 변화)에 대한 항목을 토대로 구성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: COFFS has been translated into the Korean version by AAA and has proven reliability and validity in K-MASA (Korean MannAssessment of Swallowing Ability), communication-related items (arousal level, comprehension, cooperation) and 2 items related to chewing and swallowing (breathing during swallowing, voice change after swallowing) was composed based on the items.
data.target_sentence: COFFS was constructed based on the following items from K-MASA (Korean MannAssessment of Swallowing Ability), which was adapted into a Korean version by AAA and proved reliable and valid: items related to communication (awareness level, level of understanding, cooperation) and authorship and 2 items related to the swallowing area (breathing on swallowing, voice change after swallowing).

data.source_sentence: 내용 타당도 검증은 AAA에 의해 고안된 내용 타당도비율의 식을 적용하여 분석하였으며, 공식에 의해 내용 타당도 비율 값은 0.42 이상일 때 통계적으로 유의미한 값(p<0.05)이다.
data.mt_sentence: The content validity test was analyzed by applying the formula for the content validity ratio devised by AAA, and according to the formula, when the content validity ratio value is 0.42 or more, it is a statistically significant value (p<0/>.05).
data.target_sentence: The content validity verification was analyzed by applying the formula of the content validity ratio devised by AAA, and according to the formula, the content validity ratio value is statistically significant (p<0.05) when it is 0.42 or higher.

data.source_sentence: 신뢰도 검증을 위해 D광역시 소재의 B요양병원에 이상)신경학적 질환을 진단받고 연하장애 증상을 가진 입원환자 20명을 대상으로 실시하였으며 대상자 정보는 Table 2와 같다.
data.mt_sentence: To verify reliability, 20 inpatients with symptoms of dysphagia after being diagnosed with a neurological disease (abnormal) at B Nursing Hospital in D Metropolitan City were conducted, and the target information is as shown in Table 2.
data.target_sentence: To verify reliability, 20 inpatients who showed symptoms of dysphagia after a diagnosis of neurological disease (abnormality) at a nursing hospital in D city were targeted, and the target information is as shown in <Table 2>.

data.source_sentence: COFFS를 평가하여 내적 신뢰도를 검증하였으며, 검사-재검사 신뢰도를 위해 작업 치료사 1인이 1차 평가를 실시한 후 2주의 간격을 두고 같은 대상자에게 동일하게 2차 평가를 실시한 결과로 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The internal reliability was verified by evaluating COFFS. For test-retest reliability, one occupational therapist performed the first evaluation, and then the second evaluation was performed on the same subject at an interval of 2 weeks.
data.target_sentence: COFFS was evaluated to verify internal reliability. For test-retest reliability, one occupational therapist performed the primary evaluation, and then the secondary evaluation was performed on the same subject at intervals of 2 weeks.

data.source_sentence: 본 척도의 신뢰도를 구하기 위해 내적 신뢰도는 Cronbach’s α값을 산출하였으며, 검사-재검사, 검사자간 신뢰도는 급간 내 상관계수(Internal Classification Coefficients; ICC)를 이용 연구 대상자의 특성과 임상적 정보는 Table 2와 같다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to obtain the reliability of this scale, the internal reliability was calculated as Cronbach's α value, and the test-retest and inter-inspector reliability were determined by using the Internal Classification Coefficients (ICC). same.
data.target_sentence: To obtain the reliability of this scale, the internal reliability was calculated as Cronbach's α value. Table 2 shows the test-retest and inter-inspector reliability along with the subject's characteristics and clinical information using the internal classification coefficient (ICC).

data.source_sentence: 신경학적 질환의 분류로는 뇌졸중 13명(65.0%), 파킨슨병 3명(15.0%), 근위축성측삭경화증 1명(5.0%), 외상성 뇌손상 3명(10%)이었다.
data.mt_sentence: The categories of neurological diseases were 13 patients with stroke (65.0%), 3 patients with Parkinson's disease (15.0%), 1 patient with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (5.0%), and 3 patients with traumatic brain injury (10%).
data.target_sentence: The categories of neurological disease were stroke in 13 patients (65.0%), Parkinson's disease in 3 patients (15.0%), amyotrophic lateral sclerosis in 1 patient (5.0%), and traumatic brain injury in 3 patients (10%).

data.source_sentence: 보완된 항목을 포함한 변이계수(Coefficient of variation)는 0.04로 안정된 것으로 확인되어 설문지를 확정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The coefficient of variation including the supplemented items was found to be stable at 0.04, and the questionnaire was confirmed.
data.target_sentence: The coefficient of variation including supplementary items was stable at 0.04, confirming the questionnaire.

data.source_sentence: 34개의 항목에 대한 검사-재검사 신뢰도는 0.974로 확인되었고, 검사자 간 신뢰도는 0.937로 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The test-retest reliability for 34 items was confirmed to be 0.974, and the inter-inspector reliability was confirmed to be 0.937.
data.target_sentence: The test-retest reliability for 34 items was 0.974, and the inter-inspector reliability was 0.937.

data.source_sentence: Table 5는 항목별 ICC 검증 결과를 보여주고, 검사-재검사 신뢰도는 0.721~1 사이에 분포되었으며, 검사자 간 신뢰도는 0.706~1 사이에 분포하는 것으로 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 5 shows the ICC verification results for each item, and it was confirmed that the test-retest reliability was distributed between 0.721 and 1, and the inter-inspector reliability was distributed between 0.706 and 1.
data.target_sentence: Table 5 shows the ICC verification results for each item, and it was confirmed that the test-retest reliability was 0.721~1, and the inter-inspector reliability was 0.706~1.

data.source_sentence: 구강 준비기 및 구강기는 연하에 직접적인 영향을 미칠 뿐만 아니라 인두기에 간접적인 영향을 미칠 수 있으므로 연하재활을 수행하는 임상가들은 구강기에 대한 객관적인 평가를 통해 문제점을 파악하는 과정이 필요하다고 할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the oral preparation and oral phases not only directly affect swallowing but also indirectly affect the pharynx, it can be said that clinicians who perform swallowing rehabilitation need to identify problems through an objective evaluation of the oral phase.
data.target_sentence: Since oral preparation and oral phase not only directly affect the swallowing phase, but also indirectly affect the pharyngeal phase, it can be said that clinicians performing swallowing rehabilitation should identify problems through an objective assessment of the oral phase.

data.source_sentence: 이에 본 연구는 신경학적 질환으로 인해 연하장애를 호소하는 대상자들의 구강 안면 기능을 평가하기 위한 척도를 개발하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, this study attempted to develop a scale to evaluate the oral facial function of subjects complaining of dysphagia due to neurological diseases.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, in this study, we tried to develop a scale to evaluate the oral and facial functions of subjects who complained of dysphagia due to neurological diseases.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라 연하과정을 조절하는 삼차신경, 안면신경(Facial nerve), 혀인두신경, 미주신경, 혀밑신경에 대한 평가가 선행되어야 하고 그밖에 환자의 의식 명료도와 인지기능을 파악해서 이러한 요인들의 장애가 연하장애의 원인이 되는지 평가해야 한다고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, the evaluation of the trigeminal nerve, facial nerve, tongue pharyngeal nerve, American nerve, and tongue underlying nerve that control the swallowing process should be preceded, and the patient's consciousness and cognitive function should be identified to evaluate whether these factors cause swallowing disorders.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, evaluation of the trigeminal nerve, facial nerve, glossopharyngeal nerve, vagus nerve, and sublingual nerve, which control the swallowing process, should be preceded. In addition, it was suggested that the patient's clarity of consciousness and cognitive function should be identified to evaluate whether impairment of these factors is the cause of dysphagia.

data.source_sentence: 선정된 구강 안면 기능 척도 문항의 내용 타당도 검증을 위해 임상 경력 10년차 이상의 임상가 및 교육 경력의 전문가 집단을 대상으로 설문을 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: To verify the validity of the selected oral and facial function scale items, a questionnaire was conducted targeting clinicians with more than 10 years of clinical experience and a group of experts with educational experience.
data.target_sentence: To verify the validity of the selected oral and facial function scale items, a questionnaire was conducted targeting clinicians with more than 10 years of clinical experience and a group of experts with educational experience.

data.source_sentence: 그 결과 4개 영역 34개 항목으로 구성된 척도를 개발하였고, 본 연구에서 개발된 척도를 포괄적 구강 안면 기능 척도 COFFS의 점수 척도는 수행의 어려움(1점)부터 정확한 움직임이 가능(5점)까지의 척도로 나타내었으며, 항목에 따라 3~5점 척도로 분류하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, a scale consisting of 34 items in four areas was developed, and the score scale of the comprehensive oral facial function scale COFFS was expressed as a scale from difficulty in performance (1 point) to possible accurate movement (5 points), and was classified as a 3-5 point scale according to the item.
data.target_sentence: As a result, a scale consisting of 34 items in 4 areas was developed, and the scale developed in this study was classified into a 3-5 point scale according to the items. And the score scale of the comprehensive orofacial function scale COFFS was expressed on a scale ranging from difficulty in performance (1 point) to accurate movement possible (5 points).

data.source_sentence: 점수 구성은 총점 124점이고 기능 수준에 따라 높은 점수를 받도록 구성하였으며 최저 점수는 34점이다.
data.mt_sentence: The score composition is 124 points in total, and the lowest score is 34 points, which is configured to receive high scores according to the level of function.
data.target_sentence: The score consists of a total of 124 points, and the lowest score is 34 points, which is configured to receive a high score according to the skill level.

data.source_sentence: 평가 항목 중 얼굴 표정 항목의 경우 1차 설문의 내용 타당도(CVR) 값이 0.33으로 나타났으며, 2차 설문을 시행한 결과 내용 타당도 값이 0.67로 향상되어 COFFS의 내용 타당도 비율(CVR)의 평균은 0.67이었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of facial expression items among the evaluation items, the content validity (CVR) value of the first questionnaire was 0.33, and as a result of the second questionnaire, the content validity value was improved to 0.67, so the average of the content validity ratio (CVR) of COFFS was 0.67.
data.target_sentence: Among the evaluation items, in the case of the facial expression item, the content validity (CVR) value of the first questionnaire was 0.33. As a result of conducting the second questionnaire, the content validity value improved to 0.67, and the average content validity ratio (CVR) of COFFS was 0.67.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 개발된 COFFS의 신뢰도를 측정하기 위해 신경학적 질환으로 인해 연하장애를 진단받은 환자 20명을 대상으로 COFFS 평가를 시행하였다.

data.source_sentence: 혈중 인은 인을 함유한 음식의 섭취 및 투약 지도와 관련된 생리적 지표로서, 고인산혈증예방을 위한식이 자가 간호 행위와 병행되어야 하고, 투석 간 체중 증가량은 저염식과 수분 제한 등 혈액 투석 환자의 식습관과 관련된 순응도를 반영하는 환자 중심의 요인이다.

data.mt_sentence: In a previous study of hemodialysis patients, uncertainty about diseases of hemodialysis patients is a factor that lowers basic psychological needs such as patient autonomy and competence, and has a negative effect, while uncertainty opportunity evaluation has a positive effect on self-care.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서도 불확실성 위험 평가는 자가 간호와 생리적 지표에 직접적인 영향이 없었던 반면, 불확실성을 상황이 긍정적인 결과를 가질 것이라고 생각하는 기회로 평가할 때 환자의 자가 간호 행위를 증가시키게 되며, 이는 생리적 지표를 변화시키는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, uncertainty risk assessment had no direct impact on self-care and physiological indicators, while it increased patients' self-care behavior when evaluating uncertainty as an opportunity to think that the situation would have positive results, which changed physiological indicators.

data.mt_sentence: This study attempted to provide basic data for the development of nursing intervention in hemodialysis patients by confirming the mediating effect between uncertainty evaluation and self-nursing behavior in relation to blood potassium, blood phosphorus, and dialysis weight gain (Kt/V).

data.source_sentence: 이 중에서 방사선 모니터링은 방사선 사고로부터 주민을 보호하기 위한 측정 기술이며 이는 방사능 방재 분야에 매우 중요한 기술이다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, radiation monitoring is a measurement technology to protect residents from radiation accidents, and it is a very important technology in the field of radiation disaster prevention.

data.source_sentence: 국내에서 운영 중인 환경 방사선 모니터링 시스템(Environment Radiation Monitoring System; ERMS)은 전리함(혹은 가압 전리함) 또는 NaI(Tl) 검출기를 활용하여 방사선을 측정하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The Environmental Radiation Monitoring System (ERMS) operating in Korea measures radiation using an ionization chamber (or pressurized ionization chamber) or NaI(Tl) detector.
data.target_sentence: The Environmental Radiation Monitoring System (ERMS) operating in Korea measures radiation using an ionization chamber (or pressurized ionization chamber) or NaI (Tl) detector.

data.source_sentence: 전리함의 경우, 방사선량 측정이 가능한 다른 검출기에 비해 보다 정확한 방사선량률에 대한 측정이 가능하나 방사선의 에너지, 핵종별 방사능 분석은 사실상 불가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of the ionization box, it is possible to measure the radiation dose rate more accurately than other detectors that can measure the radiation dose, but it is virtually impossible to analyze the energy of radiation and radioactivity by nuclide.
data.target_sentence: In the case of the ionization chamber, the radiation dose rate can be measured more accurately than other detectors that can measure the radiation dose, but it is virtually impossible to analyze the energy of radiation and radioactivity by nuclide.

data.source_sentence: 모니터링이 가능하지만 해당 지점에 국한되는 공간적 한계가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Monitoring is possible, but there are spatial limitations that are limited to the point.

data.source_sentence: 이를 보완하고자 다수의 지점에 설치되고 있으나, 이는 설치 공간 확보와 경제적인 비용 측면에서 매우 부담이 되는 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: Although it is being installed at a number of branches to compensate for this, it is a very burdensome situation in terms of securing installation space and economical cost.
data.target_sentence: In order to compensate for this, it is being installed in several branches, but it is very burdensome in terms of securing installation space and economic cost.

data.source_sentence: 그렇기 때문에 상대적으로 저렴하고, 선량 측정과 감마선핵종 판별이 가능한 NaI(Tl) 검출기를 활용하여 방사선 모니터링 장비가 개발되어 활용되고 있으며, 고선량 구역에서 운영이 힘든 특성을 극복하기 위해 추가적인 검출기와 결합하여 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, radiation monitoring equipment has been developed and utilized using NaI(Tl) detectors, which are relatively inexpensive, capable of measuring doses and identifying gamma-ray nuclides, and is used in combination with additional detectors to overcome the difficulty of operation in high-dose areas.
data.target_sentence: For this reason, radiation monitoring equipment has been developed and utilized by utilizing NaI(Tl) detectors that are relatively inexpensive and capable of measuring dose and discriminating gamma-ray nuclides. In addition, it is used in combination with an additional detector to overcome the difficult characteristics of operation in high-dose areas.

data.source_sentence: 원자력 관계 시설 사고 사례를 근거로 방사선 측정의 관점에서 살펴보면, 후쿠시마 원전 사고 후 측정된 선량 정보는 원전 반경 20 km 이내에서 최대 선량률은 Fig. 1에서 보는 바와 같이 약 0.14 mSv/h로 측정되었다.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 대학에서 해부학 강의는 전면 온라인으로 전환하였고, 시신 해부 실습도 일부 대학에서만 충분한 방역 장비를 갖추고 진행하고 있다고 하였다.

data.source_sentence: 추후에 팬데믹이 확산될 경우를 대비해서 학회나 유관 단체를 중심으로 온라인 실습이 가능한 교육 도구 개발에 앞장서야 한다는 의견도 제시하였다.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 코로나19 상황에서도 해부학자들은 교육과 연구에 잘 적응하고 있지만, 장기적인 안목을 가지고 비대면 디지털 시대에 대비하여 가상 현실 박물관을 포함한 다양한 온라인 교육 자료 개발을 통해 포스트 코로나 시대를 대비해야 한다고 주장하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA argued that anatomists are adapting well to education and research even in the context of COVID-19, but with a long-term perspective, in preparation for the non-face-to-face digital era, they should prepare for the post-corona era by developing various online educational materials, including virtual reality museums.
data.target_sentence: The AAA argued that anatomists are adapting well to education and research even in the COVID-19 situation, but from a long-term perspective, they should prepare for the post-coronavirus in preparation for the non-face-to-face digital era. We are ahead of the times by developing various online educational materials such as virtual reality museums.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 온라인 이론 강의와 병행하여 실시한 대면 방식의 시신 해부 실습에서 감염 위험성을 줄이기 위하여, 실습실에 음압환경을 유지하면서, 실습에 참여하는 인원을 줄였고, 실습 직전에 체온을 포함한 건강 상태를 점검하고, 실습 과정에는 방역 장비를 철저히 착용하여 진행하였다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA reported that in order to reduce the risk of infection in the face-to-face body dissection practice conducted in parallel with online theory lectures, the number of people participating in the practice was reduced, including body temperature was checked, and quarantine equipment was thoroughly worn during the practice.
data.target_sentence: AAA reported that the number of participants was reduced while maintaining a negative pressure environment in the laboratory to reduce the risk of infection in face-to-face body anatomy practice conducted in parallel with online theory lectures. data.source_sentence: 교수와 학생 모두 코로나19로 인하여 변화된 해부학 교육 방식에 적응하는 데 어려움이 많았고, 학생들의 학업 성취도와 만족도가 학교마다 매우 다르게 나타났다.

data.mt_sentence: Therefore, it is necessary to check the level of postpartum PTSD for mothers who are experiencing childbirth and explore related factors, and use it as evidence and intervention strategies for mental health management of mothers and their families.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, it is necessary to check the degree of postpartum post-traumatic stress disorder in mothers who have experienced childbirth, to explore related factors, and to utilize them as evidence and intervention strategies for mental health management of mothers and their families.

data.source_sentence: 과거 PTSD 경험, 임신 중 분만 두려움, 출산 시 난산이나 충격적인 출산 경험, 잘못된 대처 및, 스트레스, 산후 우울, 산후 건강 문제가 산후 PTSD를 증가시키는 유의한 영향 요인으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Past PTSD experiences, fear of delivery during pregnancy, difficulty or shocking childbirth experiences during childbirth, incorrect coping, stress, postpartum depression, and postpartum health problems were found to be significant influencing factors that increase postpartum PTSD.
data.target_sentence: Past experiences with PTSD, fear of childbirth during pregnancy, difficulties or traumatic births during childbirth, poor coping, stress, postpartum depression, and postpartum health problems have been identified as important influencing factors in increasing postpartum PTSD.

data.source_sentence: 즉 산후 3개월째이면서 산후 PTSD를 가진 산모 대부분이 산후 우울의 가능성을 내포하고 있고, 출산 경험이 생각날 때마다 산후 PTSD와 우울 증상이 동시에 나타나고 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In other words, most mothers with postpartum PTSD at the third month of childbirth had the possibility of postpartum depression, and whenever they remembered their childbirth experience, postpartum PTSD and depression symptoms appeared at the same time.
data.target_sentence: That is, most of the mothers with postpartum PTSD had the possibility of postpartum depression at 3 months postpartum, and whenever they remembered the birth experience, postpartum PTSD and depressive symptoms appeared at the same time.

data.source_sentence: 산후 PTSD와 우울 모두 부정적인 기분 상태를 포함하기에 산후 PTSD의 증상은 산후 우울 증상으로 쉽게 오인될 수 있다고 지적하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was pointed out that since both postpartum PTSD and depression include negative mood states, symptoms of postpartum PTSD can be easily mistaken for postpartum depression symptoms.
data.target_sentence: Since both postpartum PTSD and depression include negative mood states, it has been pointed out that the symptoms of postpartum PTSD can be easily mistaken for symptoms of postpartum depression.

data.source_sentence: 국내에서는 산모의 산후 우울 발생률이나 영향 요인 연구가 다수 수행된 것에 비해, 산후 우울과 관련 있는 산후 PTSD 발생률 또는 두 요인 간 관련성을 탐색하는 연구는 한국판 도구 개발 연구 두 편이 유일하다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared to a number of studies on the incidence of postpartum depression or influencing factors of mothers in Korea, only two studies on the development of Korean tools are conducted to explore the relationship between postpartum depression-related postpartum PTSD incidence or two factors.
data.target_sentence: While many studies have been conducted in Korea on the incidence of postpartum depression or factors influencing it, the two Korean version of tool development studies are the only studies exploring the incidence of postpartum PTSD related to postpartum depression or the relationship between the two factors.

data.source_sentence: 생후 1–18개월 된 아기를 키우는 산모에게 도구 타당화 검사를 한 연구에서도 산후 PTSD가 우울, 불안과 상관이 높게 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In a study that performed a tool validation test on mothers raising babies 1–18 months old, postpartum PTSD was also highly correlated with depression and anxiety.
data.target_sentence: Postpartum PTSD was also highly correlated with depression and anxiety in a study that performed an instrumental validation test in mothers of babies aged 1 to 18 months of age.

data.source_sentence: 산후 PTSD 관련 요인으로 산후 우울과 더불어 부정적인 출산 경험, 계획하지 않은 임신, 제왕 절개 분만, 그리고 산후 사회적 지지를 탐색하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The purpose of this study is to explore postpartum depression, negative childbirth experience, unplanned pregnancy, cesarean section, and postpartum social support as factors related to postpartum PTSD.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study was to explore postpartum depression, negative childbirth experience, unplanned pregnancy, cesarean section, and postpartum social support as factors related to postpartum PTSD.

data.source_sentence: 산모의 출산 경험의 긍정적 측면으로 모성기 전환에서 개인의 성장과 회복력 증가를 들 수 있지만, 출산 시 경험한 두려움은 부정적인 출산 경험으로 이어지면서 산후 PTSD를 높이는 예측 요인이다.
data.mt_sentence: Although individual growth and increased resilience in maternal transition are positive aspects of the mother's childbirth experience, fear experienced during childbirth is a predictor of increasing postpartum PTSD while leading to negative childbirth experiences.
data.target_sentence: While personal growth and increased resilience of maternal transition are positive aspects of maternal childbearing experiences, fear experienced during childbirth is a predictor of increased postpartum PTSD leading to negative childbearing experiences.

data.source_sentence: 국내 임부를 대상으로 분만 두려움을 사정한 결과 26.5%가 심각한 분만 두려움을 갖고 있었고, 분만 두려움은 산전 우울과 양의 상관을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of assessing the fear of childbirth for pregnant women in Korea, 26.5% of them had serious fear of childbirth, and the fear of childbirth showed a positive correlation with prenatal depression.
data.target_sentence: As a result of evaluating the fear of childbirth in Korean pregnant women, 26.5% had serious fear of childbirth, and the fear of childbirth showed a positive correlation with prenatal depression.

data.source_sentence: 나아가 임신 중 분만 두려움, 출산 시 심한 통증, 통제력 부족, 출산 경험의 부정적 인식은 산후 PTSD 발생에 유의한 상관성과 영향력을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Furthermore, fear of delivery during pregnancy, severe pain during childbirth, lack of control, and negative perception of childbirth experience showed a significant correlation and influence on the occurrence of postpartum PTSD.
data.target_sentence: In addition, fear of childbirth during pregnancy, severe pain during childbirth, lack of control, and negative perception of childbirth experience were found to have a significant correlation and influence on the development of postpartum stress disorder.

data.source_sentence: 계획하지 않은 임신은 산후 우울의 발생 위험을 높이는 요소였다.
data.mt_sentence: Unplanned pregnancy was a factor that increased the risk of postpartum depression.
data.target_sentence: Unplanned pregnancies were a factor that increased the risk of postpartum depression.

data.source_sentence: 주산기에 배우자 지지가 부족하고 배우자 간 부정적인 감정이 해결되지 못하면 산후 우울, 불안 및 초기 PTSD 증상으로 이어질 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If spouse support is insufficient during perinatal period and negative emotions between spouses are not resolved, it can lead to postpartum depression, anxiety, and early PTSD symptoms.
data.target_sentence: Insufficient spousal support during the perinatal period and negative feelings between spouses not resolved can lead to postpartum depression, anxiety, and early symptoms of PTSD.

data.source_sentence: 실제로 배우자의 지지가 부족한 여성에서의 산후 PTSD 비율은 지지를 받는 여성에 비해 3배 높게 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In fact, the proportion of postpartum PTSD in women who lacked spouse support was three times higher than that of women who received support.
data.target_sentence: In fact, the rate of postpartum PTSD among women without spousal support was three times higher than that of women with support.

data.source_sentence: 이는 배우자의 지지 역할이 출산 후 관리에서 잠재적인 긍정적 요소로 중요하기 때문에 산후 PTSD 감소와 관련이 있음을 시사한다.
data.mt_sentence: This suggests that the spouse's support role is related to a decrease in postpartum PTSD because it is important as a potential positive factor in postpartum care.
data.target_sentence: This suggests that the spouse's supportive role is related to the reduction of postpartum PTSD, as it is important as a potential positive factor in postpartum care.

data.source_sentence: 최근에는 산후 PTSD의 발생률과 관련 요인 및 결과에 대한 연구들이 주로 미국, 유럽의 저위험 또는 고위험 임산부들을 대상으로 보고되고 있고 국내에서는 산후 PTSD 측정을 위한 도구 개발 연구만 보고된 상태이다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, studies on the incidence and related factors and outcomes of postpartum PTSD have been reported mainly for low-risk or high-risk pregnant women in the United States and Europe, and only tool development studies for postpartum PTSD measurement have been reported in Korea.
data.target_sentence: Recently, studies on the incidence, related factors and outcomes of postpartum PTSD have been reported mainly targeting low- or high-risk pregnant women in the United States and Europe. In Korea, only a study on the development of a tool for measuring postpartum PTSD has been reported.

data.source_sentence: 우리나라 저위험 임신과 출산을 경험하는 여성에서 주산기 우울 발생률이 증가하고 있지만, 산후 우울이나 산후 PTSD 관련 건강 문제를 사정하고 진단 및 치료를 받는 과정에서 종종 여성이 배제되거나 과소 평가되고 있는 것이 현실이다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the incidence of perinatal depression is increasing in women experiencing low-risk pregnancy and childbirth in Korea, it is a reality that women are often excluded or undervalued in the process of assessing postpartum depression or PTSD-related health problems and receiving diagnosis and treatment.
data.target_sentence: The incidence of perinatal depression is increasing in women experiencing low-risk pregnancy and childbirth in Korea. However, the reality is that women are often excluded or underrepresented in the assessment, diagnosis, and treatment of postpartum depression or postpartum PTSD-related health problems.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 산모의 산후 우울과 산후 PTSD의 출산 시 경험한 두려움과 배우지 지지 수준, 계획하지 않은 임신, 제왕 절개 분만 관련성을 확인하기 위함이며, 구체적인 연구 목적은 다음과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The purpose of this study is to confirm the relationship between postpartum depression of mothers and the fear and learning support level of postpartum PTSD during childbirth, unplanned pregnancy, and cesarean delivery, and the specific purpose of the study is as follows.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study was to determine the relationship between maternal postpartum depression and childbirth, unplanned pregnancy, and postpartum PTSD fear and learning support level during cesarean section.

data.source_sentence: 산후 우울, 산후 PTSD, 출산 시 경험한 두려움, 배우자 지지의 수준을 확인한다.
data.mt_sentence: Check the level of postpartum depression, postpartum PTSD, fear experienced during childbirth, and spouse support.
data.target_sentence: Check for postpartum depression, postpartum traumatic stress disorder, fears during childbirth, and support for your spouse.

data.source_sentence: 산모의 일반적/산과적 특성에 따른 산후 우울과 산후 PTSD의 차이를 검정한다.
data.mt_sentence: The difference between postpartum depression and postpartum PTSD according to the general/maternity characteristics of the mother is tested.
data.target_sentence: The difference between postpartum depression and postpartum PTSD according to the general/maternal characteristics of the mother was investigated.

data.source_sentence: 산후 우울, 산후 PTSD, 출산 시 경험한 두려움, 배우자 지지의 관련성을 탐색한다.
data.mt_sentence: To explore the relationship between postpartum depression, postpartum PTSD, fear experienced during childbirth, and spousal support.
data.target_sentence: Explore the relationship between postpartum depression, postpartum PTSD, fear experienced during childbirth, and spousal support.

data.source_sentence: 산후 우울, 출산 시 경험한 두려움, 배우자 지지, 계획하지 않은 임신, 제왕 절개 분만이 산후 PTSD에 미치는 영향을 확인한다.
data.mt_sentence: The effects of postpartum depression, fear experienced during childbirth, spouse support, unplanned pregnancy, and cesarean delivery on postpartum PTSD are identified.
data.target_sentence: The effects of postpartum depression, fear experienced during childbirth, spousal support, unplanned pregnancies, and cesarean delivery have been identified on postpartum PTSD.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 산모의 산후 우울과 산후 PTSD의 관련성을 탐색하고 산후 PTSD의 관련 요인(산후 우울, 출산 시 경험한 두려움, 배우자 지지)을 규명하기 위한 상관성 조사 연구 설계이다.
data.mt_sentence: This study is a correlation investigation study design to explore the relationship between postpartum depression and postpartum PTSD in mothers and to identify related factors of postpartum PTSD (postpartum depression, fear experienced at childbirth, spouse support).
data.target_sentence: This study is a correlation study design to investigate the relationship between maternal postpartum depression and postpartum PTSD and to identify the related factors of postpartum PTSD (postpartum depression, fear of childbirth, spousal support).

data.source_sentence: 임신기에 수집한 1차 조사 자료는 임부의 분만 두려움 관련 요인 탐색 연구한 것으로, 본 연구에서는 이에 대해 산후 2회 추적 조사를 통해 수집한 산모 자료를 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The first survey data collected during pregnancy was a study on factors related to fear of delivery of pregnant women, and in this study, maternal data collected through two postpartum follow-up surveys were used.
data.target_sentence: The first survey data collected during pregnancy was a study on factors related to the fear of childbirth in pregnant women. In this study, maternal data collected through two postpartum follow-up studies were used.

data.source_sentence: 제외 기준은 보건복지부가 지정한 11대 고위험 임신질환 진단을 받은 경험이 있거나, 출산한 신생아가 사망하였거나, 또는 아기가 신생아 집중 치료실에 입원해 있는 산모이다.
data.mt_sentence: The exclusion criteria are mothers who have been diagnosed with 11 major high-risk pregnancy diseases designated by the Ministry of Health and Welfare, have died, or have their babies hospitalized in the neonatal intensive care unit.
data.target_sentence: Exclusion criteria were mothers diagnosed with the 11 major high-risk groups for pregnancy designated by the Ministry of Health and Welfare, those who died, and those who had their babies admitted to the neonatal intensive care unit.

data.source_sentence: 이 도구는 우울, 불안 및 공포, 죄책감, 자해 사고 등에 대한 자가 보고형의 10문항, 4점 척도로, 각 문항은 “전혀 그렇지 않다” 0점부터 “대부분 그렇다” 3점으로 구성된다.
data.mt_sentence: The tool is a self-reported 10-question, 4-point scale for depression, anxiety and fear, guilt, and self-inflicted accidents, with each question consisting of 0 points for "not at all" to 3 points for "mostly so."
data.target_sentence: This tool is a 4-point scale with 10 self-reported questions about depression, anxiety and fear, guilt, and self-injury, and each item consists of 0 points for “not at all” and 3 points for “mostly so”.

data.source_sentence: 1, 2, 4번 문항을 제외한 나머지 문항은 역 채점하고 총점은 30점이며, 점수가 높을수록 우울한 것으로 평가한다.
data.mt_sentence: Except for questions 1, 2, and 4, the remaining questions are scored in reverse, and the total score is 30 points, and the higher the score, the more depressing it is.
data.target_sentence: Except for questions 1, 2, and 4, the remaining questions are scored in the reverse order, and the total score is 30 points, and the higher the score, the higher the depression.

data.source_sentence: 국내의 산모를 대상으로 절단점을 9/10로 한 연구를 근거로 하여 본 연구에서도 절단점을 9/10로 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on a study on the cutting point of 9/10 targeting domestic mothers, this study also used the cutting point as 9/10.
data.target_sentence: Based on the study on the cut-off point of 9/10 for domestic mothers, the cut-off point of 9/10 was used in this study as well.

data.source_sentence: 이 도구는 총 14문항의 5점 척도로, 하위 영역은 아기의 입원에 대한 악몽 등 외상의 재경험(1–3번 문항), 회피 행동(4–9번 문항), 과각성 및 죄책감(10–14번 문항)으로 구성된다.
data.mt_sentence: The tool consists of a 5-point scale of 14 questions in total, with sub-areas consisting of re-experiences of trauma (Question 1–3), avoidance behavior (Question 4–9), hyper-awareness and guilt (Question 10–14), including nightmares about the baby's hospitalization.
data.target_sentence: This tool is a 5-point scale with a total of 14 items, and the subdomains are re-experiencing trauma such as nightmares about the baby's hospitalization (Question 1–3), avoidance behavior (Question 4–9), and hyperarousal and guilt ( Question 10 –14).

data.source_sentence: 각 문항은 “전혀 그렇지 않다” 0점부터 “한 달 이상 자주 그렇다” 4점으로 구성된다.
data.mt_sentence: Each item is rated from 0 “not at all” to 4 “often more than a month”.
data.target_sentence: Each item is rated on a scale of 0 for “not at all” to 4 for “often for more than a month”.

data.source_sentence: 총점 56점 중에서 19점 이상이면 임상적으로 유의한 PTSD 증상을 보인다고 판단한다.
data.mt_sentence: If the score is 19 or higher out of 56 points, it is judged that it shows clinically significant PTSD symptoms.
data.target_sentence: A score of 19 or more out of 56 is judged to have clinically significant PTSD symptoms.

data.source_sentence: 5점 척도로 수정한 원 도구의 신뢰도는 .90, 한국판 도구에서는 .87, 본 연구에서는 .76으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The reliability of the original tool modified on a 5-point scale was .90, .87 for the Korean version of the tool, and .76 in this study.
data.target_sentence: The reliability of the original tool, adjusted to a 5-point scale, was .90, .87 for the Korean version of the tool, and .76 for this study.

data.source_sentence: 이 변수의 측정 시점을 산후 1개월이 아닌 1주로 설정한 이 유는 출산 시 경험한 두려움에 대한 생각과 감정이 시간이 갈수록 감소하기 때문에 출산 시 감정을 가능한 빨리 반영하기 위함이다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason why the measurement time of this variable is set to 1 week, not 1 month after childbirth, is to reflect the feelings at childbirth as soon as possible because the thoughts and emotions of the fear experienced during childbirth decrease over time.
data.target_sentence: The reason that the measurement time of this variable was set to one week after delivery rather than one month after delivery is to reflect the emotions at the time of childbirth as quickly as possible because thoughts and feelings about fear experienced during childbirth decrease over time.

data.source_sentence: 이 도구는 33문항의 6점 척도로, “매우 그렇다” 0점부터 “전혀 그렇지 않다” 5점으로 구성된다.
data.mt_sentence: The tool is a six-point scale of 33 questions, consisting of "very much so" 0 to "not at all".
data.target_sentence: The tool is a 6-point scale with 33 items ranging from “strongly agree” to “not at all”.

data.source_sentence: 총점은 165점으로 점수가 높을수록 출산 시 경험한 두려움이 더 강하다는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The total score is 165 points, which means that the higher the score, the stronger the fear experienced during childbirth.
data.target_sentence: The total score is 165, and the higher the score, the stronger the fear of childbirth.

data.source_sentence: 절단점은 85점 이상으로, 분만 두려움의 정도를 두려움과 극심한 두려움으로 보았다.
data.mt_sentence: The cut-off point was 85 or higher, and the degree of fear of delivery was considered as fear and extreme fear.
data.target_sentence: The threshold was 85 points or higher, and the degree of fear of childbirth was regarded as fear and extreme fear.

data.source_sentence: 배우자 지지는 배우자가 산후 관리와 아기 돌봄을 통해 산모를 지지한 정도를 측정하는 도구를 이용하여 산후 1개월 시점에 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Spouse support was measured at one month after childbirth using a tool to measure the degree to which the spouse supported the mother through postpartum care and baby care.
data.target_sentence: Spousal support ratio was measured one month after childbirth using a tool that measures the degree to which spouses support their mother through postpartum care and childcare.

data.source_sentence: 총점은 13–52점으로 점수가 높을수록 배우자 지지가 높음을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The total score is 13–52, which means that the higher the score, the higher the spouse support.
data.target_sentence: The total score ranges from 13 to 52, with a higher score indicating a higher level of support from the spouse.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 대전 지역에 소재한 2개의 여성 전 문병원의 병원장과 간호부장에게 연구의 목적과 방법을 설명하고 연구 진행에 대한 허락을 받았다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the purpose and method of the study were explained to the hospital director and the head of nursing at two women's hospitals located in Daejeon, and permission was obtained for the study.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the purpose and method of the study were explained to the director and the head of the nursing department of two women's hospitals in Daejeon, and permission was obtained.

data.source_sentence: 연구자는 연구 모집 공고문을 병원 외래에 게시하였고, 공고문을 보고 자율적으로 참여를 원하는 임부들을 대상으로 연구의 필요성 및 목적을 설명하고 연구 참여를 원하는 임부에게 연구 참여에 대한 서면 동의를 얻었다.
data.mt_sentence: The researcher posted the research recruitment notice on the outpatient clinic, explained the necessity and purpose of the study to pregnant women who wanted to participate autonomously after seeing the notice, and obtained written consent from the pregnant women who wanted to participate in the study.
data.target_sentence: The researcher posted the research recruitment notice at the outpatient clinic, explained the need and purpose of the study to pregnant women who saw the announcement and wanted to participate voluntarily, and obtained written consent from pregnant women who wanted to participate in the study.

data.source_sentence: 연구에 자발적 참여와 중도 탈락의 자유를 소개하고 사생활 보호 및 비밀 유지에 대해 설명하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Voluntary participation in the study and freedom of dropout were introduced, and privacy protection and confidentiality were explained.
data.target_sentence: Voluntary participation in research and freedom of dropout were introduced, and privacy protection and confidentiality were explained.

data.source_sentence: 연구 참여에 동의한 임부들은 산전 관련 요인 및 일반적 특성 설문지를 작성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Pregnant women who agreed to participate in the study filled out a questionnaire on prenatal-related factors and general characteristics.
data.target_sentence: Pregnant women who consented to participate in the study completed questionnaires about prenatal-related factors and general characteristics.

data.source_sentence: 연구자는 대상자의 추적 조사용 전화번호를 통해 산후 조사 시점을 문자로 알릴 것을 사전에 설명하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The researcher explained in advance that the timing of the postpartum investigation should be notified by text through the subject's phone number for follow-up investigation.
data.target_sentence: The researcher explained in advance that the time of postpartum care should be notified by text message to the subject's phone number for the post-partum investigation.

data.source_sentence: 출산 후 발송한 문자에 응답한 산모에게는 산후 조사를 위한 온라인 설문 조사 링크를 발송하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A link to an online survey for postpartum survey was sent to the mothers who responded to the text message sent after childbirth.
data.target_sentence: An online survey link for postpartum survey was sent to mothers who responded to text messages sent to postpartum care centers.

data.source_sentence: 산후 1주에는 산모의 산과적 특성과 출산 시 경험한 두려움을 측정하고 산후 1개월에는 산후 우울, 산후 PTSD, 배우자 지지를 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Maternal obstetric characteristics and fear experienced during childbirth were measured at 1 week postpartum, and postpartum depression, postpartum PTSD, and spousal support were measured at 1 month postpartum.
data.target_sentence: Maternal obstetric characteristics and fear experienced during childbirth were measured at 1 week postpartum, and postpartum depression, postpartum post-traumatic stress disorder, and spousal support were measured at 1 month postpartum.

data.source_sentence: 설문에 소요된 시간은 측정 시점마다 평균 10–15분 내외였다.
data.mt_sentence: The time taken for the questionnaire was, on average, around 10–15 minutes at each measurement point.
data.target_sentence: The average time required for the questionnaire was about 10 to 15 minutes at each measurement point.

data.source_sentence: 설문지 작성을 완료한 대상자에게 소정의 답례품을 조사 시점별로 제공하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A predetermined gift in return was provided to the subjects who completed the questionnaire at each time of the survey.
data.target_sentence: For each survey, a predetermined gift in return was provided to the subjects who completed the survey.

data.source_sentence: 출산 시 경험한 두려움, 산후 우울과 산후 PTSD 발생률의 관계는 카이제곱검정(Fisher exact test)로 분석하였고, 출산 시 경험한 두려움, 배우자 지지, 산후 우울, 산후 PTSD의 관련성은 상관관계 분석을 통해 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The relationship between fear experienced during childbirth, postpartum depression, and the incidence of postpartum PTSD was analyzed using the Fisher exact test, and the relationship between fear experienced during childbirth, spousal support, postpartum depression, and postpartum PTSD was analyzed through correlation analysis. did.
data.target_sentence: The relationship between the fear experienced during childbirth, postpartum depression, and the incidence of postpartum PTSD was analyzed using a chi-square test (Fisher exact test). The relationship between fear experienced during childbirth, spouse support, postpartum depression, and postpartum PTSD was analyzed through correlation analysis.

data.source_sentence: 산과적 특성으로 첫 출산을 경험한 산모는 68명(41.1%), 계획 임신을 한 산모는 56명(33.7%)이고, 질 분만을 한 산모는 131명(78.9%)이었다.
data.mt_sentence: There were 68 mothers (41.1%) who experienced their first childbirth due to obstetric characteristics, 56 mothers (33.7%) who had planned pregnancy, and 131 mothers (78.9%) who had vaginal delivery.
data.target_sentence: Due to obstetric characteristics, 68 mothers (41.1%) experienced first childbirth, 56 women (33.7%) with planned pregnancy, and 131 mothers (78.9%) who gave birth naturally.

data.source_sentence: 산후 PTSD는 56점 만점에 평균 8.95점(SD, 6.49점)을 보여 낮은 수준을 보였고, 임상적으로 유의한 PTSD 증상을 보인 위험군은 절단점 19점 이상을 기준으로 평가할 때 3명(1.8%)으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Postpartum PTSD showed a low level with an average of 8.95 points (SD, 6.49 points) out of 56, and the risk group with clinically significant PTSD symptoms was 3 (1.8%) when evaluated based on 19 or higher amputation points.
data.target_sentence: Postpartum PTSD showed a low level with an average of 8.95 points (SD, 6.49 points) out of 56 points. The risk group with clinically significant PTSD symptoms was 3 (1.8%) when evaluated based on the cutoff point of 19 points or more.

data.source_sentence: 출산 시 경험한 두려움은 165점 만점에 평균 65.28점(SD, 16.03점)으로 보통 수준을 보였고, 절단점 85점을 기준으로 평가할 때 심각한 수준의 두려움은 22명(13.2%)에서 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The fear experienced at childbirth averaged 65.28 points (SD, 16.03 points) out of 165 points, and the serious level of fear was found in 22 people (13.2%) when evaluated based on 85 points of amputation.
data.target_sentence: The average fear experienced during childbirth was 65.28 points (SD, 16.03 points) out of 165 points, and as a result of evaluation based on 85 points of amputation, the level of serious fear was 22 (13.2%).

data.source_sentence: 대상자의 특성 중에서 계획 임신 여부는 산후 우울(t = – 2.78, p = .008)에 유의한 차이를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the characteristics of the subjects, planned pregnancy showed a significant difference in postpartum depression (t = – 2.78, p = .008).
data.target_sentence: Among the characteristics of the subjects, planned pregnancy showed a significant difference in postpartum depression (t = – 2.78, p = .008).

data.source_sentence: 즉 임신을 계획하지 않은 산모는 임신을 계획한 산모에 비해 산후 우울 점수가 유의하게 높게 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: That is, mothers who did not plan to become pregnant had significantly higher postpartum depression scores than mothers who planned to become pregnant.
data.target_sentence: That is, mothers who did not plan to conceive had significantly higher scores for postpartum depression than those who planned.

data.source_sentence: 심각한 출산 두려움을 경험한 여성의 59.1%가 산후 우울군에 속한 반면, 중등도 이하의 두려움을 경험한 여성의 25.7%가 산후 우울 군에 속하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 59.1% of the women who experienced severe fear of childbirth belonged to the postpartum depression group, whereas 25.7% of the women who experienced less than moderate fear belonged to the postpartum depression group.
data.target_sentence: 59.1% of women who experienced severe fear of childbirth belonged to the postpartum depression group, and 25.7% of women who experienced moderate to moderate fear belonged to the postpartum depression group.

data.source_sentence: 심각한 출산 두려움을 경험한 여성 중 9.1%가 산후 PTSD를 경험한 반면, 중등도 이하의 두려움이 있는 경우에는 0.7%의 여성이 산후 PTSD를 경험하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among women who experienced severe fear of childbirth, 9.1% experienced postpartum PTSD, while 0.7% of women with less than moderate fear experienced postpartum PTSD.
data.target_sentence: Among women who experienced severe fear of childbirth, 9.1% experienced postpartum PTSD, while 0.7% of women with submoderate fear experienced postpartum PTSD.

data.source_sentence: 검정 결과 심각한 출산 두려움과 산후 PTSD는 유의한 관련성을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the test, there was a significant association between severe childbirth fear and postpartum PTSD.
data.target_sentence: The test found a significant association between severe childbirth fear and postpartum post-traumatic stress disorder.

data.source_sentence: 산후 우울 위험군 50명(30.1%) 중에서 산후 PTSD 위험군에 속하는 여성은 3명(6.0%)으로 나타난 반면, 산후 우울이 없는 산모에서는 산후 PTSD가 한 건도 발생하지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the 50 (30.1%) postpartum depression risk group, 3 women (6.0%) were in the postpartum PTSD risk group, whereas no postpartum PTSD occurred in mothers without postpartum depression.
data.target_sentence: Of the 50 (30.1%) risk groups for postpartum depression, 3 (6.0%) were at risk for postpartum PTSD, but mothers without postpartum depression did not develop postpartum PTSD.

data.source_sentence: 검정 결과 산후 우울과 산후 PTSD 간 유의한 관련성을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the test, a significant association between postpartum depression and postpartum PTSD was confirmed.
data.target_sentence: As a result, a significant association was confirmed between postpartum depression and postpartum post-traumatic stress disorder.

data.source_sentence: 회귀식의 가정(정규성, 선형성 다중공선성)과 잔차 진단(잔차의 정규성, 오차의 독립성, 등분산성)을 통해 자료의 적합도를 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The suitability of the data was confirmed through the assumption of the regression equation (normality, linearity multicollinearity) and residual diagnosis (normality of residuals, independence of errors, and equal variance).
data.target_sentence: The suitability of the data was confirmed by assuming the regression formula (normality, linearity multicollinearity) and residual diagnosis (normality of residuals, independence of errors, and equal variance).

data.source_sentence: 독립변수의 다중 공선성은 공차 한계와 분산팽창계수로 확인한 결과, 공차 한계값은 0.77–0.99, 분산팽창계수값은 1.00–1.29의 범위에 있어 다중공선성의 문제가 없는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of checking the multicollinearity of the independent variable with the tolerance limit and the variance expansion coefficient, there was no problem with multicollinearity in the range of 0.77–0.99 and the variance expansion coefficient of 1.00–1.29.
data.target_sentence: As a result of confirming the multicollinearity of the independent variable with the tolerance limit and variance magnification coefficient, there was no problem with multicollinearity in the variance magnification coefficient 0.77-0.99 and the variance expansion coefficient 1.00-1.29.

data.source_sentence: 산후 1개월째인 산모의 산후 우울 발생률(절단점 10점 기준)은 30.1%로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The incidence of postpartum depression (based on 10 cutoff points) of mothers who were one month after childbirth was 30.1%.
data.target_sentence: Postpartum depression (based on 10 points) was 30.1% of mothers who were one month after childbirth.

data.source_sentence: 이는 동일 도구와 절단점으로 평가한 종단적 연구에서 보고한 산후 2주째(32.0%)와 6주째(23.6%) , 산후 6주째인 초산모의 유병률(14.6%) 과 비교 시 높은 비율이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is a high ratio compared to the prevalence rate (14.6%) of first-time mothers in the 2nd week of postpartum (32.0%), 6th week (23.6%), and 6th week of postpartum in longitudinal studies evaluated by the same tool and cutting point.
data.target_sentence: This is a high rate compared to the prevalence of primiparous mothers at 6 weeks postpartum (14.6%), 2nd week (32.0%) and 6th week (23.6%), reported in a longitudinal study using the same tool and cut-off point.

data.source_sentence: 국외 연구의 메타 분석에서 산후 1–6주 산모에게 동일 도구의 절단점 13점으로 평가한 유병률(9.3%–18.5%)보다 높다.
data.mt_sentence: In a meta-analysis of an overseas study, the prevalence rate (9.3%–18.5%) was higher than the prevalence rate (9.3%–18.5%), which was evaluated as a cut-off point of 13 points for mothers 1–6 weeks postpartum.
data.target_sentence: In a meta-analysis of foreign studies, it is higher than the prevalence (9.3%–18.5%) evaluated by the cut-off point of 13 points of the same tool in mothers 1–6 weeks postpartum.

data.source_sentence: 이는 산후 4–6주에 건강한 만삭아를 키우는 산모가 보고한 점수(9.10) 와 비교 시 약간 낮은 편이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is slightly lower than the score reported by mothers of healthy full-term infants at 4–6 weeks postpartum (9.10).
data.target_sentence: This is slightly lower than the score reported by mothers of healthy full-term infants at 4-6 weeks postpartum (9.10).

data.source_sentence: 산모의 1.8%는 임상적으로 의미 있는 PTSD군으로 분류되었다.
data.mt_sentence: 1.8% of mothers were classified as clinically significant PTSD group.
data.target_sentence: 1.8% of mothers were classified as clinically significant PTSD group.

data.source_sentence: 이는 건강한 만삭아를 출산한 지 1개월째 된 우리나라 산모에서의 발생률(7.5%) 과 비교 시 낮은 비율이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is a low rate compared to the incidence rate (7.5%) in Korean mothers who are one month after giving birth to a healthy full-term baby.
data.target_sentence: This is lower than the incidence rate (7.5%) of Korean mothers who have been one month after giving birth to a healthy full-term baby.

data.source_sentence: 국외 연구에서 출산 관련 PTSD 발생률은 메타 분석 결과 3.1% , 산후 2개월째 독일인 산모에서 2.3% , 산후 6–8주째 중국인 산모에서 6.1%로 각기 다르게 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: According to a meta-analysis, the incidence of childbirth-related PTSD in an overseas study was different: 3.1% in German mothers at 2 months postpartum, 2.3% in German mothers, and 6.1% in Chinese mothers at 6–8 weeks postpartum.
data.target_sentence: A meta-analysis found that the incidence of childbirth-related PTSD in overseas studies differed as follows: 3.1% of German mothers at 2 months postpartum, 2.3% of German mothers, and 6.1% of Chinese mothers at 6-8 weeks postpartum.

data.source_sentence: 그 이유는 산후 PTSD 측정 시점이 연구마다 다른 것과, 인종•지역 및 사회 문화적 특성에 따라 출산 환경에 차이가 있기 때문으로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason seems to be that the timing of postpartum PTSD measurement varies from study to study, and there are differences in the childbirth environment according to race, region, and socio-cultural characteristics.
data.target_sentence: The reason seems to be that the timing of postpartum PTSD measurement differs for each study, and the birth environment also differs according to race, region, and socio-cultural characteristics.

data.source_sentence: 산후 우울군과 산후 PTSD군에 모두 속하는 여성은 6.0%로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The number of women belonging to both the postpartum depression group and the postpartum PTSD group was 6.0%.
data.target_sentence: The number of women belonging to both postpartum depression and postpartum traumatic stress disorder group was 6.0%.

data.source_sentence: 이는 미국인 산모에서 산후 우울과 산후 PTSD가 동반된 비율(15.7%) 과 비교 시 낮은 수준이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is low compared to the proportion of American mothers with postpartum depression and postpartum PTSD (15.7%).
data.target_sentence: This is low compared to the proportion of American mothers with postpartum depression and postpartum PTSD (15.7%).

data.source_sentence: 이는 산모의 정신 건강을 사정할 때 출산 시 경험한 두려움을 산후 우울과 산후 PTSD와 더불어 평가하는 것이 중요함을 시사한다.
data.mt_sentence: This suggests that it is important to evaluate the fear experienced during childbirth along with postpartum depression and postpartum PTSD when assessing maternal mental health.
data.target_sentence: This suggests that it is important to evaluate the fears experienced during childbirth along with postpartum depression and postpartum post-traumatic stress disorder when assessing maternal mental health.

data.source_sentence: 배우자의 지지와 산후 우울의 부적 상관은 배우자의 지지가 높을 때 산후 우울에 보호 효과가 있다는 연구와 일치하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The negative correlation between spousal support and postpartum depression was consistent with studies showing that high spousal support had a protective effect on postpartum depression.
data.target_sentence: The negative correlation between spousal support and postpartum depression was consistent with studies showing that high spousal support had a protective effect on postpartum depression.

data.source_sentence: 반면 산후 PTSD에는 배우자 지지와의 상관성이나 영향력이 없어, 배우자의 지지 감소가 산후 스트레스와 우울증을 증가시켜 산후 PTSD와 같은 정신 장애로 발전할 수 있다는 연구와 약간 차이가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, postpartum PTSD has no correlation or influence with spousal support, which is slightly different from studies suggesting that decreased spousal support may increase postpartum stress and depression, leading to mental disorders such as postpartum PTSD.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, postpartum PTSD has no correlation or effect with spousal support, which is slightly different from research showing that decreased spousal support may increase postpartum stress and depression, leading to psychiatric disorders such as postpartum PTSD.

data.source_sentence: 산후 사회적 지지의 구조나 기능 측면을 모두 측정하여 산후 PTSD와의 관련성을 추가로 탐색할 필요가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is necessary to further explore the relationship with postpartum PTSD by measuring both structural and functional aspects of postpartum social support.
data.target_sentence: There is a need to further explore the relationship with postpartum PTSD by measuring both structural and functional aspects of postpartum social support.

data.source_sentence: 이는 제왕 절개 분만 여부가 산후 PTSD와 관련이 없다는 연구와 유사하다.
data.mt_sentence: This is similar to a study that showed that cesarean delivery was not associated with postpartum PTSD.
data.target_sentence: This is similar to a study that showed that cesarean section was not associated with postpartum PTSD.

data.source_sentence: 반면 계획하지 않은 응급 제왕 절개 분만이 산후 PTSD 발생률을 높이는 데 영향을 미친 연구와는 다른 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, this is a different result from a study in which unplanned emergency cesarean delivery had an effect on the increased incidence of postpartum PTSD.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, this is a different result from the study that unplanned emergency cesarean section affects the increase in the incidence of postpartum post-traumatic stress disorder.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 분만 유형 자료를 질 분만 또는 제왕 절개 분만으로만 수집하였기에, 제왕 절개 분만 중 예상치 못한 응급 제왕 절개 분만 시행 여부에 대한 자료를 수집하지 못하여 이를 반영할 수 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, data on delivery type data were collected only for vaginal delivery or cesarean section, so data on whether an unexpected emergency cesarean section was performed during cesarean section could not be collected and this could not be reflected.
data.target_sentence: In this study, data on whether an unexpected emergency caesarean section was performed during cesarean section could not be collected and this could not be reflected because delivery type data were collected only for vaginal delivery or cesarean section.

data.source_sentence: 추후 연구에서 분만 유형별 세부 정보를 수집하여 그 관련성을 재탐구할 필요가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In future studies, it is necessary to collect detailed information for each type of delivery and re-explore its relevance.
data.target_sentence: Future studies will need to gather details for each delivery type and re-explore their relevance.

data.source_sentence: 계획하지 않은 임신을 한 여성은 계획 임신을 한 경우에 비해 산후 우울 점수가 유의하게 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: Women with unplanned pregnancies had significantly higher postpartum depression scores than those with planned pregnancies.
data.target_sentence: Women with unplanned pregnancies had significantly higher postpartum depression scores than women with planned pregnancies.

data.source_sentence: 계획하지 않은 임신을 산전 우울과 산후 우울 모두에 유의한 영향 요인으로 보고한 선행 연구와 일치한다.
data.mt_sentence: This is consistent with previous studies that reported unplanned pregnancy as a significant influencing factor for both prenatal and postpartum depression.
data.target_sentence: This is consistent with previous studies reporting unplanned pregnancies as a significant influencing factor for both prenatal and postpartum depression.

data.source_sentence: 이는 산모 간호 시 계획 임신 여부를 주요 변수로 사정하고, 계획하지 않은 임신을 한 산모에게 보다 세심한 관찰과 중재가 필요함을 시사한다.
data.mt_sentence: This suggests that more careful observation and intervention are needed for mothers who have unplanned pregnancies, and whether or not planned pregnancy is considered a major variable when nursing a mother.
data.target_sentence: This suggests that more careful observation and intervention in mothers with unplanned pregnancies is needed, and whether planned pregnancy is considered as a major variable in lactation.

data.source_sentence: 반면 다중회귀분석에서는 계획하지 않은 임신이 산후 PTSD에 미치는 영향력이 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, in multiple regression analysis, there was no effect of unplanned pregnancy on postpartum PTSD.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, in multiple regression analysis, there was no effect of unplanned pregnancy on postpartum post-traumatic stress disorder.

data.source_sentence: 그 이유는 임신과 출산을 거치는 동안 계획하지 않은 임신보다는 출산 경험과 산후 우울 상태와 같은 최근의 감정 상태가 산후 PTSD에 더 강한 영향을 보이기 때문이라 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason is thought to be that postpartum PTSD is more strongly influenced by the experience of childbirth and recent emotional states such as postpartum depression rather than unplanned pregnancies during pregnancy and childbirth.
data.target_sentence: The reason is thought to be that postpartum PTSD is more strongly influenced by childbirth experiences and recent emotional states such as postpartum depression than during pregnancy and unplanned pregnancies during childbirth.

data.source_sentence: 산후 PTSD는 산후 우울과 높은 상관을 보였고, 회귀 분석에서 산후 우울이 산후 PTSD를 설명하는 강력한 영향 요인으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Postpartum PTSD was highly correlated with postpartum depression, and regression analysis showed that postpartum depression was a strong influencing factor explaining postpartum PTSD.
data.target_sentence: Postpartum PTSD was highly correlated with postpartum depression, and regression analysis showed that postpartum depression was a strong influencing factor explaining postpartum depression.

data.source_sentence: 이 결과는 산후 PTSD와 우울 모두 부정적인 기분 상태를 포함하기에 산후 PTSD의 증상을 산후 우울로 쉽게 오인할 수 있다는 선행 연구 결과를 지지하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: These results support the results of previous studies that postpartum PTSD and depression both include negative mood states, so symptoms of postpartum PTSD can be easily mistaken for postpartum depression.
data.target_sentence: These results support the findings of previous studies that the symptoms of postpartum PTSD can be easily mistaken for postpartum depression, as both postpartum PTSD and depression include negative mood states.

data.source_sentence: 간호사는 산후 우울과 산후 PTSD 위험군을 조기 발견하여 이들을 정확한 진단 및 치료 단계로 연계할 수 있어야 할 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Nurses should be able to detect postpartum depression and postpartum PTSD risk groups early and link them to an accurate diagnosis and treatment stage.
data.target_sentence: Nurses must be able to identify risk groups for postpartum depression and postpartum PTSD at an early stage so that they can be linked to the correct diagnosis and treatment steps.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 한 지역에서 편의 표집한 건강한 아기를 출산한 산모를 대상자로 하였기에, PTSD 발생률을 해석할 때 주의를 기울여야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Because this study was conducted on mothers who gave birth to healthy babies, which were sampled in one region, caution should be taken when interpreting the incidence of PTSD.
data.target_sentence: In this study, caution is needed in interpreting the incidence of PTSD because the sample was drawn from a region targeting mothers who gave birth to healthy babies.

data.source_sentence: 추후 더 큰 표본 수를 확보하여 임신에서 산후까지 관련 요인을 고려하면서 산후 우울과 PTSD 관계를 확인하는 반복 연구가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In the future, repeated studies are needed to confirm the relationship between postpartum depression and PTSD while considering related factors from pregnancy to postpartum by securing a larger sample size.

data.source_sentence: 결론적으로 본 연구에 참여한 산모의 30.1%가 산후 우울을, 산모의 1.8%가 산후 PTSD를 나타냈고, 산후 PTSD의 유의한 영향 요인은 산후 우울로 확인되었다.

data.target_sentence: In conclusion, 30.1% of mothers participating in this study had postpartum depression, 1.8% of mothers had postpartum PTSD, and it was confirmed that postpartum depression was a significant influencing factor of postpartum PTSD.

data.source_sentence: 현재까지는 전기 영동 검사의 정량 방법은 물론 결과 판독에 대한 통일적이고 표준화된 지침이 없어 판독자 혹은 검사실 간 차이가 존재한다.

data.source_sentence: 해당 검사들을 원내 검사실에 서 직접 시행하기 보다는 전문 수탁 검사 기관 등에 위탁하는 경우가 많아 일선 병원에서는 전기 영동 검사에 대한 관심도가 낮은 편이다.

data.target_sentence: There is little interest in electrophoretic testing in front-line hospitals because most of the cases are entrusted to a specialized testing agency rather than being tested directly in a hospital laboratory.

data.source_sentence: 이에 본 연구에는 혈청단백 전기 영동 및 면역고정 전기 영동 검사에 대해 외부 정도 관리를 시행함으로써 앞으로의 국내의 외부 정도 관리 사업 수립을 위한 기초 자료로 활용하는 것을 목표로 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, in this study, external quality control was conducted for serum protein electrophoresis and immunofixation electrophoresis, and the purpose of this study was to use it as basic data for establishing external quality control projects in Korea.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, in this study, external quality control was performed for serum protein electrophoresis and immunofixation electrophoresis, and it was intended to be used as basic data for establishing domestic and external quality control projects.

data.source_sentence: 저자들은 이전의 연구에서 국내 29개 병원의 임상화학분과 담당자들을 대상으로 설문 조사를 시행한 바가 있다.

data.source_sentence: 설문 조사 참여 병원들을 대상으로 외부 정도 관리 참여 여부를 문의하였고, 이 중 자발적으로 희망하는 기관에 한해 외부 정도 관리를 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The hospitals participating in the survey were asked whether to participate in external quality management, and among them, external quality management was conducted only for the desired institutions.

data.source_sentence: BBB병원 진단검사의학과에서 통상적인 혈청 전기 영동 검사를 시행하고 남은 잔여 검체 20개 대해 검체량 및 이들의 전기 영동 패턴이나 단클론성 단백(monoclonal protein)의 유무에 따라 분류하여 검체를 혼합(pooling)하여 총 5개의 시험용 정도 관리 물질을 제조하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A total of five test substance were prepared by performing a typical serum electrophoresis test at BBB Hospital and classifying the remaining 20 samples according to the amount of samples and the presence or absence of their electrophoresis patterns or monoclonal protein was pooled.
data.target_sentence: A total of 5 test substances were prepared by performing a general serum electrophoresis test at the BBB hospital, and the remaining 20 samples were classified according to the amount of samples, and the presence or absence of electrophoretic patterns or monoclonal proteins was pooled.

data.source_sentence: 제조된 검체는 각각 12개씩 소분(ali-quot)하여 1.5 mL 마이크로튜브(microtube)에 담았으며, -70˚C 냉동 보관하였다가 같은 날 동시에 국내 12개 참여 병원에 택배 발송하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The prepared samples were divided into 12 ali-quotions and placed in a 1.5 mL micro tube, frozen at -70°C, and delivered to 12 participating hospitals at the same time on the same day.
data.target_sentence: The prepared sample was divided into 12 aliquots, placed in 1.5mL microtubes, frozen at -70°C, and delivered simultaneously to 12 participating hospitals on the same day.

data.source_sentence: 택배는 스티로폼 박스 내에 아이스팩과 완충재를 이용하여 냉장 발송하였으며, 모든 기관에서 발송 익일에 수령하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The parcel was shipped refrigerated using ice packs and cushioning materials in a Styrofoam box, and all institutions received it the next day after shipment.
data.target_sentence: Parcels were delivered refrigerated using ice packs and cushioning materials in a Styrofoam box, and all institutions received them the next day.

data.source_sentence: 이후 각 병원에서의 혈청 단백 전기 영동 및 면역 고정 전기 영동 검사의 판독 보고서 및 정량값 결과를 취합하여 분석하였다.

data.source_sentence: 본 외부 정도 관리에 사용된 5개의 검체 중 2개(1번 및 4번 검체)에서 단클론성 단백이 검출되었고, 12개 참가 기관 모두에서 위 결과는 일치하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Monoclonal protein was detected in 2 out of 5 samples used for this external quality control (samples 1 and 4), and the above results were consistent in all 12 participating institutions.

data.mt_sentence: The values of total protein and albumin were generally similar, and when viewed as a whole in the alpha and beta-gamma regions (re-gion), the coefficient of variation for each organ was generally less than 10% of the second.

data.source_sentence: 이에 추가적으로 저자들은 단클론성 단백의 정량 값의 분포를 정량 방법 별로 나누어 제시하였고, 이를 스튜던트T 검정 방법으로 비교하였다.

data.target_sentence: In addition, the authors presented the quantitative value distribution of monoclonal protein as a quantitative method and compared it with the Student T test method.

data.source_sentence: 정량 방법에 대해 본 연구에 참가한 12개 기관 중 표준수직작도법(standard perpen-dicular drop method)을 사용한 기관은 6기관(50.0%), 교정수직작도법(corrected perpendicular drop method)은 4기관(33.3%), 접선절삭법(tangent skimming method)은 2기관(16.7%)이었다.

data.source_sentence: 1번 검체에 대해 표준수직작도법과 교정수직작도법의 경우가 접선절삭법보다 정량값이 컸으나 두 경우 모두 통계적으로 유의하지는 않았다.

data.source_sentence: 4번 검체에 대해서는 표준수직작도법이 교정수직작도법(P = 0.042)과 접선절삭법(P = 0.017)보다 정량값이 유의하게 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: For sample No. 4, the quantitative value of the standard vertical drawing method was significantly higher than that of the calibrated vertical drawing method (P = 0.042) and the tangent cutting method (P = 0.017).

data.source_sentence: 교정수직작도법의 경우는 두 개의 검체 모두에서 접선절삭법보다 정량값이 유의미하게 높지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of the calibration vertical drawing method, the quantitative value was not significantly higher than that of the tangential cutting method in both samples.
