data.source_sentence: 이렇듯 혈청 단백 전기 영동과 면역 고정 전기 영동 검사에 대해 아직까지 기관별로 정량 방식이나 보고 방식에 차이를 보이고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, with respect to serum protein electrophoresis and immunofixation electrophoresis, there are still differences in quantitative methods and reporting methods for each institution.

data.source_sentence: 아직까지 전기 영동 검사 보고에 대한 확정된 표준 지침은 없는 실정이다.

data.target_sentence: There are still no clear standard guidelines for electrophoretic inspection reports.

data.source_sentence: 5개 외부 정도 관리 검체에 대해 참가한 모든 검사실에서 단클론성 단백 여부는 잘 검출하였으나 정량값에 있어서는 차이가 컸다.

data.source_sentence: 단클론성 단백이 없는 검체에서의 패턴에 대한 판독 문구(comment)에서도 일부 차이가 존재하였다.

data.source_sentence: 저자들의 지난 설문 조사 연구에서 모든 응답 기관에서 다클론성 감마병증을, 79.3%의 기관에서 저감마글로불린혈증 여부를 보고한다고 응답하였으나, 이번 외부 정도 관리 연구에서는 그 보고 비율이 각각 83.3%과 58.3%로 낮았다.

However, when divided in detail (alpha-1, alpha-2, beta-1, beta-2, gamma, etc.), the difference was significant.

data.source_sentence: 클론성 단백에 대한 정량값은 기관별로 차이를 보였는데, 특히 정량 방법에 따라 분석하였을 때에 그 차이가 더욱 유의미하게 나타났다.

data.source_sentence: 클론성 단백이 검출된 1번과 4번 샘플에 있어서 두 경우 모두 표준수직작도법과 교정수직작도법의 경우가 접선절삭법의 경우보다 정량값이 더욱 큰 것을 볼 수 있었다.

data.target_sentence: Samples 1 and 4, in which clonal proteins were detected, showed that the standard vertical stretching method and the corrected vertical stretching method had higher quantitative values than the tangential cutting method in both cases.

data.source_sentence: 이는 표준수직작도법 자체가 해당 영역의 기저 다클론성 영역(baseline polyclonalregion)을 포함한 전체 단클론성 단백 검출 영역을 정량하기 때문인데, 이로 인해 실제 단클론성 단백의 값보다 과다 정량(overesti-mated)될 우려가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This is because the standard vertical drawing method itself quantifies the entire monoclonal protein detection area including the baseline polyclonal region of the area, which may be overquoted than the actual monoclonal protein value.
data.target_sentence: This is because the standard vertical drawing method itself quantifies the total monoclonal protein detection area, including the baseline polyclonal region of that region, which may overestimate the actual monoclonal protein value.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 점을 보완하기 위해 기저 다클론성 영역의 너비를 고려하여 검사자가 임의적으로 실제 보이는 영역보다 약간 좁게 정량하는 교정수직작도법을 사용할 수 있으나 정확성의 문제가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: To compensate for this, the calibration vertical drawing method, in which the tester arbitrarily quantifies slightly narrower than the actual visible area in consideration of the width of the underlying polyclonal area, can be used, but there is a problem of accuracy.
data.target_sentence: To compensate for this, a calibration vertical drawing method in which the tester arbitrarily quantifies slightly narrower than the actual visible area by considering the width of the underlying polyclonal area, but has a problem with accuracy.

data.source_sentence: 접선절삭법의 경우 기저 다클론성 영역에 대한 접선을 그어 그 위쪽 부분만을 정량하는 방법이지만 오히려 이는 실제 값보다 과소 정량(underestimated)될 우려가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of the tangential cutting method, only the upper part is quantified by drawing a tangent line to the basal polyclonal region, but there is a risk of underestimated than the actual value.
data.target_sentence: In the case of tangential cutting, only the upper part is quantified by drawing a tangent line to the basal polyclonal region, but there is a risk of underestimating the actual value.

data.source_sentence: 이렇듯 과다 정량의 우려에도 불구하고 단클론성 단백의 정량에 대해 표준수직작도법을 가장 많이 사용하는 것으로 나타났으며, 호주-뉴질랜드의 권고안 또한 이를 지지하고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 본 증례는 동종 조혈모세포이식 전에 동정된 항-e 항체 및 동반 가능성 있는 항-C 항체를 고려하여 이들과 반응할 해당 항원이 없는 혈액을 선별하여 수혈을 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, in consideration of the anti-e antibody identified before allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation and the possible companion anti-C antibody, blood without the corresponding antigen to react with them was selected and transfused.
data.target_sentence: At this time, in consideration of the anti-e-antibody identified before allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation and the anti-C antibody capable of accompanying antibody, blood without the corresponding antigen was selected and transfused.

data.source_sentence: 반면, 이식후 항-E 및 -c 항체가 발견된 이후부터는 이들 항원 음성 혈액을 선별하여 수혈하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, since anti-E and -c antibodies were discovered after transplantation, these antigen-negative bloods were selected for transfusion.

data.source_sentence: ABO 불일치 조혈모세포이식 후 적혈구 비예기항체는 드물게 생성된다.
data.mt_sentence: After ABO inconsistent hematopoietic stem cell transplantation, red blood cell non-predatory antibodies are rarely produced.
data.target_sentence: After ABO-mismatched hematopoietic stem cell transplantation, erythrocyte nonphagocytic antibodies are rarely produced.

data.source_sentence: 이들 항체를 생성한 면역 세포의 기원을 설명한 연구는 그간 국내에서는 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: There have been no studies in Korea that explain the origin of the immune cells that produced these antibodies.

data.source_sentence: 저자들은 이식 전 항-e 항체가 동정된 41세 재생불량빈혈 환자에서 ABO 양방향 부적합 동종조혈모세포이식 후 기존 항체는 사라지고, 이식 후 20개월이 지나 항-E 및 항-c 항체가 새롭게 발견되어 보고한다.
data.mt_sentence: The authors reported that, in a 41-year-old aplastic anemia patient with anti-e antibody identified before transplantation, the existing antibody disappeared after ABO bidirectional incompatible allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation, and anti-E and anti-c antibodies were newly discovered 20 months after transplantation. do.

And, 20 months after transplantation, anti-E and anti-c antibodies are newly discovered and reported.

data.source_sentence: 동종 조혈모세포이식후 생성된 항체는 이식 후 성숙된 기증자 B 림프구에서 기원한 것으로 추정된다.

data.target_sentence: Antibodies produced after homologous hematopoietic stem cell transplantation are presumed to originate from donor B lymphocytes that have matured after transplantation.

data.source_sentence: 본 증례를 통해 이식 전후 비예기항체의 모니터링이 중요함을 알 수 있다.

data.target_sentence: Through this, it can be seen that monitoring before and after non-prophylactic antibody transplantation is important.

data.source_sentence: 국내 혈액암 발생률은 2019년을 기준으로 2009년 대비 56.2%로 크게 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The incidence of blood cancer in Korea increased significantly to 56.2% in 2019 compared to 2009.
data.target_sentence: The incidence of blood cancer in Korea increased significantly to 56.2% in 2019 compared to 2009.

data.source_sentence: 한편, 최근 신약 개발 및 치료법의 향상으로 혈액암 환자의 5년 상대 생존율은 지속적으로 증가하여 백혈병의 경우 53.4%, 악성 림프종의 경우 비호지킨 림프종은 64.0%, 호지킨 림프종은 84.5%로 보고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Meanwhile, due to the recent development of new drugs and improvement in treatment, the 5-year relative survival rate of blood cancer patients continues to increase, with 53.4% for leukemia, 64.0% for non-Hodgkin lymphoma, and 84.5% for malignant lymphoma.
data.target_sentence: Meanwhile, with the recent development of new drugs and improvements in treatment, the 5-year relative survival rate of hematologic cancer patients continues to increase to 53.4% for leukemia, 64.0% for non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, and 84.5% for malignant lymphoma.

data.source_sentence: 이에 항암 화학 요법을 받는 혈액암 환자의 삶의 질을 향상시키기 위한 전략이 필요하며 전략 개발의 근거 마련을 위하여 삶의 질에 영향을 미치는 주요 요인에 대한 파악이 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, a strategy to improve the quality of life of blood cancer patients receiving chemotherapy is needed, and it is necessary to identify major factors affecting the quality of life in order to prepare the basis for developing the strategy.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, a strategy to improve the quality of life of hematologic cancer patients receiving chemotherapy is needed, and in order to lay the foundation for establishing a strategy, it is necessary to identify major factors affecting the quality of life.

data.source_sentence: 항암 화학 요법을 받는 혈액암 환자의 삶의 질에 영향을 미치는 요인은 선행 연구에서 다양하게 제시되고 있지만, 그 중 증상 경험은 혈액암 환자의 삶의 질에 영향을 미치는 주요 요인으로 제시되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Factors affecting the quality of life of blood cancer patients undergoing chemotherapy have been suggested in various previous studies, but symptom experience is suggested as a major factor affecting the quality of life of blood cancer patients.
data.target_sentence: Factors affecting the quality of life of hematologic cancer patients receiving chemotherapy have been suggested in various previous studies, but symptom experience is suggested as a major factor affecting the quality of life of hematologic cancer patients.

data.source_sentence: 사회적 지지는 혈액암 환자의 삶의 질을 향상시키는 요인 중 하나이다.
data.mt_sentence: Social support is one of the factors that improve the quality of life of blood cancer patients.
data.target_sentence: Social support is one of the factors that improve the quality of life of blood cancer patients.

data.source_sentence: 혈액암 환자는 치료 과정에서 질병과 치료라는 새로 운 상황에 대처해야 하는 어려움을 겪으며, 생존 기간을 연장하기 위한 지속적인 치료로 인하여 신체적, 심리적, 사회적 기능이 저하되면서 삶의 다양한 변화를 경험하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Blood cancer patients experience difficulties in coping with new situations of disease and treatment in the course of treatment, and experience various changes in their lives as their physical, psychological, and social functions deteriorate due to continuous treatment to prolong their survival.
data.target_sentence: Hematological cancer patients experience a variety of changes in their lives as their physical, mental, and social functions deteriorate due to continued treatment to prolong their survival, as they struggle to cope with new diseases and treatment situations during the course of treatment.

data.source_sentence: 이렇게 혈액암은 질병 특성상 진행이 빠르고 적극적인 치료가 이루어지지 않으면 2~3개월 내에 사망하는 초급성 경과를 보이기 때문에, 혈액암 환자는 고용량 항암 화학 요법을 위한 장기간의 입원 치료가 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: Blood cancer patients are required to undergo long-term inpatient treatment for high-dose chemotherapy because blood cancer progresses quickly due to the nature of the disease and dies within 2 to 3 months if active treatment is not performed.
data.target_sentence: Due to the nature of the disease, hematologic malignancies progress quickly and show a hyperacute course in which death occurs within 2 to 3 months if active treatment is not performed. data.source_sentence: 국외에서는 혈액암 환자의 삶의 질에 영향을 미치는 심리사회학적 예측 인자를 파악하는 연구가 활발히 이루어지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Abroad, studies are being actively conducted to identify psychosocial predictors that affect the quality of life of blood cancer patients.

data.mt_sentence: Identify the relationship between the subject's symptom experience, social support, and quality of life.

data.source_sentence: 대상자의 삶의 질에 영향을 미치는 요인을 파악한다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 항암 화학 요법을 받는 혈액암 환자의 증상 경험, 사회적 지지와 삶의 질의 정도를 파악하고 이들 요인이 삶의 질에 미치는 영향을 파악하기 위한 횡단적 서술 연구이다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구 대상자는 경기도 소재 B대학병원 혈액종양내과 입원 병동 및 외래 항암 낮 병동에서 항암 화학 요법을 받는 혈액암 환자 중 대상자 선정 기준에 부합된 환자를 임의 표출하였다.

data.source_sentence: 제외 기준은 조혈모세포 이식 또는 완전 관해 후 재발 판정을 받고 항암 화학 요법을 받는 자와 우울증과 같은 정신 질환을 진단받고 정신과 관련 약물을 복용하 대상자 표본의 크기는 FFF 프로그램을 이용하여 산정하였다.

data.source_sentence: 배부된 설문지 중 응답이 불충분한 설문지 2부를 제외하고 총 118부를 최종 분석에 사용하였다.

data.source_sentence: 대상자의 인구 사회학적 및 질병 관련 특성에 따른 삶의 질 차이에서는 직업 유무와 진단명에 따라 삶의 질 점수 차이가 통계적으로 유의하였다.

data.source_sentence: 대상자의 증상 경험, 사회적 지지 및 삶의 질 간의 상관관계에 대해 서술하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The purpose of this study is to describe the correlation between the subject's symptom experience, social support, and quality of life.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study was to elucidate the correlation between symptom experience, social support and quality of life in subjects.

data.source_sentence: 대상자의 증상 경험 중 증상 중증도(r= -.53, p <.001)와 일상생활 방해 정도(r= -.50, p< .001)는 삶의 질 점수와 통계적으로 유의한 음의 상관관계를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the subjects' symptom experiences, the severity of symptoms (r=-.53, p<.001) and the degree of daily life interference (r=-.50, p<.001) showed a statistically significant negative correlation with the quality of life score.
data.target_sentence: Among the subject's symptom experiences, symptom severity (r= -.53, p <.001) and degree of disturbance in daily life (r= -.50, p < .001) showed a statistically significant negative correlation with quality of life scores.

data.source_sentence: 대상자의 삶의 질에 영향을 미치는 요인에 대해 서술하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: I would like to describe the factors that affect the quality of life of the subjects.
data.target_sentence: I would like to explain the factors that affect the quality of life of subjects.

data.source_sentence: 변량 분석에서 삶의 질과 유의한 관련성을 보인 직업, 진단명을 더미 변수로 전환한 후 1단계로 투입하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Occupation and diagnosis, which showed a significant correlation with quality of life in the analysis of variance, were converted into dummy variables and then entered into the first stage.

data.source_sentence: 위계적 다중회귀분석을 시행하기에 앞서 먼저 회귀 분석의 가정을 검정한 결과 Durbin-Watson 통계량이 2.04로 2에 가까워 자기 상관성이 없는 것으로 나타나 잔차의 독립성 조건이 충족되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of testing the assumptions of the regression analysis before performing the hierarchical multiple regression analysis, the Durbin-Watson statistic was 2.04, which was close to 2, indicating that there was no autocorrelation, thus satisfying the condition for the independence of the residuals.
data.target_sentence: As a result of verifying the assumption of the regression analysis before performing the hierarchical multiple regression analysis, the Durbin-Watson statistic was 2.04, which is close to 2, and there was no autocorrelation, so the condition for independence of the residuals was satisfied.

data.source_sentence: 다중공선성 진단 결과 공차(Tolerance)는 0.44~0.97로 0.1이상이었고, 분산팽창인자(Variance Inflation Factor)는 1.03~2.29로 10보다 작아 다중공선성은 없는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the multicollinearity diagnosis, the tolerance was 0.44~0.97, which was more than 0.1, and the variance inflation factor was 1.03~2.29, which was smaller than 10, indicating that there was no multicollinearity.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the multicollinearity diagnosis, the tolerance was 0.44 to 0.97, which was higher than 0.1, and the dispersion expansion coefficient was 1.03 to 2.29, which was less than 10, indicating no multicollinearity.

data.source_sentence: 극단치를 확인하기 위한 Cook’s Distance도 0.19 이하로 기준치인 1 이하인 것으로 나타나 극단치가 없는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Cook's Distance to check the extreme value was also found to be less than 0.19 or less than the standard value of 1, indicating that there was no extreme value.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 위계적 다중회귀분석을 실시한 결과, 증상 중증도, 동료/친구 지지, 직업이 항암 화학 요법을 받는 혈액암 환자의 삶의 질에 유의한 영향을 미치는 요인으로 나타났으며, 이들 요인의 총 설명력은 49%였다.

data.source_sentence: 이 중 증상 중증도가 대상자의 삶의 질을 설명하는 가장 강력한 예측 요인으로 나타났다.

data.source_sentence: 항암 화학 요법을 받는 혈액암 환자를 대상으로 한 연구가 부족하여 비교에 제한이 있으나 조혈모세포이식을 받은 혈액암 환자를 대상으로 한 AAA의 연구에서도 증상 중증도가 삶의 질에 유의한 영향을 미치는 요인으로 나타나 본 연구 결과를 지지한다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the comparison is limited due to the lack of studies on hematological cancer patients receiving chemotherapy, symptom severity is a factor that significantly affects quality of life in the AAA study on blood cancer patients who received hematopoietic stem cell transplantation. appeared to support the results of this study.

data.source_sentence: 혈액암 환자가 항암 화학 요법 중 경험하는 피로, 식욕 저하, 불면증, 불안, 우울 등의 신체적, 정서적 증상들은 치료 과정에 부정적 영향을 미칠 뿐만 아니라, 증상 중증도가 높을수록 혈액암 환자의 삶의 질은 더욱 저하된다.
data.mt_sentence: Physical and emotional symptoms such as fatigue, decreased appetite, insomnia, anxiety, and depression experienced by blood cancer patients during chemotherapy not only negatively affect the treatment process, but the higher the severity of symptoms, the lower the quality of life of blood cancer patients.
data.target_sentence: Physical and emotional symptoms such as fatigue, loss of appetite, insomnia, anxiety, and depression that blood cancer patients experience during chemotherapy negatively affect the treatment process. In addition, the higher the severity of symptoms, the more the quality of life of hematological cancer patients deteriorates.

data.source_sentence: 따라서, 항암 화학 요법을 받는 혈액암 환자의 삶의 질을 향상시키기 위해서는 경험하는 증상 중증도를 사정하고 이에 따라 적절한 간호 전략을 제공하는 관리 계획이 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, in order to improve the quality of life of blood cancer patients undergoing chemotherapy, a management plan is required to assess the severity of symptoms experienced and provide appropriate nursing strategies accordingly.

This is consistent with the results of AAA's study, in which peer/friend support was described as an important predictor of quality of life in hematological cancer patients.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 혈액암은 다른 고형암에 비하여 상대적으로 젊은 연령층에서 발생하기 때문에 또래 집단이나 동료 환자에게 얻는 지지가 중요할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, since blood cancer occurs in a relatively young age group compared to other solid cancers, support obtained from peer groups or fellow patients may be important.

data.source_sentence: 자조모임 등 사회적 지지 네트워크를 강화하는 간호 전략을 통하여 항암 화학 요법을 받는 혈액암 환자의 삶의 질을 향상시켜야 할 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is necessary to improve the quality of life of blood cancer patients receiving chemotherapy through nursing strategies that strengthen social support networks such as self-help gatherings.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구를 통해 증상 중증도, 동료/친구 지지 및 직업 유무가 항암 화학 요법을 받는 혈액암 환자의 삶의 질에 중요한 영향 요인으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this study, symptom severity, peer/friend support, and occupational presence were found to be important influencing factors on the quality of life of blood cancer patients undergoing chemotherapy.

data.source_sentence: 연구 결과를 토대로 항암 화학 요법을 받는 혈액암 환자의 삶의 질을 향상시키기 위해서는 증상 중증도를 주기적으로 사정하여 각 증상에 맞는 적절한 증상 관리를 제공하고 동료/친구 지지를 포함한 사회적 지지를 강화하는 간호 중재 방안이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the results of the study, in order to improve the quality of life of blood cancer patients undergoing chemotherapy, nursing intervention measures are needed to periodically assess the severity of symptoms, provide appropriate symptom management for each symptom, and strengthen social support, including peer/friend support.

data.mt_sentence: There is a need for a nursing approach that continuously seeks links with social resources that can reduce the economic burden and identify the economic level of blood cancer patients depending on whether they have a job or not.

data.source_sentence: 총의치 제작에서 디지털 기술의 적용은 환자의 구강 환경을 디지털화함으로써 3차원적 디지털 모형을 획득하는 것에서 시작하며, CAD 프로그램상에서 교합 평면을 결정하고 인공치를 배열한 후 의치상의 외형을 디자인한다.

data.mt_sentence: The completed virtual dentures may be manufactured through a cutting processing method such as milling or a additive manufacturing method such as 3D printing.

data.source_sentence: 의과적 병력으로는 신장 질환으로 인해 10여 년간 혈액 투석 중인 상태였고, 골다공증의 치료를 위해 데노수맙(denosumab)을 6개월 간격으로 주사 중이었다.

data.source_sentence: 환자는 상악의 #12,13,21 치아를 지대치로 국소 의치를 사용 중이었으나 예후 불량으로 발거가 필요하였고, 구치부에는 의치의 착탈에 방해가 되는 골융기가 있었다.

data.source_sentence: 하악 양측 후방 부위의 잔존치조제는 구치부 상실후 상대적으로 흡수가 많이 진행된 상태였으며, 하안모는 우측으로 편위된 모습을 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 고령과 전신 건강에 대한 부담으로 임플란트를 식립하는 대신 양악 총의치를 제작하기로 결정하였고, 이를 위해 예후 불량한 잔존치의 발거 및 치조제 성형술 후 임시 의치를 제작 및 장착하였다.

data.source_sentence: 임시 의치 제작을 위한 악간 관계 채득 시 하악위에 대한 평가 결과, 1급 악간 관계이었으나 불안정한 하악위를 보였다.

data.source_sentence: 이에 구치부 무교두 인공 치아를 가진 치료 의치를 사용하며 안정적인 하악위를 확립하였고 1개월 후 방사선 사진상 악관절 장애가 존재하지 않는 것을 확인하였다.

data.source_sentence: 하악의 편위 정도와 상악의 편위 여부에 대한 평가를 위해 두부 계측 방사선 사진을 촬영하여 수치를 분석하였다.

data.source_sentence: 정중시상면(midsagittal plane)에서 턱끝점(menton)까지의 거리는 우측으로 7 mm, 하악 정중면(mandibularmedian plane)과 정중시상면의 각도는 3.5도로 하악의 우측 편위가 관찰되었고, 상악의 편위는 없는 것으로 판단되었다.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 의치의 3D 프린팅 시 출력 각도에 따른 정확성을 비교한 연구에서 SLA 방식으로 45도 각도로 출력한 의치상에서의 높은 정확성을 보고하였다.

data.source_sentence: 디지털 의치 제작은 전통적인 제작 방식과 비교하여 여러 장점이 있다.

data.source_sentence: CAD/CAM 과정 중 인적 요인을 감소시켜 수작업에 의한 오차를 최소로 하며, 환자의 내원 횟수와 의치 제작 시간을 감소시킬 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: CAD/CAM 기술을 이용한 의치 제작 방식은 진료 및 기공 과정을 단순화하여 오류의 발생을 감소시키며, 임상적인 효율성과 편리함을 제공한다.

data.mt_sentence: Tonsillectomy is one of the most commonly performed surgical treatments in otolaryngology.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 경우, 생명을 위협하는 위험한 술기가 아니지만 수술 후의 통증과 식이곤란, 출혈 등의 불편감을 호소하기도 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In most cases, it is not a life-threatening and dangerous procedure, but some complain of discomfort such as pain, difficulty in eating, and bleeding after surgery.
data.target_sentence: In most cases, it is not a life-threatening procedure, but some complain of discomfort such as pain, difficulty eating, and bleeding after surgery.

data.source_sentence: 수술 후 통증에 대한 한 전향적 연구에 따르면 편도선 절제술 후의 통증은 통증 강도가 높은 25개의 수술 중 하나로 보고되기도 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to a prospective study on postoperative pain, pain after tonsil resection was also reported as one of 25 surgeries with high pain intensity.
data.target_sentence: In a prospective study of postoperative pain, pain after tonsillectomy was also reported as one of 25 surgeries with high pain intensity.

data.source_sentence: 수술 후 통증은 이차적으로 식이 곤란으로 인한 영양 부족, 수면의 부족 및 수면 단절에도 영향을 미쳐 삶의 질에 나쁜 영향을 미친다.
data.mt_sentence: Postoperative pain secondary to malnutrition, lack of sleep, and sleep disconnection due to dietary difficulties, adversely affecting the quality of life.
data.target_sentence: Postoperative pain due to sleep disturbance due to malnutrition, lack of sleep, and eating disorders adversely affects quality of life.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 coblation은 식염수와 함께 고주파 에너지를 사용하여 상대적으로 저온인 40℃-70℃에서 조직의 세포간 결합을 때문에 열로 인한 조직의 손상이 적고, 수술 후 통증이 감소한다.
data.mt_sentence: First, coblation uses high-frequency energy with saline, and due to the intercellular binding of tissues at a relatively low temperature of 40℃-70℃, there is less damage to tissues due to heat, and postoperative pain is reduced.
data.target_sentence: First, coblation uses high-frequency energy together with saline, and at a relatively low temperature of 40°C-70°C, there is less damage to the tissue due to heat and less pain after surgery due to the intercellular bonding of the tissue.

data.source_sentence: 양극성의 바이폴라와 단극성의 모노폴라와 같은 투열 기구(diathermy)를 이용한 편도선 절제술은 여러 기구들이 개발되기 전 가장 많이 사용했던 외과적 방법으로 전류를 사용하여 혈관을 응고시키고 절제를 하는 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: Tonsillectomy using diathermy, such as bipolar bipolar and unipolar monopolis, is the most commonly used surgical method before several instruments were developed, and is a method of coagulating and resecting blood vessels using current.
data.target_sentence: Tonsillectomy using diathermy such as bipolar bipolar and unipolar monopolar is the most commonly used surgical method before the development of various instruments. And it is a method of coagulating blood vessels and cutting them using electric current.

data.source_sentence: 전기 에너지가 기구의 끝 작은 영역에 집중됨으로써 조직이 빠르게 가열되어 혈관이 응고된다.
data.mt_sentence: As electrical energy is concentrated in a small area at the end of the instrument, the tissue heats up quickly and the blood vessels coagulate.
data.target_sentence: Electrical energy is concentrated in a small area at the tip of the instrument, causing the tissue to heat up rapidly and blood vessels to clot.

data.source_sentence: 첫째, 수술 전후 출혈이 적어야 하고, 둘째, 통증의 정도가 낮고, 시술이 단기간에 시행되며 어렵지 않으며, 마지막으로 수술 후 합병증의 발생률이 낮아야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: First, there should be less bleeding before and after surgery, second, the degree of pain is low, the procedure is performed in a short period of time, and finally, the incidence of complications after surgery should be low.
data.target_sentence: First, bleeding before and after surgery should be small, second, the degree of pain should be low, the procedure time should be short, and finally, the incidence of postoperative complications should be low.

data.source_sentence: 편도선 절제술 합병증의 발생률을 줄이기 위해 다양한 수술 기법이 도입되었지만 가장 적절하고 안전한 편도선 절제술 방법에 대해서는 아직 합의된 바가 없다.
data.mt_sentence: Various surgical techniques have been introduced to reduce the incidence of tonsillectomy complications, but no agreement has yet been made on the most appropriate and safe method of tonsillectomy.
data.target_sentence: Although various surgical techniques have been introduced to reduce the incidence of tonsillectomy complications, there is still no consensus on the most appropriate and safe tonsillectomy method.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 2019년 1월부터 2021년 5월까지 단일 의사에게 편도선 절제술을 시행받은 환자들을 대상으로 단일 센터에서 후향적 연구로 시행되었으며, 연구의 프로토콜은 기관심사위원회의 승인을 받았다.
data.mt_sentence: This study was conducted as a retrospective study in a single center for patients who underwent tonsil resection by a single doctor from January 2019 to May 2021, and the protocol of the study was approved by the institutional review committee.
data.target_sentence: This study was conducted as a retrospective study at a single center in patients who underwent tonsillectomy by one physician from January 2019 to May 2021, and the study protocol was approved by the Institutional Review Board.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 편도선 절제술의 적응증은 (1) 재발성 편도선염, (2) 코골이를 초래하는 편도 비대 (3) 편도 결석이다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the indications for tonsillectomy were (1) recurrent tonsillitis, (2) enlarged tonsils leading to snoring, and (3) tonsill stones.
data.target_sentence: In this study, indications for tonsillectomy were (1) recurrent tonsillitis, (2) enlarged tonsils causing snoring, and (3) tonsill stones.

data.source_sentence: 12세 미만의 소아, 출혈 장애, 급성 감염, 두개 안면 기형 또는 편도 종양의 병력이 있는 환자는 이 연구에서 제외되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Children younger than 12 years of age, bleeding disorders, acute infections, and patients with a history of craniofacial malformations or tonsil tumors were excluded from this study.
data.target_sentence: Children younger than 12 years of age and patients with a history of bleeding disorders, acute infections, craniofacial malformations, or tonsil tumors were excluded from this study.

data.source_sentence: 모든 절차는 기관 내 삽관과 함께 전신 마취하에 수행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: All procedures were performed under general anesthesia with endotracheal intubation.
data.target_sentence: All procedures were performed under general anesthesia with endotracheal intubation.

data.source_sentence: Coblation군의 환자 31명 중 3명(9.6%)과 harmonic군의 환자 26명 중 9명(34.6%)에서 추가적인 전기 소작이 필요했으며, diathermy군에서는 모든 환자에서 바이폴라를 이용한 양극성 투열 요법을 시행해 편도낭이 노출될 때까지 단극 소작법으로 측연을 따라 절개하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Additional electrospinning was required in 3 out of 31 patients (9.6%) in the Coblation group and 9 out of 26 patients (34.6%) in the Harmonic group, and bipolar diathermy was performed in all patients and incised along the side with unipolar cauterization until tonsils were exposed.
data.target_sentence: Additional electrocautery was required in 3 of 31 patients (9.6%) in the coblation group and 9 of 26 patients (34.6%) in the harmonic group. In the diathermy group, bipolar diathermy was performed using a bipolar in all patients, and an incision was made along the lateral margin by monopolar cautery until the tonsils were exposed.

data.source_sentence: 특정 출혈 부위는 양극 소작으로 지혈하였으며, 에너지는 모노폴라 및 바이폴라소작 모두에 대해 20 W로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Specific bleeding sites were stopped by bipolar cauterization, and the energy was set at 20 W for both monopolar and bipolar cauterization.
data.target_sentence: The specific bleeding site was stopped by bipolar cauterization and the energy was set at 20 W for both unipolar and bipolar cauterization.

data.source_sentence: 초기 절개는 편도의 전방 상부를 따라 단극 소작으로 이루어졌다.
data.mt_sentence: The initial incision was made with a unipolar cauterization along the anterior upper part of the tonsil.
data.target_sentence: The initial incision was made by unipolar cauterization along the anterior upper part of the tonsil.

data.source_sentence: 절제 후 출혈이 확인된 경우 두 편도선의 양극 소작으로 추가 지혈을 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When bleeding was confirmed after resection, additional hemostasis was performed by anode digestion of the two tonsils.
data.target_sentence: If bleeding was confirmed after resection, additional hemostasis was performed by bipolarizing both tonsils.

data.source_sentence: 위에서 언급한 바와 같이 초기 절개는 단극 소작으로 이루어졌으며, FFF로 조직의 박리와 절제를 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As mentioned above, the initial incision was made of unipolar thinning, and tissue exfoliation and resection were performed with FFF.
data.target_sentence: As mentioned above, the initial incision was made with unipolar thinning, and tissue dissection and resection were performed with FFF.

data.source_sentence: 환자의 평가는 수술 후 1, 7, 14, 28일에 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Patient evaluation was performed on the 1, 7, 14, and 28 days after surgery.
data.target_sentence: Patient evaluations were performed on days 1, 7, 14, and 28 post-surgery.

data.source_sentence: VAS 점수는 후 1, 2, 4주에는 통계적으로 유의한 차이가 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: The VAS score had a statistically significant difference in the following weeks 1, 2, and 4.
data.target_sentence: VAS scores were statistically significantly different at week 1, 2 and 4.

data.source_sentence: 편도 절제술은 이비인후과 영역에서 가장 많이 시행되는 수술 중 하나이다.
data.mt_sentence: Tonsetectomy is one of the most frequently performed surgeries in the otolaryngology area.
data.target_sentence: Tonsillectomy is one of the most frequently performed operations in the otolaryngology area.

data.source_sentence: 술기가 간단하고 비교적 안전한 수술이라고 알려져 있지만, 수술 후 출혈뿐만 아니라 삶의 질에 영향을 줄수 있는 통증 또한 중요한 합병증으로 보고된다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the technique is known to be simple and relatively safe surgery, pain that can affect the quality of life as well as bleeding after surgery is also reported as an important complication.
data.target_sentence: Although this technique is known as a simple and relatively safe operation, pain and postoperative bleeding that can affect quality of life are also reported as important complications.

data.source_sentence: 국내에서도 보험 급여의 변화로 비급여 항목이었던 기구들의 사용 빈도가 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In Korea, the frequency of use of instruments that were not covered by insurance benefits increased due to changes in insurance benefits.
data.target_sentence: In Korea, the frequency of use of products not covered by insurance benefits has increased due to changes in insurance benefits.

data.source_sentence: 많은 연구들에서 diathermy와 비교하여 coblation에서 수술 후 출혈과 수술 후 통증이 유의하게 적었으며, 정상식이 및 일상생활로의 복귀 시점이 유의하게 빠르고, 또한 2차 감염 및 지연성 출혈의 발생율이 적다고 보고하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Many studies have reported that compared to diathermy, postoperative bleeding and postoperative pain were significantly less, the timing of return to normal diet and daily life was significantly faster, and the incidence of secondary infection and delayed bleeding was less.
data.target_sentence: Compared to diathermy, postoperative bleeding and postoperative pain are significantly less, the time to return to diet and daily life is significantly faster, and the incidence of secondary infection and delayed bleeding is low.

data.source_sentence: 기계적 진동은 조직에 압력을 가하여 분열시키고, 단백질을 변형시키며, 혈관을 응고시키는데, 상대적으로 낮은 열 에너지를 발생시켜(40℃-80℃) 수술 중 주변 조직의 열손상을 최소화 함으로 수술 시간을 단축시킬 수 있고, 통증도 줄일 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Mechanical vibration applies pressure to tissues to divide them, transform proteins, and coagulate blood vessels, and generates relatively low thermal energy (40℃-80℃), minimizing heat damage to surrounding tissues during surgery, reducing surgery time and reducing pain.
data.target_sentence: Mechanical vibration applies pressure to the tissue to divide the tissue, deform proteins, coagulate blood vessels, and generate relatively low thermal energy (40°C~80°C) to minimize thermal damage to surrounding tissues during surgery shortens and reduces pain.

data.source_sentence: 3가지 방법을 비교한 이전 연구에서 AAA가 수술 중 출혈과 수술 시간에서 유의한 차이를 보고하였지만, 본 연구에서 coblation은 다른 두 수술 방법보다 통계적으로 유의하게 짧은 수술 시간을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In a previous study comparing the three methods, AAA reported a significant difference in intraoperative bleeding and surgical time, but in this study, the combination showed statistically significantly shorter surgical time than the other two surgical methods.
data.target_sentence: In a previous study comparing the three methods, AAA reported significant differences in intraoperative bleeding and operative time, but in this study, coblation resulted in a statistically significantly shorter operative time than the other two surgical methods.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 97명 정도의 인원을 대상으로 하였고, 나이에 대한 엄격한 제한이 이루어지지 않았다는 점, 그리고 후향적으로 연구가 진행되었다는 한계가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This study targeted about 97 people, and there are limitations in that there were no strict restrictions on age, and that the study was conducted retrospectively.
data.target_sentence: This study was limited to about 97 people, there was no strict age limit and was a retrospective study.

data.source_sentence: 향후에는 15세 미만과 성인으로 분리하여 더 많은 환자를 대상으로 전향적 연구가 이루어지길 기대한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the future, it is expected that prospective studies will be conducted on more patients by separating them into adults and under the age of 15.
data.target_sentence: In the future, it is expected that more patients will be divided into adults and younger than 15 years of age and a prospective study will proceed.

data.source_sentence: 의학적 치료는 효과적인 혈당 관리에 유의한 방법으로 고려될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Medical treatment can be considered in a significant way for effective blood sugar management.
data.target_sentence: For effective blood sugar management, medical treatment may be an important consideration.

data.source_sentence: 갈근황금황련탕은 상한론에 기재된 처방으로 리열에 표사를 끼고 나타나는 하리의 증치에 사용되며 임상적인 활용을 보면 하리뿐만 아니라 고지혈증, 고혈압, 당뇨병 등에 활용하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Galgeun Golden Yellow Lotus Soup is a prescription written in the upper limit theory, and is used to add hari, which appears with a marker on Riyeol), and clinical use is used not only for hari but also for hyperlipidemia, high blood pressure, and diabetes.
data.target_sentence: Galgeun Golden Hwangryeon-tang is a prescription written in the upper limit, and is used by adding Hari, which appears as a marker for Riyeol, and is clinically used not only for Hari but also for hyperlipidemia, hypertension, and diabetes.

data.source_sentence: 특히, AAA는 장내 미생물총은 제2형 당뇨병을 비롯한 대사 질환에서 중요한 역할을 한다는 가정하에, 설사에 활용해 온 갈근황금황련탕을 이용한 임상 시험을 시행하여 공복 혈당 및 당화혈색소(glycated hemoglobin, HbA1c)의 유의한 감소를 입증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, under the assumption that the intestinal microflora plays an important role in metabolic diseases including type 2 diabetes, AAA conducted a clinical trial using Galgeun Geumgeumhwangryeontang, which has been used for diarrhea, for fasting blood glucose and glycated hemoglobin (HbA1c). ) showed a significant decrease.
data.target_sentence: In particular, AAA hypothesizes that the gut microbiota plays an important role in metabolic diseases including type 2 diabetes. In addition, a clinical trial was conducted using Galgeun Hwanggeumhwangryun-tang, which has been used for diarrhea, and demonstrated a significant reduction in fasting blood sugar and glycated hemoglobin (HbA1c).

data.source_sentence: 더불어, 갈근황금황련탕의 항당뇨병 효과가 장내 미생물총의 변화를 유도한다는 것을 밝혔다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, it was found that the antidiabetic effect of Galgeumgwanggeumhwangryeontang induces changes in the intestinal microflora.
data.target_sentence: In addition, it was found that the antidiabetic effect of Galgeun Geumgeumhwangryeontang induces changes in the intestinal microflora.

data.source_sentence: 중증 합병증이 있는 자는 제외하였고, 동물 실험 연구도 제외하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Those with severe complications were excluded, and animal experimental studies were also excluded.
data.target_sentence: Severe complications were excluded, and animal studies were also excluded.

data.source_sentence: 중재 방식(Interventions)중재군에서는 갈근황금황련탕을 기본 처방으로 한약 치료를 한 군은 모두 포함하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Interventions In the intervention group, all groups treated with herbal medicine as the basic prescription of Galgeun Geumgeumhwangryeontang were included.
data.target_sentence: Intervention The intervention group included all groups who received herbal medicine as the basic prescription for Galgeun Geumgeumhwangryeontang.

data.source_sentence: 갈근, 황금, 황련, 감초로 이루어진 동질한 처방 구성을 가진 연구만 대상으로 하고, 가감과 합방한 연구는 포함하지 않았지만, 갈근황금황련탕의 구성 약물을 언급하지 않은 연구는 포함하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Only studies with a homogeneous prescription composition consisting of galgeun, gold, hwangryeon, and licorice were included, and studies that did not include addition and synergy, but studies that did not mention the constituent drugs of galgeun geumgeumhwangryeontang were included.
data.target_sentence: Only studies on the composition of a homogeneous prescription consisting of galgeun, gold, hwangryeon, and licorice were included, and studies that did not include additions and synergistic effects, but did not mention the constituents of galgeun geumgeumhwangryeontang were included.

data.source_sentence: 갈근황금황련탕의 제형(탕제, 환제, 산제, 과립 등)에 대해서는 제한을 두지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: There was no restriction on the formulation of Galgeun Hwangnyontang (tangje, Hwanje, acidje, granule, etc.).
data.target_sentence: There were no restrictions on the formulation of Galgeun Golden Hwangryeon-tang (tangje, pill, powder, granule, etc.).

data.source_sentence: 비교 중재(Comparisons) 갈근황금황련탕과 다른 치료 방법(위약, 무처치, 주사요법, 약물요법)을 비교한 연구를 모두 포함해 중재 결과(Outcomes) 혈당 저하, 인슐린 저항성 개선, 안전성을 평가한 결과를 모두 포함하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Comparative intervention included all studies comparing brownish-golden yellow lotus soup with other treatments (placebo, untreated, injection therapy, and drug therapy), as well as results of the evaluation of Outcomes blood sugar, insulin resistance improvement, and safety.
data.target_sentence: Comparative intervention included all studies comparing Galgeun Golden Hwangryeon-tang with other treatments (placebo, no treatment, injection, drug treatment), improvement of blood sugar, insulin resistance, and safety evaluation results.

data.source_sentence: 연구 설계(Study Design) 무작위 배정 대조군 임상 연구를 대상으로 하였으며 증례보고, 종설, 고찰 문헌, 비무작위배정 비교 임상 시험, 동물 실험, 예비 연구, 메타 분석 등은 제외하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Study Design randomized control clinical studies were targeted, and case reports, review literature, non-randomized comparative clinical trials, animal experiments, preliminary studies, and meta-analysis, and meta-analysis were excluded.
data.target_sentence: Study Design Randomized controlled clinical studies were included and excluded case reports, literature reviews, non-randomized comparative clinical trials, animal studies, pilot studies, meta-analyses and meta-analyses.

data.source_sentence: 국내 데이터 베이스에서는 ‘2형 당뇨병’과 ‘갈근황금황련탕’을 조합한 후 초록과 제목을 참고하여 배제하는 방식을 사용하였다.

data.source_sentence: 이에 본 연구는 수술 전 외래에서 시행한 눈물소관 관류술과 전신마취 하 시행한 눈물소관 관류술 결과를 비교하고, 눈물길 신티그라피와 전신마취 하 시행한 눈물소관 관류술 결과가 가지는 임상적 유용성에 대해 알아보고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, this study compared the results of lacrimal cannular perfusion performed on an outpatient basis before surgery and lacrimal canal perfusion performed under general anesthesia, and investigated the clinical usefulness of the lacrimal duct scintigraphy and lacrimal cannular perfusion performed under general anesthesia. wanted to find out.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, in this study, the results of fistula perfusion performed in an outpatient clinic before surgery and fistula perfusion performed under general anesthesia were compared, and the clinical usefulness of fistula scintigraphy and fistula perfusion performed under general anesthesia was investigated.

data.source_sentence: 수술 후 경과 관찰 기간이 4개월 이내인 환자, 급성 눈물 주머니염, 연조직염이 동반된 환자, 항암 치료의 과거력, 안와골절 수술력 등 이차 코눈물관막힘 의심 환자는 연구에서 제외하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Patients with a postoperative follow-up period of less than 4 months, patients with acute tear sacitis, soft tissue inflammation, and suspected secondary nasal tear clogging such as history of chemotherapy and ophthalmic fracture surgery were excluded from the study.
data.target_sentence: Patients with a postoperative follow-up period of less than 4 months, acute lacrimal ductitis, soft tissue inflammation, chemotherapy, and patients with suspected secondary rhinorrhea blockage were excluded from the study.

data.source_sentence: 수술 전 눈물소관 관류술, 플루오레세인 염색소실검사 및 눈물길 신티그라피를 시행하였으며, 전신마취 후 수술 시작 직전 동일 검사자에 의해 눈물소관 관류술을 재시행하였다.

data.target_sentence: Fistula perfusion, fluorescence dye loss test, and lacrimal pathway scintigraphy were performed before surgery. After general anesthesia, just before the start of surgery, the same examiner tried again fistula perfusion.

data.source_sentence: 플루오레세인 염색소실검사에서 양성, 눈물길 신티그라피에서 눈물지연, 눈물소관 관류술에서 역류가 관찰되는 경우 ‘원발코눈물관막힘’으로 정의하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 'Primary nasal lacrimal duct obstruction' was defined as positive in the fluorescein dye loss test, tear delay in lacrimal scintigraphy, and regurgitation in lacrimal canal perfusion.
data.target_sentence: Primary nasolacrimal duct obstruction was defined as positive in the fluorescent dye loss test, tear delay in lacrimal scintigraphy, and reflux in lacrimal duct perfusion.

data.source_sentence: 눈꺼풀 이완 및 눈꺼풀 겉말림과 같은 눈꺼풀에서의 눈물배출에 영향을 줄 수 있는 요인을 제거하고 플루오레세인 염색소실 검사양성, 눈물길 신티그라피에서 눈물지연, 눈물소관 관류술에서 통과가 관찰되는 경우 ‘기능코눈물관막힘’으로 정의하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Factors that could affect tear release from the eyelid, such as eyelid relaxation and outer eyelid drying, were eliminated, and if passage was observed in fluorescein chromatin test positive, tear delay in tear scintigraphy, and tear tube perfusion, it was defined as functional nasal tear blockage.
data.target_sentence: Eliminate factors that can affect tear drainage from the eyelids, such as eyelid laxity and eyelid curl. In addition, if the fluorescein loss test was positive, tear delay was observed in lacrimal scintigraphy, and passage was observed in lacrimal canal perfusion, it was defined as 'functional nasolacrimal duct obstruction'.

data.source_sentence: 플루오레세인 염색소실검사는 2% 플루오레세인 용액 한방울을 아래눈꺼풀 결막주머니에 점안하고, 5분 후에 남아있는 색소의 양상에 따라 0에서 4+까지 분류하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For the fluorescein dye loss test, a drop of 2% fluorescein solution was instilled into the conjunctival sac of the lower eyelid, and after 5 minutes, it was classified from 0 to 4+ according to the pattern of the remaining pigment.
data.target_sentence: In the fluorescence dye loss test, a drop of 2% fluorescein solution was instilled into the conjunctival sac of the eyelids, and after 5 minutes, they were classified from 0 to 4+ according to the pattern of the remaining pigment.

data.source_sentence: 0은 플루오레세인 색소가 결막주머니에 전혀 남아 있지 않은 경우, 1은 얇은 색소 띠가 남아 있는 경우, 3은 거의 모든 색소가 남아있는 경우, 2는 1과 3의 사이만큼의 색소가 남아있는 경우로 분류하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 0 indicates no fluorescein pigment remains in the conjunctival sac, 1 indicates a thin band of pigment remains, 3 indicates almost all pigment remains, and 2 indicates that between 1 and 3 pigment remains. classified as
data.target_sentence: 0 is no fluorescein pigment remaining in the conjunctival sac, 1 is a thin band of pigment remains, 3 is almost all pigment remaining, and 2 is a case where 1-3 pigments remain.

data.source_sentence: 0과 1은 플루오레세인 염색소실검사 음성, 2와 3은 플루오레세인 염색소실검사 양성으로 분류하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 0 and 1 were classified as negative for the fluorescein staining loss test, and 2 and 3 were positive for the fluorescein staining loss test.
data.target_sentence: 0 and 1 were classified as negative in the fluorescein stain loss test, and 2 and 3 were classified as positive in the fluorescein stain loss test.

data.source_sentence: 눈물소관 관류술은 생리 식염수를 넣은 3 mL 주사기에 연결된 26 게이지 관류용 바늘을 눈물점을 통해 눈물소관 내로 삽입한 뒤 생리 식염수를 주입하여 코나 목 뒤로 넘어가는지 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For lacrimal canal perfusion, a 26-gauge perfusion needle connected to a 3 mL syringe containing physiological saline was inserted into the lacrimal canal through the lacrimal duct, and physiological saline was injected to check whether it passed behind the nose or throat.
data.target_sentence: For fistula perfusion, a 26-gauge perfusion needle connected to a 3mL syringe containing physiological saline was inserted into the fistula through the fistula, and physiological saline was injected to check whether it passed behind the nose or throat.

data.source_sentence: 이후 역류되는 생리 식염수의 양과 코나 목 뒤로 넘어가는지 여부에 따라 ‘통과’, ‘부분 통과’ 및 ‘완전 역류’로 분류하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Afterwards, it was classified into 'pass', 'partial pass' and 'complete regurgitation' according to the amount of saline refluxed and whether it passed behind the nose or throat.

data.source_sentence: 검사 결과 양상에 따라 정상군, 눈물주머니 앞 폐쇄군, 코눈물관 앞 폐쇄군, 코눈물관 내 폐쇄군으로 분류하고 각 군의 빈도를 조사하였다.

data.source_sentence: 실리콘관 삽입술은 코눈물관 부분 폐쇄 또는 기능적 폐쇄로 진단받았으며 눈물흘림 증상이 1년 이내인 경우로 환자가 전신마취 하 실리콘관 삽입술만을 원하는 경우 술자의 판단하에 시행하였다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 수술 후 4개월 시기에 실리콘관 제거 후 수술 성공 유무를 판정하였으며, 해부학적 성공은 코내시경검사 결과에서 육아종 형성이 없으면서 골공의 완전한 개방 상태로 정의하였다.

data.source_sentence: 관류용 바늘을 이용해 좁은 눈물점으로 삽입해야 하는 검사로 외래에서 시행할 경우 환자의 순응도 및 협조에 따라 결과가 바뀔 수 있으며, 기능적 폐쇄를 배제할 수 없다는 단점이 있다.

data.target_sentence: Consists of 8 suitable ingredients (Breakfast, Whole Grains, Fruits, Vegetables, Protein, Dairy), 3 Regulating Ingredients (Saturated Fatty Acids, Sodium, Sugar), and 3 Balanced Ingredients (Carbs, Total Fat, Energy).

data.source_sentence: 이 중에서 본 연구에서는 단백질 항목만을 본 연구에서 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, only protein items were applied in this study in this study.
data.target_sentence: Among them, only protein was applied in this study.

data.source_sentence: 선행 연구에서는 식생활 평가 지수 총합 100점 중 80점 이상을 고품질 식생활의 의미로 반영하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In previous studies, 80 points or more out of 100 points in the total dietary evaluation index were reflected as the meaning of high-quality eating habits.

data.source_sentence: 이 기준을 근거로 단백질 항목의 최고 점수가 10점임을 감안하여 단백질의 식생활 평가 지수 ＜8점(하위점수)과 ≥8점(상위점수)으로 범주화하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on this criterion, considering that the highest score for the protein item is 10, the protein dietary evaluation index was categorized as <8/> points (low score) and ≥8 points (high score).

data.source_sentence: 공변량은 인구 사회학적 요인으로 성별, 연령 및 가구 소득을 고려하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For covariates, gender, age, and household income were considered as demographic and sociological factors.
data.target_sentence: For covariates, gender, age, and household income were considered as demographic and sociological factors.

data.source_sentence: 가구 소득은 월평균 가구 소득을 총가구원 수의 제곱근으로 나누어 계산한 월평균 가구 균등화 소득에 따라 4분위 한 자료를 하(최하), 중(중하, 중상), 상(최상)으로 범주화 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As for household income, the quartile data were categorized into low (lowest), middle (lower middle, upper middle), and high (highest) according to the average monthly household equivalised income calculated by dividing the average monthly household income by the square root of the total number of household members.

According to monthly average household equivalised income, the data in the 4th quartile were categorized into low (lowest), medium (low-middle, high-middle), and high (highest).

data.source_sentence: 건강 행태 변수로는 흡연 여부, 음주 여부 및 하루 칫솔질 횟수를 포함하였다.

data.source_sentence: 모델 2는 인구사회학적 요인인 성별, 나이 및 가구 소득 수준을 보정하였으며, 모델 3은 모델 2에서 추가적으로 건강 요인인 당뇨 및 BMI를 보정하였다.

data.source_sentence: 선행 연구에 따르면 노인의 낮은 수준의 영양소 섭취는 저소득 및 교육 수준과 맞물려 영양 섭취 문제가 가중되고 있으며, 이러한 현상은 대부분 사회 경제적으로 양호하지 못한 계층에 집중된다고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to previous studies, low-level nutrient intake of the elderly is increasing in conjunction with low-income and education levels, and most of these phenomena are concentrated in the socio-economic poor.
data.target_sentence: According to previous studies, the consumption of low-level nutrients among the elderly is increasing along with the low-income group and the educational level, and this phenomenon is mostly concentrated in the socio-economically poor.

data.source_sentence: 또한 치주 질환 등으로 인한 구강의 통증과 불편감은 개인의 음식 선택과 섭취에 더욱 악영향을 줄 수 있으며, 심각한 경우 영양 실조가 초래될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, pain and discomfort in the oral cavity caused by periodontal diseases can have a more adverse effect on individual food choices and intake, and in serious cases, malnutrition can occur.
data.target_sentence: In addition, oral pain and discomfort caused by periodontal disease may further adversely affect an individual's food selection and intake, and in severe cases, malnutrition may occur.

data.source_sentence: 특히 치아가 상실되면 저작 곤란으로 인해 영양 상태에 직접적으로 영향을 줄 수 있는데, 채소류, 육류와 같은 질기고 딱딱한 음식을 섭취하는데 어려우므로 상대적으로 부드러운 질감의 조리된 음식을 선호하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, loss of teeth can directly affect nutritional status due to difficulties in chewing, and it is difficult to eat tough and hard foods such as vegetables and meat, so cooked foods with a relatively soft texture are preferred.
data.target_sentence: In particular, tooth loss can directly affect nutritional status due to difficulty in chewing, and it is difficult to eat tough and hard foods such as vegetables and meat, so cooked foods with a relatively soft texture are preferred.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 의치 착용자는 치아가 있는 사람보다 정제된 탄수화물, 설탕, 식이 콜레스테롤 등을 더 많이 섭취한다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The AAA reported that denture wearers consumed more refined carbohydrates, sugar, and dietary cholesterol than those with teeth.
data.target_sentence: The AAA reported that those who wore dentures consumed more refined carbohydrates, sugar, and dietary cholesterol than those who had teeth.

data.source_sentence: 근거를 토대로 낮은 단백질 섭취로 인해 치주 조직에 부정적 영향을 줄 수 있으며, 이미 치주 질환으로 인해 저작능력이 저하되면 영양소 섭취의 불균형으로 이어져 전신 질환에 이환 될 가능성이 높아질 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the evidence, low protein intake can negatively affect periodontal tissue, and if the literacy is already deteriorated due to periodontal disease, it can lead to an imbalance in nutrient intake and increase the possibility of developing systemic diseases.
data.target_sentence: According to the evidence, low-protein intake can have a negative effect on periodontal tissue, and if literacy is already reduced due to periodontal disease, it can cause an imbalance in nutritional intake and increase the likelihood of systemic diseases.

data.source_sentence: 개인의 사회 경제적 특성과 구강의 상태에 따라서 선택할 수 있는 식품 종류와 영양소 섭취에는 상호 영향이 있고 단백질 섭취량에도 영향을 줄 것으로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: Depending on individual socio-economic characteristics and oral conditions, it is expected to have a mutual effect on the intake of food and nutrients that can be selected and affect the intake of protein.
data.target_sentence: It is expected that the intake of foods and nutrients that can be selected according to individual socioeconomic characteristics and oral conditions will have a reciprocal effect and will affect protein intake.

data.source_sentence: Q1는 단백질을 최하위로 섭취하는 군으로서 단백질 섭취가 불충분하다고 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Q1 is a group that consumes protein at the lowest level, and it can be seen that protein intake is insufficient.

data.source_sentence: 선행 연구 결과에 따르면 충분한 단백질 섭취는 높은 골밀도와 느린 골손실 속도와 관련성이 있으며, 이는 치주 질환의 치유에서 단백질의 잠재적 역할을 뒷받침한다고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the results of previous studies, sufficient protein intake was associated with high bone density and slow rate of bone loss, supporting the potential role of protein in the healing of periodontal disease.
data.target_sentence: Previous studies have shown that adequate protein intake is associated with higher bone density and slower rates of bone loss, supporting a potential role for protein in the treatment of periodontal disease.

data.source_sentence: 단백질은 골에 대한 동화 작용으로 장에서 칼슘 흡수를 증가시키고, 결국 치조골의 무기질화를 증가시켜 치주 조직에 긍정적인 영향을 줄 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Proteins can increase calcium absorption in the intestine as an anabolic action on the bone, and eventually increase the mineralization of alveolar bone, which can have a positive effect on periodontal tissue.
data.target_sentence: Protein can increase intestinal calcium absorption by anabolic action on bones, which in turn can have a positive effect on periodontal tissue by increasing alveolar bone mineralization.

data.source_sentence: 그 이유는 본 연구에 적용된 단백질 섭취량 조사 방법이 24시간 회상법에 의한 조사로서, 조사 1일 전 식품 섭취 내용을 바탕으로 조사되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason for this is that the protein intake survey method applied in this study was a 24-hour retrospective survey, and was investigated based on food intake one day before the survey.

data.source_sentence: 이 방법은 유용하게 널리 이용되고 있는 방법이지만 연구 대상자의 장기간의 식품 섭취 유형을 파악하기에 한계가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This method is useful and widely used, but there is a limit to identifying the types of long-term food intake of the study subjects.
data.target_sentence: Although this method is useful and widely used, it has limitations in determining the long-term food intake patterns of study subjects.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서도 대상자의 평소 식습관을 그대로 반영하는 것에는 한계가 있을 뿐만 아니라 기억력에 의존한 조사 방법으로 오차가 발생 될 수 있을 것으로 보인다.

data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, in this study, these two indicators were identified in parallel with respect to overall matters related to the intake of protein nutrients and the quality of dietary life.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 단백질 섭취량과 식생활 평가 지수를 활용해 단백질과 치주 질환 간의 관련성에 대해 파악하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study investigated the relationship between protein and periodontal disease using protein intake and dietary evaluation index.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the relationship between protein and periodontal disease was investigated using protein intake and dietary evaluation indicators.

data.source_sentence: 이에 단백질 섭취와 단백질에 대한 식생활의 질은 치주 질환과 관련성이 있는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, it was found that protein intake and the quality of protein diet were related to periodontal disease.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, it was found that the protein intake and the quality of the protein diet were related to periodontal disease.

data.source_sentence: 선행 연구 결과를 통해 단백질 섭취가 치주 질환에 영향을 줄 수도 있고, 구강의 상태가 결국 단백질 섭취나 기타 영양소 섭취에 영향을 줄 수 있을 것으로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the results of previous studies, protein intake may affect periodontal disease, and oral conditions may eventually affect protein intake and other nutrient intake.
data.target_sentence: Previous studies have shown that protein intake may affect periodontal disease and oral conditions may eventually affect protein intake and other nutrients intake.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 단면 연구이므로 단백질과 치주 질환에 대한 직접적인 인과 관계를 규명할 수 없다.
data.mt_sentence: Since this study is a cross-sectional study, it is not possible to establish a direct causal relationship between protein and periodontal disease.
data.target_sentence: Since this study is a cross-sectional study, it is impossible to establish a direct causal relationship between protein and periodontal disease.

data.source_sentence: 단백질 섭취량과 단백질 식생활의 질 변수의 한계로 인해 연구 결과 도출에 한계가 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: There were limitations in deriving the study results due to the limitations of protein intake and quality variables of protein diet.
data.target_sentence: There were limitations in deriving the study results due to the limitations of protein intake and the qualitative variables of protein diet.

data.source_sentence: 결론적으로 열악한 단백질 섭취와 식생활의 질은 치주 질환과 관련성이 있는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In conclusion, poor protein intake and dietary quality were found to be related to periodontal disease.
data.target_sentence: In conclusion, poor protein intake and dietary quality were found to be related to periodontal disease.

data.source_sentence: 이 연구는 국내의 19세 이상의 성인을 대상으로 단백질 섭취량, 단백질 항목의 식생활의 질과 치주 질환의 연관성을 파악하기 위하여 국민건강 영양조사의 제7기(2016-2018년) 자료를 이용하여 분석한 결과 다음과 같은 주요 결과를 도출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to understand the relationship between protein intake, diet quality of protein items, and periodontal disease in adults aged 19 or older in Korea, this study analyzed using the 7th (2016-2018) data of the National Health Nutrition Survey and derived the following main results.
data.target_sentence: This study was conducted to find out the relationship between periodontal disease and protein intake and quality of protein items in Korean adults aged 19 years or older. As a result of analyzing data from the 7th period (2016-2018) of the National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey, the following main results were derived.

data.source_sentence: 단백질 항목의 식생활의 질과 치주 질환에 대해 다중로지스틱 회귀 분석을 실시한 결과 인구 사회학적 요인, 의학적 요인 및 건강 행동 요인을 보정한 모델 4에서 낮은 식생활의 질 점수에서 1.13배(95% CI는 1.00-1.27)로 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of multi-logistic regression of dietary quality and periodontal disease of protein items, in Model 4, which corrected demographic, medical, and health behavior factors, the low dietary quality score increased by 1.13 times (95% CI: 1.00-1.27).
data.target_sentence: Multiple logistic regression analysis was performed on dietary quality and periodontal disease of protein items. As a result, in Model 4, in which demographic factors, medical factors, and health behavior factors were corrected, the low dietary quality score increased by 1.13 times (95% CI, 1.00-1.27).

data.source_sentence: 이상의 결과를 통해 단백질의 열악한 섭취와 단백질의 식생활의 질에 대한 연관성이 있는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Through the above results, it was found that there was a relationship between poor intake of protein and the quality of protein diet.
data.target_sentence: From the above results, it was found that there is a correlation between insufficient protein intake and the quality of protein diet.

data.source_sentence: 치주 질환의 예방과 관리를 위해 단백질 섭취와 관련된 식생활의 질을 높이기 위한 교육과 프로그램이 마련되어야 할 것으로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to prevent and manage periodontal diseases, education and programs should be prepared to improve the quality of diet related to protein intake.
data.target_sentence: In order to prevent and manage periodontal disease, it is necessary to prepare education and programs to improve the quality of dietary life related to protein intake.

data.source_sentence: 시행한 뇌척수액검사에서 세균수막염에 합당한 소견이 확인되어 경험적 항생제 투여를 시작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The cerebrospinal fluid test confirmed suitable findings for bacterial meningitis, and empirical antibiotics were administered.
data.target_sentence: In the cerebrospinal fluid test, findings suitable for bacterial meningitis were confirmed, and empirical antibiotics were administered.

data.source_sentence: 10일 뒤 시행한 확산강조영상에서 속섬유막뒷다리에 이전에 보이지 않던 급성뇌경색이 관찰되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the diffuse emphasis image performed 10 days later, an acute cerebral infarction that was previously invisible was observed in the hind leg of the fibroblast.
data.target_sentence: A previously unseen acute cerebral infarction was observed in the hindlimb of fibroblasts on a diffusion-weighted image performed 10 days later.

data.source_sentence: 고해상도 혈관벽 자기공명영상에서 좌측 원위부 내경동맥에서 중대 뇌동맥까지 조영증강되는 다초점 협착이 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In high-resolution vessel wall magnetic resonance imaging, there was a multifocal stenosis that was contrast-enhanced from the left distal inner carotid artery to the middle cerebral artery.
data.target_sentence: High-resolution vessel wall magnetic resonance imaging showed contrast-enhanced multifocal stenosis from the left distal internal carotid artery to the middle cerebral artery.

data.source_sentence: 추적 관찰한 6개월 후 뇌 자기공명 혈관조영에서 혈관 병변의 호전이 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: After 6 months of follow-up, improvement of vascular lesions was confirmed in brain magnetic resonance angiography.
data.target_sentence: After 6 months of follow-up, improvement of vascular lesions was confirmed by brain magnetic resonance angiography.

data.source_sentence: 세균수막염에서 경막하축농, 뇌농양, 뇌경색이 동반된 증례를 보고하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: We would like to report cases of bacterial meningitis accompanied by subdural sinus, brain abscess, and cerebral infarction.
data.target_sentence: We report a case of bacterial meningitis with subdural sinus, brain abscess, and cerebral infarction.

data.source_sentence: 연구 간의 차이는 각 기관별 환자 차이 이외에도 각 기관에서의 얻어진 데이터를 이용한 감염 평가와 COVID-19의 치료 방법의 주관적 차이에 기인되는 것으로 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition to patient differences for each institution, the differences between studies are thought to be due to subjective differences in infection evaluation using data obtained from each institution and treatment methods for COVID-19.
data.target_sentence: In addition to differences in patients by institution, differences between studies are judged to be due to subjective differences in infection evaluation and treatment methods using institutional data on COVID-19.

data.source_sentence: 현재까지 COVID-19의 자궁 내에서나 분만 도중 혹은 출생 직후 산모로부터 신생아로의 수직 감염(vertical transmission) 여부는 불분명하다고 보고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Until now, it has been reported that it is unclear whether COVID-19 has a vertical transmission from mother to newborn within the uterus, during delivery, or immediately after birth.
data.target_sentence: So far, it has been reported that it is unclear whether COVID-19 is transmitted vertically from mother to newborn in the uterus, during delivery or shortly after birth.

data.source_sentence: 한편 산과적 합병증으로 인한 심각한 산모의 이환율과 사망률의 경우 고혈압 관련 질환, 분만 후 출혈 그리고 산모의 사망의 증가가 SARS-CoV-2 감염과의 연관성이 있다고 AAA는 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, in the case of severe maternal morbidity and mortality due to obstetric complications, hypertension-related diseases, postpartum hemorrhage, and increased maternal mortality were associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection, AAA reported.
data.target_sentence: Meanwhile, in the case of severe morbidity and mortality due to maternal complications, hypertension-related diseases, postpartum hemorrhage, and increased maternal mortality were associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection, AAA reported.

data.source_sentence: 갑작스러운 환자 수 증가로 인한 의료 대란으로 인한 의인성(iatrogenic) 합병증이나 환자 사망의 가능성을 배제할 수 있어 COVID-19 자체로의 위험성에 대한 평가가 용이한 편이다.
data.mt_sentence: As the possibility of iatrogenic complications or patient death due to medical disruption due to a sudden increase in the number of patients can be excluded, it is easy to evaluate the risk of COVID-19 itself.
data.target_sentence: It is easy to evaluate the risk of COVID-19 itself as it can rule out the possibility of patient death due to iatrogenic complications or medical setbacks caused by a rapid increase in patients.

data.source_sentence: 이 연구에서는 실험실에서 확인된 SARS-CoV-2에 감염된 임산부를 대상으로 COVID-19의 임상적 특징과 질병의 심각성에 대해 알아보고 신생아로의 수직 감염에 대해 확인한 후 COVID-19가 임신에 미치는 영향에 대해 알아보기로 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we will investigate the clinical features of COVID-19 and the severity of the disease in pregnant women infected with SARS-CoV-2, identified in the laboratory, and examine the effect of COVID-19 on pregnancy after confirming the vertical infection to newborns.
data.target_sentence: In this study, we investigate the clinical features of COVID-19 and the severity of the disease in pregnant women infected with laboratory-confirmed SARS-CoV-2. And after confirming vertical transmission to the newborn, we will look at the effects of COVID-19 on pregnancy.

data.source_sentence: Ct 값 중 RdRp gene과 COVID-19가 급성 호흡기 감염임을 고려하여 입원 당시와 입원 중 환자에게 호흡기 관련된 증상에 대해 문진을 하였고 그 증상을 기록하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering that RdRpgene and COVID-19 among Ct values are acute respiratory infections, respiratory-related symptoms were questioned to the patient at the time of hospitalization and during hospitalization, and the symptoms were recorded.
data.target_sentence: Considering that RdRpgene and COVID-19 among the Ct values are acute respiratory infections, respiratory-related symptoms were asked at the time of admission and during hospitalization, and the symptoms were recorded.

data.source_sentence: 심각한 저산소증의 경우 중환자실 이용과 고유량 산소의 투입 여부 역시 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of severe hypoxia, the use of the intensive care unit and the injection of high-flow oxygen were also confirmed.
data.target_sentence: In the case of severe hypoxia, use of the intensive care unit and high-flow oxygen infusion were also confirmed.

data.source_sentence: 본원에서 출생한 신생아의 경우 신생아의 출생 몸무게를 확인하였고 태아의 제대 혈과 태반 조직에서 PCR을 통한 SARS-CoV-2 검출 검사를 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of newborns born in this hospital, the birth weight of the newborn was confirmed, and SARS-CoV-2 detection tests were performed through PCR in the umbilical cord blood and placental tissue of the fetus.
data.target_sentence: For newborns born at this hospital, the birth weight of the newborn was confirmed, and SARS-CoV-2 detection test was performed in the fetal cord blood and placental tissue through PCR.

data.source_sentence: 모든 SARS-CoV-2 감염 산모의 신생아는 수직 감염의 위험성에 대한 우려로 신생아 집중 치료실의 격리실이나 타 병동 격리실에 입원하였다.
data.mt_sentence: All newborns of SARS-CoV-2 infected mothers were admitted to isolation rooms in neonatal intensive care units or other ward isolation rooms due to concerns about the risk of vertical infection.
data.target_sentence: All newborns of mothers infected with SARS-CoV-2 were admitted to isolation rooms in neonatal intensive care units or other ward isolation rooms for concerns about the risk of vertical infection.

data.source_sentence: 신생아는 분만 후 1분, 5분 아프가 점수, 그리고 기관 삽관 여부를 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The newborns were checked for Apgar scores at 1 minute and 5 minutes after delivery, and whether or not they were intubated.
data.target_sentence: Neonates were checked for Apgar scores and intubation at 1 and 5 minutes postpartum.

data.source_sentence: 타원에서 출생한 산모의 경우 산모와 직접 통화하여 산모와 태아의 상태를 파악하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of mothers born in an ellipse, the condition of the mother and the fetus were identified by talking directly to the mother.
data.target_sentence: In the case of mothers who were born in an oval, the mother and the fetus were confirmed through direct conversation with the mother.

data.source_sentence: PCR 검사에서 COVID-19 양성으로 나온 경우 격리 해제 기간이 끝난 경우에도 의료진과 신생아의 감염을 우려해 가급적 제왕 절개 분만을 하였으며 분만이 임박하여 수술 준비 시간이 부족한 산모의 경우에만 질식 분만을 시도하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If the PCR test was positive for COVID-19, cesarean delivery was performed for fear of infection of medical staff and newborns even after the release period was over, and suffocation was attempted only for mothers who lacked surgical preparation time due to imminent delivery.
data.target_sentence: If the PCR test was positive for COVID-19, even after the quarantine release period was over, caesarean section was delivered as much as possible out of concern for infection of the medical staff and the newborn. Vaginal delivery was attempted only in the case of mothers who did not have enough time to prepare for surgery due to imminent delivery.

data.source_sentence: 51명은 국민건강보험 BBB병원에서 분만하였고 28명은 퇴원 후 타 병원에서 분만하였다.
data.mt_sentence: 51 people were delivered at BBB Hospital of the National Health Insurance, and 28 people were delivered at other hospitals after discharge.
data.target_sentence: After giving birth at the National Health Insurance BBB Hospital, 51 were discharged and 28 delivered at another hospital.

data.source_sentence: 국민건강보험 BBB병원에서 분만한 51명의 산모 중 36 명의 산모가 격리 기간 중 분만하였고 15명은 코로나 감염 후 격리 이후에 분만하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Of the 51 mothers delivered at the National Health Insurance BBB Hospital, 36 were delivered during the quarantine period, and 15 were delivered after quarantine after COVID-19.
data.target_sentence: Of the 51 mothers delivered at the National Health Insurance BBB Hospital, 36 delivered during the quarantine period and 15 delivered after quarantine after Corona 19.

data.source_sentence: 격리되었지만 분만시 COVID-19 양성 산모는 9명이었고 외부 병원에서 분만한 산모는 모두 음성 소견을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Although quarantined, there were nine COVID-19 positive mothers at the time of delivery, and all mothers who delivered at an outside hospital showed negative findings.
data.target_sentence: Although self-isolated, nine mothers tested positive for COVID-19 at the time of delivery, and all mothers who delivered at an outside hospital tested negative.

data.source_sentence: 분만 시 PCR 검사가 양성인 경우는 45명이었고 음성인 경우는 34명이었다.
data.mt_sentence: There were 45 cases in which the PCR test was positive at delivery and 34 cases in negative cases were negative.
data.target_sentence: At delivery, the PCR test was positive in 45 cases and negative in 34 cases.

data.source_sentence: 입원한 산모의 전체적 특징은 Table 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The overall characteristics of hospitalized mothers are shown in Table 1.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 shows the overall characteristics of hospitalized mothers.

data.source_sentence: 산모의 입원 시 평균 백혈구 수치는 정상 소견을 보였으며 평균 기준인 1.0 mg/dL보다 상승된 소견을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the mother was hospitalized, the average white blood cell level was normal and increased from the average standard of 1.0 mg/dL.
data.target_sentence: When the mother was admitted to the hospital, the mean white blood cell count was normal and increased at a mean of 1.0 mg/dL.

data.source_sentence: 68명의 산모에서 법정 격리 기간이었던 10일 내에 퇴원하였고 20일 이상 장기 입원한 산모는 모두 6명이었다.
data.mt_sentence: Sixty-eight mothers were discharged within 10 days of the legal quarantine period, and six mothers were hospitalized for more than 20 days.
data.target_sentence: 68 mothers were discharged within 10 days of legal quarantine, and 6 mothers were hospitalized for more than 20 days.

data.source_sentence: 총 184명 중 176명이 단태아 임신이었고 8명은 쌍둥이 임신이었다.
data.mt_sentence: Of the total 184 people, 176 were single-born and eight were twin pregnant.
data.target_sentence: Of the total 184 patients, 176 were unmarried and 8 were twins.

data.source_sentence: 총 79명의 산모 분만 중 60명이 제왕 절개술로 분만하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Of the total 79 maternal deliveries, 60 were delivered by cesarean section.
data.target_sentence: Of the total 79 maternal deliveries, 60 were delivered by cesarean section.

data.source_sentence: 입원 시 PCR 검사에서 양성인 경우 의료진과 신생아의 감염을 우려해 제왕 절개를 시행하였지만 갑작스런 진통으로 인해 분만이 임박하여 수술이 어려운 3명의 임산부는 음압 병실에서 질식 분만으로 출산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If the PCR test was positive at the time of hospitalization, a cesarean section was performed for fear of infection with medical staff and newborns, but three pregnant women who were unable to operate due to imminent delivery due to sudden labor gave birth asphyxiation in a negative pressure room.
data.target_sentence: Upon hospitalization, if the PCR test was positive, a caesarean section was performed due to concerns about infection of the medical staff and the newborn. However, 3 pregnant women whose delivery was imminent due to sudden labor and it was difficult to operate were delivered by vaginal delivery in a negative pressure room.

data.source_sentence: 외부에서 출생한 15명을 포함해서 총 18명이 질식 분만을 하였고 1명은 계류 유산으로 격리 기간 중 소파술을 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A total of 18 people, including 15 who were born outside, had vaginal deliveries, and one patient underwent curettage during isolation due to a miscarriage.
data.target_sentence: A total of 18 people, including 15 who were born outside, gave birth naturally, and one patient underwent curettage due to miscarriage during isolation.

data.source_sentence: COVID-19 진단 시의 재태 연령은 37주 이상의 만삭 산모가 24명(13%)이었으며 임신 1삼분기는 20명, 임신 2분기는 58명, 임신 3분기는 106명으로 임신 후반기로 갈수록 감염자 수가 많았다.
data.mt_sentence: The gestational age at the time of diagnosis of COVID-19 was 24 (13%) full-term mothers over 37 weeks of pregnancy, 20 in the first trimester of pregnancy, 58 in the second trimester, and 106 in the third trimester.
data.target_sentence: Twenty-four (13%) full-term mothers had a gestational age of ≥37 weeks at diagnosis of COVID-19. In addition, the number of infections increased in the second half of pregnancy, with 20 in the first trimester, 58 in the second trimester, and 106 in the third trimester.

data.source_sentence: 감염 경로의 경우 남편이 26.1%로 가장 많았으며 감염 경로를 모르는 경우도 37%나 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As for the route of infection, the husband accounted for the most at 26.1%, and the number of cases where the route of infection was unknown was 37%.
data.target_sentence: The most common route of infection was the husband (26.1%), and the route of infection was unknown (37%).

data.source_sentence: 감염 경로의 경우 COVID-19 확진자 수가 증가하면서 역학 조사에서 발견되지 않는 경우가 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As for the route of infection, the number of cases not detected in epidemiological investigations increased as the number of confirmed COVID-19 cases increased.
data.target_sentence: As the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 increases, the number of cases not confirmed in epidemiological investigations has also increased.

data.source_sentence: 총 184명의 환자 중 총 5명이 중환자실에 입원하여 집중 치료를 받았고 COVID-19로 인한 산모의 사망 사례는 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: Of the total 184 patients, a total of 5 were admitted to the intensive care unit and received intensive care, and there were no cases of maternal death due to COVID-19.
data.target_sentence: A total of 5 of the 184 patients were admitted to the intensive care unit and received intensive care, and there were no maternal deaths due to COVID-19.

data.source_sentence: 산모의 출생 신생아의 특징은 Table 3과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 3 shows the characteristics of mothers' births and newborns.
data.target_sentence: Table 3 shows the characteristics of maternal births and newborns.

data.source_sentence: 전체 산모의 86.4%에서 COVID-19로 인한 발열, 기침, 후각상실(anosmia) 근육통 등의 임상적 증상이 있었으나 무증상의 경우도 13.6%나 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In 86.4% of all mothers, there were clinical symptoms such as fever, cough, and anosmia muscle pain caused by COVID-19, but there were also 13.6% of asymptomatic cases.
data.target_sentence: 86.4% of all mothers had clinical symptoms such as fever, cough, and olfactory muscle pain due to COVID-19, but 13.6% were asymptomatic.

data.source_sentence: 출생한 신생아는 대부분 건강하였으며 기관 삽입을 한 경우는 없었다.

data.source_sentence: 이 연구에서는 대부분 신생아들이 건강하였으며 출산 주수와 관계없이 출생 후 기계적 호흡을 한 사례는 없었고 모두 자발 호흡을 하였다.

data.source_sentence: 아마도 초기 데이터가 각 병원별 자료로 국가 자료에서 도출되지 않았고 적절한 비교 그룹도 부족하여서 데이터 분석의 편향의 경향이 보였던 것으로 생각된다.

data.source_sentence: COVID-19 산모에서 조산 확률이 높다는 보고의 한계는 그 산모들의 자연 조산과 과의원성 조산(iatrogenic preterm birth)을 구별할 수 없다는 데 있다.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 역학, 임상 및 방사선학적 특성과 산모와 태아의 임상적 특징과 치료 및 임상 결과를 기술할 수 있다.

data.target_sentence: It allows the description of maternal and fetal epidemiologic, clinical and radiological characteristics, clinical features, and treatment and clinical outcomes.

data.source_sentence: 한국에서 SARS-CoV-2 감염이 확인된 임산부의 경우 심각한 임상 증상을 발생할 가능성이 적었으며 질병 진행이 덜 심각했다.

data.source_sentence: 산모 합병증의 경우, 재태 기간이 36주 이하의 조산과 재태 연령보다 적은 신생아(small for gestationalage) 위험이 더 높았다.

data.source_sentence: 세계보건기구에서는 임산부가 안전하게 분만하고 임신 합병증을 줄이기 위해서는 분만 의료 접근성과 적절한 산전 진찰이 매우 중요하다고 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The World Health Organization (WHO) reported that access to childbirth medical care and appropriate prenatal examination are very important for safe delivery and reducing pregnancy complications.
data.target_sentence: The World Health Organization (WHO) has reported that access to maternity care and appropriate prenatal screening is very important for a safe delivery and reduction of pregnancy complications.

data.source_sentence: 분만 의료 접근성을 향상하기 위해서는 거주 지역 인근에 분만 병원이 존재해야 하지만 최근 저출산으로 인하여 국내 분만 의료기관은 가파르게 감소하고 있어서 2003년에 1,371개였던 분만 병원은 2016년도에는 607개로 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to improve access to childbirth care, childbirth hospitals must exist near the residential area. However, due to the recent low birth rate, the number of childbirth medical institutions in Korea has been rapidly decreasing. The number of childbirth hospitals decreased from 1,371 in 2003 to 607 in 2016.
data.target_sentence: In order to improve access to childbirth medical care, a childbirth hospital should exist near the residential area, but due to the recent low birth rate, domestic childbirth medical institutions are rapidly decreasing. The number of delivery hospitals, which were 1,371 in 2003, decreased to 607 in 2016.

data.source_sentence: 특히 광주 광역시는 2003년도 대울, 인천, 대전 지역이 전국 평균보다 더 많이 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, in Gwangju Metropolitan City, the number of areas in Daeul, Incheon, and Daejeon decreased more than the national average in 2003.
