data.source_sentence: 이런 결과는 전통적인 분만 취약 지역인 강원도, 전라남도, 경상북도와 같은 지역 외에도 분만 의료에 대한 접근성이 전국적으로 진행됨을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: These results show that access to delivery medical care is carried out nationwide in addition to areas such as Gangwon-do, Jeollanam-do, and Gyeongsangbuk-do, which are traditionally vulnerable to childbirth.
data.target_sentence: These results show that, in addition to regions such as Gangwon-do, Jeollanam-do, and Gyeongsangbuk-do, which are traditionally vulnerable to childbirth, access to childbirth medical care is being made nationwide.

data.source_sentence: 최근에는 교통 수단이 발달하고 편리해지면서 행정 구역 단위에 분만 병원의 유무로 분만 취약지를 정의 하기보다는 실제 분만이 이루어지는 분만 진료권으로 분만취약지를 정의하려는 경향이다.
data.mt_sentence: In recent years, as transportation methods have developed and become more convenient, there is a tendency to define a vulnerable area as a delivery treatment right where childbirth takes place rather than defining a childbirth vulnerable area based on the presence or absence of a childbirth hospital in the administrative district unit.
data.target_sentence: Recently, as transportation has developed and become more convenient, there is a tendency to define vulnerable areas for childbirth as the right to receive childbirth care, rather than defining childbirth vulnerable areas based on the presence or absence of childbirth hospitals in administrative districts.

data.source_sentence: 분만 진료권은 행정 구역과는 무관하게 분만이 이루어지는 생활권을 의미하고 다양한 분류 기준으로 정의할 수 있지만 이 연구에서는 분만 진료권을 실제 분만이 발생한 지역으로 정의하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The right to treat delivery refers to the living area where delivery takes place regardless of the administrative district and can be defined by various classification criteria, but this study defined the right to treat delivery as the area where the actual delivery occurred.
data.target_sentence: The right to care for childbirth refers to the living area where childbirth takes place regardless of administrative districts and can be defined according to various classification standards. However, in this study, the birth care right was defined as the area where childbirth actually occurred.

data.source_sentence: 2018년 연구에 의하면 분만 취약 지역 거주 임산부들은 충분한 산전 진찰을 받지 못하는 비율이 7.2%로 분만 의료 충족 지역 임산부들의 4.39%보다 높았다.
data.mt_sentence: According to a 2018 study, 7.2% of pregnant women living in areas vulnerable to childbirth did not receive adequate antenatal care, which was higher than 4.39% of pregnant women living in areas meeting childbirth care.
data.target_sentence: According to a 2018 study, 7.2% of pregnant women living in fertility-prone areas are higher than 4.39% of pregnant women living in areas requiring antenatal care because they do not have adequate prenatal care.

data.source_sentence: 분만 취약 지역의 유산율은 4.6%로 분만 의료 충족 지역인 3.56%보다 높았으며 분만 취약지 임산부에게 분만 의료 접근성을 개선하는 것은 모자 보건에 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: The miscarriage rate in vulnerable delivery areas was 4.6%, higher than 3.56% in areas that meet delivery medical care, and improving access to delivery medical care for pregnant women in vulnerable delivery areas is important for maternal and child health.
data.target_sentence: The miscarriage rate in areas vulnerable to childbirth was 4.6%, higher than 3.56% in areas where childbirth medical care was sufficient. Improving access to childbirth care for pregnant women in vulnerable areas is important for maternal and child health.

data.source_sentence: 의료 접근성을 개선하기 위한 가장 좋은 방법은 양질의 분만 병원을 거주지 인근에 개설하여 지역의 임산부들이 많이 이용하게 하는 것이며 분만 병원의 활성화를 확인하기 위한 지표로 ‘관내 분만율’과 ‘관내 분만 건수’가 이용되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: The best way to improve medical access is to open a high-quality delivery hospital near your residence so that it is widely used by local pregnant women, and "in-house delivery rate" and "number of in-house delivery" have been used as indicators to confirm the activation of delivery hospitals.
data.target_sentence: The best way to improve access to medical care is to open a high-quality maternity hospital near one's residence so that many pregnant women in the region can use it. As indicators to check the vitality of childbirth hospitals, 'in-house delivery rate' and 'in-house number of deliveries' have been used.

data.source_sentence: 관내 분만율은 행정 구역에 거주하는 임산부의 분만 건수 중에서 행정 구역에 존재하는 분만 병원에서 분만하는 비율로 지역 내 분만 병원의 역할, 신뢰도, 의료 수준을 확인하기 위한 간접 지표로 유용하게 사용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The delivery rate in the jurisdiction is the rate of delivery in the delivery hospital in the administrative district among the number of deliveries of pregnant women living in the administrative district, and can be useful as an indirect indicator to check the role, reliability, and medical level of delivery hospitals in the region.
data.target_sentence: The intra-administrative delivery rate is the ratio of deliveries at maternity hospitals in the administrative district out of the number of deliveries of pregnant women residing in the administrative district. It can be useful as an indirect indicator to check the role, reliability, and medical level of maternity hospitals in the region.

data.source_sentence: 임산부 및 보호자가 분만 지역과 분만 병원을 선택하는 기준은 매우 다양하다.

data.source_sentence: 그 결과 의사의 실력이 중요하다고 응답한 비율이 66.5%로 가장 많았으며, 응급 및 위험 대비 시설은 64.9%로 두 번째로 많았다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, 66.5% of the respondents answered that the doctor's skills were important, and the emergency and risk preparedness facilities were second with 64.9%.
data.target_sentence: As a result, 66.5% of the respondents said that the skill of a doctor is important, and emergency and risk preparedness facilities took second place with 64.9%.

data.source_sentence: 대기 시간 및 절차에 대한 응답 비율은 29.5%로 가장 낮았다.

data.source_sentence: 결론적으로, 국내 정상안을 가진 소아에서 나이군에 따라 표층모세혈관총 및 심부모세혈관총 중심오목혈관 밀도는 유의한 차이를 보였으며, 안축장이 길어짐에 따라 표층모세혈관총 및 심부모세혈관총의 중심오목혈관 밀도는 증가하고 망막중심오목 무혈관부위 면적은 감소하는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In conclusion, in children with normal eyes in Korea, there was a significant difference in the density of superficial capillary plexus and central concave blood vessels according to age group. data.source_sentence: 독성전방증후군은 수술 후 급성으로 발생하는 전방에 국한된 비감염성 염증 반응을 말한다.

It refers to non-infectious acute inflammation that is negative in culture and improves with steroid treatment.

After checking the main branch, the tumor was removed with a resection margin of 0.5 to 1.0 cm while carefully dissecting the remaining facial nerve branches correlated with the tumor.

data.source_sentence: 대상 환자의 인구 통계학적 자료와 함께 종양의 크기, 위치, 마취 시작부터 종료까지의 총 수술 시간, 수술 중 의도치 않은 종양의 파열, 수술 후 총 배액량 및 배액관의 거치 기간에 대해 평가하였다.

data.source_sentence: 연속형 변수는 평균(mean)과 범위(range)로 표시하였으며, 비모수 검정법인 Mann-Whit-ney U test를 이용하여 양 군 간의 통계적 차이를 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Continuous variables were expressed as mean and range, and statistical differences between the two groups were analyzed using the non-parametric Mann-Whit-ney U test.

data.source_sentence: 유의 수준은 각 항목에서 0.05의 p값을 기준으로 이보다 작은 값을 가질 때 통계학적으로 유의한 것으로 판단하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The significance level was judged to be statistically significant when it had a value smaller than this based on the p-value of 0.05 in each item.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 남성 환자에 있어서는 종양의 위치를 고려하여 V형 절개법을 적극 사용함으로써, 수술 후 흉터에 대한 미용적 만족도를 보다 향상시킬 수 있을 것으로 사료되는 바이다.

data.source_sentence: 치주적으로 건전한 지대치가 충분하고 양측으로 위치할경우 의치 제작이 용이하지만, 지대치가 부족하거나 편측에 위치하는 경우 생역학적으로 불리해지며 기능적인 의치를 만들기가 상대적으로 어려워지게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: If periodontally sound abutments are sufficient and they are located on both sides, dentures are easy to manufacture, but if the abutments are insufficient or located on one side, it is biomechanically disadvantageous and it becomes relatively difficult to make functional dentures.
data.target_sentence: Dentures are easy to fabricate when periodontally sound abutments are sufficient and bilaterally positioned. However, when abutment teeth are lacking or located on one side, it becomes biomechanically unfavorable and it becomes relatively difficult to make functional dentures.

data.source_sentence: 한편, 최근에는 가철성 국소 의치에 임플란트 서베이드 크라운을 추가해 지지, 유지, 안정을 보강하는 임플란트 지지 국소 의치가 치료 계획으로 많이 선택되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, recently, implant-supported local dentures, which add support, maintenance, and stability by adding implant survey crowns to removable local dentures, are being chosen as treatment plans.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, recently, implant-supported partial dentures that enhance support, maintenance, and stability by adding implant investigators to removable partial dentures are being selected as treatment plans.

data.source_sentence: 소수 잔존치만 남은 증례에 임플란트 서베이드 크라운을 추가하여 저작 능률, 심미, 환자의 편안감, 발음의 개선 등을 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: By adding an implant survey crown to a case with only a few residual teeth, it is possible to obtain improvement in mastication efficiency, esthetics, patient comfort, and pronunciation.
data.target_sentence: In cases where there are few remaining teeth, the addition of an implant surveyed crown can improve mastication efficiency, esthetics, patient comfort, and pronunciation.

data.source_sentence: 또한 임플란트 고정성 보철물로 무치악부를 수복하기에는 상악동 거상술이나 과도한 골 이식이 필요한 경우 혹은 상실된 치아의 개수가 많아 광범위한 수술이 필요한 경우에서 시술의 어려움 및 비용적인 문제 등을 덜어주게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, in cases where maxillary sinus elevation or excessive bone grafting is required to restore the edentulous jaw with an implant-fixed prosthesis, or when extensive surgery is required due to the large number of missing teeth, the difficulty and cost of the procedure are alleviated.
data.target_sentence: In addition, maxillary sinus elevation or excessive bone grafting may be required to restore the edentulous area with an implant-fixed prosthesis. Or, if the number of missing teeth is large and extensive surgery is required, the difficulty and cost of the operation are alleviated.

data.source_sentence: 임플란트를 국소 의치에 활용하는 주요 방식으로는 임플란트를 의치 하방의 부착 장치를 통해 연결해 활용하는 방법과 임플란트 상부 보철물을 서베이드 크라운 형태로 제작해 국소 의치의 지대치로 활용하는 방법이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The main methods of using implants for local dentures are to connect and utilize the implant through an attachment device under the denture, and to make a prosthesis above the implant in the form of a surveyed crown and use it as an abutment for local dentures.
data.target_sentence: The main method of using implants for partial dentures is to connect and utilize the implant through an attachment device under the denture, and to make a prosthesis in the form of a crown measured over the implant and use it as an abutment for the partial denture.

data.source_sentence: 2017년 AAA1은 임플란트에 부착장치를 연결해 의치 하방에서 활용한 경우보다 서베이드 크라운을 제작하고 국소 의치의 지대치로 활용했을 때 임플란트의 변연골 흡수가 더 적다고 하였고, 2021년 AAA2의 연구에서는 두 군 간에 유의한 차이가 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: In 2017, AAA1 said that there was less absorption of the marginal bone in the implant when a survey crown was manufactured and used as a local denture surface than when an attachment device was connected to the implant and used under the denture, and in a study by AAA2 in 2021, there was no significant difference between the two groups.
data.target_sentence: In 2017, AAA1 reported that marginal bone resorption of the implant was less when a surveated crown was fabricated and used as an abutment for a partial denture than when an attachment device was connected to the implant and used below the denture. And, in the study of AAA2 in 2021, there was no significant difference between the two groups.

data.source_sentence: 그러나 두 연구에서는 공통적으로 서베이드 크라운 형태의 임플란트 활용 시 의치 하방 부착 장치에서 자주 관찰되는 유지력 감소 문제가 나타나지 않아 유지 관리가 더 용이하다고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: However, in both studies, when using the implant in the form of a surveyed crown in common, the maintenance problem, which is often observed with the attachment under the denture, did not appear, so maintenance was easier.
data.target_sentence: However, in both studies, when the measured crown-type implant was used in common, maintenance problems commonly observed with attachments under the denture did not appear, so maintenance was easy.

data.source_sentence: 2020년 AAA는 임플란트 서베이드 크라운을 제작 후 국소 의치의 지대치로 활용한 24명의 환자에서 1년 후 임플란트의 평균 변연골 흡수는 0.77mm, 치주낭 깊이는 3.4 mm로 정상 범주로 관찰되었다고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In 2020, AAA reported that in 24 patients who used implant survey crowns as abutments for local dentures after making them, the average marginal bone resorption of implants after 1 year was 0.77 mm and the periodontal pocket depth was 3.4 mm, which was observed in the normal category.
data.target_sentence: The 2020 AAA looks at the cases of 24 patients who fabricated an implant survated crown and used it as an abutment for a partial denture. After 1 year, the average marginal bone resorption of the implant was 0.77 mm and the periodontal pocket depth was 3.4 mm, which was observed as normal.

data.source_sentence: 2020년 AAA에 따르면, 국소 의치에 임플란트 서베이드 크라운을 이용한 군과 임플란트 의치 하방 연결 술식을 이용한 군을 비교 시, 두 군의 임플란트 생존율과 임플란트 변연골 흡수 정도에는 통계학적으로 차이가 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: According to AAA in 2020, there was no statistical difference in implant survival rate and degree of implant marginal bone absorption in the two groups when comparing the group using implant survey crown for local dentures and the group using implant denture downward connection.
data.target_sentence: According to the 2020 AAA, there were no statistical differences in implant survival rates and implant marginal bone resorption between the groups using implanted surveyed crowns for partial dentures and those using down-connection of implanted dentures between the two groups.

data.source_sentence: 서베이드 크라운을 이용한 군에서 평균 47.9개월 동안 임플란트의 생존율은 95.1%로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In the group using the survey crown, the survival rate of implants for an average of 47.9 months was 95.1%.
data.target_sentence: The implant survival rate for an average of 47.9 months in the investigator group was 95.1%.

data.source_sentence: 이는 임플란트 고정성 수복물에서의 생존율과 비견될 만하다고 하였다.

data.source_sentence: 구내 검사 및 방사선학적 소견에서 상악은 난원형의 (ovoid) 완전 무치악 악궁이었으며, 전치부의 가동 조직(flabby tissue) 등은 존재하지 않는 비교적 건전한 잔존치조제를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the oral examination and radiologic findings, the upper jaw was an ovoid completely toothless arc, and a relatively healthy residual preparation was shown without the presence of a flabby tissue of the preposition.
data.target_sentence: Oral examination and radiographic findings revealed that the maxilla was an ovoid, completely edentulous arch, and showed relatively healthy residual alveolar ridges without the soft tissue of the preposition.

data.source_sentence: 하악 또한 비교적 건전한 난원형의 잔존치조제를 보였으나, 좌측 견치 하나만 편측성으로 잔존하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The mandible also showed a relatively healthy ovary-shaped residual alveolar formulation, but only one left branch remained unilateral.
data.target_sentence: The mandible also showed relatively healthy ovarian-shaped residual alveolar formation, but only one left branch remained unilateral.

data.source_sentence: 환자는 비용 상의 문제로 고정성 임플란트 보철 수복은 원하지 않았고, 가능한 최소한의 비용으로 헐겁지 않은 하악 국소 의치 제작을 원하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The patient did not want fixed implant prosthetic restoration due to cost issues, and wanted to fabricate a non-loose mandibular local denture at the lowest possible cost.
data.target_sentence: The patient did not want a fixed implant prosthetic restoration due to cost concerns, and wanted to fabricate a loose mandibular partial denture at the lowest possible cost.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 점들을 고려해 상악 총의치의 재제작 및 하악 우측에 두 개의 임플란트를 식립해 유지와 안정이 개선된 하악 가철성 국소 의치를 제작하기로 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering these points, it was decided to manufacture a mandibular removable local denture with improved maintenance and stability by remanufacturing the maxillary full denture and placing two implants on the right side of the mandible.
data.target_sentence: Considering these points, it was decided to manufacture a mandibular removable partial denture with improved maintenance and stability by remanufacturing the entire maxillary denture and placing two implants on the right side of the mandible.

data.source_sentence: 수직 고경의 재설정 및 심미적 평가를 위해 최종 보철물을 장착하기 전까지 사용할 임시 의치를 통법에 따라 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Temporary dentures to be used until the final prosthesis is installed for resetting the vertical dimension and esthetic evaluation were made according to the conventional method.
data.target_sentence: Temporary dentures used until the final prosthesis for vertical dimension reset was installed and esthetic evaluation was performed according to the existing method.

data.source_sentence: CBCT 영상 촬영 결과, #43 부위에는 좁은 치조제 협설폭을 보여, 골 폭과 하치조 신경관까지의 거리가 적절한 #44, 45 치아 부위에 임플란트를 식립하기로 결정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of CBCT imaging, the #43 area showed a narrow alveolar buccal width, so it was decided to place the implant in the #44 and #45 tooth areas where the bone width and the distance to the inferior alveolar neural tube were appropriate.
data.target_sentence: As a result of CBCT, implants were placed on teeth #44 and #45, where the width of the buccal alveolar at #43 was narrow and the bone width and distance to the inferior alveolar neural tube were appropriate. .

data.source_sentence: 골유착기간 동안 위해한 힘이 가해지지 않도록 덮개 나사(cover screw)를 채결하고 임시 의치의 내면 삭제 후 의치상 연성 이장재로 이장하였다.
data.mt_sentence: During the osseointegration period, a cover screw was fastened to prevent harmful force from being applied, and after the inner surface of the temporary denture was removed, it was replaced with a flexible denture base material.
data.target_sentence: To prevent harmful force from being applied during the osseointegration period, fasten the cover screw and remove the inner surface of the temporary denture and replace it with a soft denture lining material.

data.source_sentence: 치은 퇴축을 보이는 하악 좌측 견치의 오래된 보철물을 제거하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The old prosthesis on the left side of the mandible showing tooth retraction was removed.
data.target_sentence: The old prosthesis on the left side of the mandible showing tooth retraction was removed.

data.source_sentence: 임플란트 지대주는 기성 시멘트 유지형 지대주를 절삭(milling)하여 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The implant abutment was manufactured by milling the ready-made cement-retained abutment.
data.target_sentence: The implant abutment was made by milling a pre-made cement retention abutment.

data.source_sentence: 서베이드 크라운의 금속 코핑 적합도 확인 후 도재를 축성해 최종 보철물을 완성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After confirming the suitability of metal coping of the survey crown, porcelain was veneered to complete the final prosthesis.
data.target_sentence: After confirming the suitability of the metal coping of the irradiated crown, porcelain was layered to complete the final prosthesis.

data.source_sentence: 잔존치의 수가 적어 이차인상법을 통한 기능 인상 시 안정적인 인상을 채득하기 어렵지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the number of residual values was small, it was not difficult to obtain a stable impression when raising the function through the second impression method.
data.target_sentence: Since the number of residual values was small, it was not difficult to obtain a stable impression when raising the function through the second impression method.

data.source_sentence: 의치의 안정과 지지를 최대한으로 얻기 위해 협붕과 하악 후구치 융기 부위의 인상을 최대한으로 채득하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to obtain the maximum stability and support of the denture, the impression of the buccal shelf and mandibular posterior molar ridge was taken as much as possible.
data.target_sentence: In order to obtain maximum stability and support of the dentures, the maximum impressions of the buccal shelf and mandibular posterior part were taken.

data.source_sentence: 추후 교합 조정을 위해 서베이드 크라운은 픽업 인상 채득하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For subsequent occlusal adjustment, the survey crown was subjected to pickup impressions.
data.target_sentence: An impression impression was applied to the investigation crown for future occlusal adjustments.

data.source_sentence: 하악 국소 의치 디자인은 좌측 견치의 설면, 우측 제1, 2 소구치에 각각 근심, 원심 레스트를 설계하였으며 의치의 안정성을 최대한으로 얻기 위해 설측판을 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For the design of the mandibular partial denture, mesial and distal rests were designed on the lingual surface of the left canine and the first and second premolars on the right, respectively, and the lingual plate was designed to maximize the stability of the denture.
data.target_sentence: For the design of mandibular dentures, mesial and distal rests were designed on the lingual side of the left canine, and lingual plates were designed on the right first and second premolars, respectively, to maximize the stability of dentures.

data.source_sentence: 이후 통법에 따라 상악 총의치 및 하악 국소 의치를 제작하였으며,측방 운동 시 의치의 안정을 위해 양측성 균형 교합을 맞췄다.
data.mt_sentence: Afterwards, the maxillary total dentures and mandible local dentures were manufactured according to the common law, and bilateral balance occlusion was adjusted to stabilize the dentures during lateral movement.
data.target_sentence: After that, the maxillary full dentures and mandibular partial dentures were manufactured according to the customary method, and the dentures were stabilized during lateral movement by controlling the bilateral balance occlusion.

data.source_sentence: 가능한 길이와 직경이 큰 임플란트를 다수 식립하는 것이 지대치의 응력 분산에 유리하며, 측방력을 줄이고 나사 풀림의 최소화를 하기 위해 임플란트 보철물은 연결 고정하는 것이 추천된다.
data.mt_sentence: Placing multiple implants with as large a length and diameter as possible is advantageous for stress distribution of the abutment, and it is recommended to connect and fix implant prostheses to reduce lateral force and minimize screw loosening.
data.target_sentence: Placing multiple implants of any length and diameter is advantageous for the stress distribution of the abutment, and it is recommended to connect and fix the implant prosthesis to reduce lateral force and minimize screw loosening.

data.source_sentence: 대합치의 종류 또한 임플란트의 실패율에 중요한 영향을 미치는데, AAA의 연구에서 대합치가 가철성 국소 의치 및 총의치일 때 임플란트를 이용한 국소 의치의 평균 47.9개월 동안 생존율이 100%로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The type of opposing tooth also has an important influence on the implant failure rate. In the AAA study, when the opposing tooth was a removable partial denture and a full denture, the survival rate for local dentures using implants was 100% for an average of 47.9 months.
data.target_sentence: The type of opposing tooth also has a significant impact on implant failure rates. In the AAA study, when the opposing teeth were removable partial dentures and total dentures, the survival rate of partial dentures using implants was 100% for an average of 47.9 months.

data.source_sentence: 본 증례에서 편측으로 남은 소수 잔존치로 인해 저하된 의치의 유지 및 안정을 증가시키고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, it was attempted to increase the maintenance and stability of the lowered denture due to the few residual teeth remaining on the unilateral side.
data.target_sentence: In this case, since there are few remaining teeth on one side, an attempt was made to increase the maintenance and stability of the descending denture.

data.source_sentence: 편측으로 소수의 치아만 잔존한 국소 의치는 기능 시에 협설 및 근원심 방향으로의 회전이 발생하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Local dentures with only a few teeth remaining on one side cause buccal and mesiodistal rotations when functioning.
data.target_sentence: Partial dentures with only a few teeth remaining on one side cause buccal and mesial-distal rotation when functioning.

data.source_sentence: 이처럼 임플란트를 이용해 대칭적인 지지를 얻는 국소 의치의 제작은 잔존 지대치의 치주 건강 및 장기적인 예후에도 도움을 줄 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, the fabrication of local dentures with symmetrical support using implants can help the periodontal health and long-term prognosis of residual abutments.
data.target_sentence: In this way, using implants to fabricate partial dentures with symmetrical support can help with periodontal health and long-term prognosis of residual abutments.

data.source_sentence: 본 증례는 대구치부에 지대치가 존재하지 않아 여전히 양측성 후방연장 국소 의치라는 한계점이 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, there is no abutment in the molar area, so there is still a limitation of bilateral posterior extension local dentures.
data.target_sentence: In this case, there is still a limit to the dentures in the bilateral molar extension because there are no abutments in the molar area.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같은 양측성 후방연장 국소 의치의 무치악 부위는 치조골 흡수로 인한 의치의 적합도 상실을 주의해야한다.
data.mt_sentence: For such bilateral posterior extension local dentures, it is important to pay attention to the loss of suitability of the dentures due to alveolar bone absorption.
data.target_sentence: It is important to pay attention to the loss of fit of the denture due to alveolar bone resorption for these bilateral posterior extension partial dentures.

data.source_sentence: 본 증례의 환자는 비용상의 문제로 국민건강보험에서 보장받는 범위 내의 치료를 받고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The patient in this case tried to receive treatment within the range covered by the National Health Insurance due to cost problems.

data.source_sentence: 국소 의치 지대치의 대칭성을 얻기 위한 최소한의 임플란트인 2개를 식립하는 것으로 치료 계획이 결정되었다.

data.source_sentence: 결과적으로 환자와 수술자 모두가 만족하는 결과를 얻을 수 있었지만, 임플란트를 추가적으로 식립하였다면 더욱 지지와 안정이 우수한 국소 의치를 제작이 가능하였을 것이다.

data.target_sentence: As a result, both the patient and the operator were able to obtain satisfactory results, but if an additional implant was placed, it would have been possible to manufacture a partial denture with better support and stability.

data.source_sentence: 본 증례는 임플란트를 #44 및 #45 위치에 식립 및 연결 고정하여 국소 의치를 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, local dentures were designed by placing and fixing implants at positions #44 and #45.

data.source_sentence: 반면, #45 위치 대신 #44와 #47 위치에 2개를 식립하여 국소 의치를 제작하는 치료 계획 또한 고려해 볼 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 해당 연구는 비교 증례의 수가 적으며(연결 고정는 38개, 단일 임플란트 수복는 3개), 임플란트 지지 국소 의치에서 연결 고정 여부에 따른 장기간 성공률을 비교한연구는 아직 부족하다.

data.source_sentence: 본 증례에서는 잔존치의 수가 적고 무치악 부위의 길이가 길어 국소 의치의 지지가 임플란트에 과도하게 의존하게 될 수 있다는 점을 고려해 #44 및 #45 위치에 임플란트를 식립 후 연결 고정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, considering the fact that the number of residual teeth and the length of the edentulous region are long, which may make the support of local dentures excessively dependent on the implant, implants were placed in the #44 and #45 positions and then connected and fixed.

data.source_sentence: 추후 임플란트 서베이드 크라운의 연결 고정 여부에 따른 성공률을 비교하는 장기간 연구가 더 필요할 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the future, it is considered that more long-term studies are needed to compare the success rate according to the connection and fixation of the implant survey crown.

data.source_sentence: 본 증례는 하악 편측 소수 잔존치 환자에서 임플란트의 식립 및 서베이드 크라운의 제작으로 지대치의 대칭성을 확보하고 의치의 유지 및 안정을 향상시킬 수 있었다.

data.source_sentence: 치주적으로 건전한 지대치가 충분하고 양측으로 위치할 경우 기능적인 의치 제작이 용이하겠지만, 지대치가 부족하거나 편측에 위치하는 경우에는 생역학적으로 불리하여 기능적인 의치를 만들기가 상대적으로 어렵다.
data.mt_sentence: If the periodontally sound abutment is sufficient and it is located on both sides, it will be easy to manufacture functional dentures.
data.target_sentence: Functional dentures are easy to make if you have sufficient periodic healthy surface teeth and are located on both sides, but functional dentures are relatively difficult if you do not have surface teeth or are located on one side.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 소수 잔존치만 남은 경우에 임플란트 서베이드 크라운을 추가함으로써 저작 능률, 심미, 환자의 편안감, 발음의 개선 등을 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, when only a few residual values remain, the improvement of authoring efficiency, aesthetics, patient comfort, and pronunciation can be obtained by adding an implant survey crown.

data.source_sentence: 본 증례는 하악에 편측 소수 잔존 지대치를 갖는 환자에서 반대편 소구치부에 임플란트 서베이드 크라운을 추가하여 양측성 후방연장 국소 의치를 제작하였다.

data.source_sentence: 지대치의 비대칭성을 해소하였고, 환자와 술자 모두 만족하는 결과를 얻었기에 본 증례를 보고하는 바이다.
data.mt_sentence: This case is reported because the asymmetry of the abutment was resolved and satisfactory results were obtained for both the patient and the operator.
data.target_sentence: This case was reported because the asymmetry of the abutment was resolved and satisfactory results were obtained for both the patient and the operator.

data.source_sentence: 소아의 경우 대개 5세 이전에 쉰 목소리, 협착음과 같이 기도 폐쇄와 연관된 증상이 나타나며, 폐 결절, 악성 종양과 같은 합병증이 발생할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In children, symptoms related to airway obstruction such as hoarseness and stenosis usually appear before the age of 5 years, and complications such as lung nodules and malignant tumors may occur.

data.target_sentence: In particular, it is known that 3.3% of patients with RRP show lung involvement, and 0.5% of patients with lung involvement show malignancy.

data.source_sentence: 만 9세 남자가 쉰 목소리, 협착음 및 호흡 곤란을 주소로 입원하였다.

data.source_sentence: 이후 만 18개월까지 타원에서 부데소나이드, 살부타몰 흡입 치료를 시행하였으며, 증상 악화 시 FFF1, FFF2를 복용하였고, 총 12회의 LMS를 시행 받았다.
data.mt_sentence: After that, up to 18 months, butsonide and salbutamol inhalation treatment were performed at the ellipse, and FFF1 and FFF2 were taken when symptoms worsened, and a total of 12 LMS were performed.
data.target_sentence: After that, busonide and salbutamol inhalation treatment was performed at another hospital for up to 18 months, and when symptoms worsened, LMS was performed 12 times by taking FFF1 and FFF2.

data.source_sentence: LMS 시행에 도 불구하고 약 1달 간격으로 증상이 재발하여 만 1세 6개월부터 만 3세 6개월까지 4주 간격으로 인터페론 200 unit을 피하로 투여 하였으나 효과가 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: In spite of LMS, the symptoms recurred at about 1 month intervals, and 200 units of interferon were administered subcutaneously at intervals of 4 weeks from 1 year 6 months to 3 years 6 months, but there was no effect.
data.target_sentence: Despite LMS, symptoms recurred at intervals of about 1 month, and 200 units of interferon were administered subcutaneously at intervals of 4 weeks from 1 year and 6 months to 3 years and 6 months, but there was no effect.

data.source_sentence: 이에 만 3세 6개월경 본원으로 전원되어 만 9세 10개월까지 평균 37.3일(범위는 5–77일)의 간격으로 총 72회에 걸쳐 LMS를 시행 받았다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, he was transferred to the main office around the age of 3 years and 6 months and underwent LMS 72 times at intervals of 37.3 days (range is 5–77 days) until the age of 9 years and 10 months.
data.target_sentence: Accordingly, they were transferred to the main hospital around 3 years and 6 months, and LMS was performed 72 times at intervals of 37.3 days (range: 5 to 77 days) until 9 years and 10 months.

data.source_sentence: 전반에서 결절과 좌측 폐에서 낭성 병변이 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Nodules and cystic lesions in the left lung were identified throughout.
data.target_sentence: Nodules and cystic lesions of the left lung were identified throughout.

data.source_sentence: 환아는 재태주수 40주 4일, 출생 체중 3.12 kg으로 자연 분만하였고, 1분 및 5분 아프가 점수(Apgar score)는 9점/9점이었다.
data.mt_sentence: The patient was delivered naturally at 40 weeks of gestation, 4 days of gestation, with a birth weight of 3.12 kg, and the Apgar score at 1 minute and 5 minutes was 9/9.
data.target_sentence: The patient was born spontaneously at 40 weeks gestation and 4 days gestation with a birth weight of 3.12 kg, and Apgar score at 1 minute 5 minutes was 9/9.

data.source_sentence: 신체 진찰상 협착음 및 흡기 시 흉부 함몰이 있었으며, 양 폐야에서 천명음이 들렸으나 심잡음은 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: On physical examination, there were stenosis and chest depression during inspiration, and wheezing was heard in both lung fields, but there was no cardiac murmur.
data.target_sentence: On physical examination, there were stenosis and chest compressions during inspiration, and wheezing was heard in both lung fields, but there was no heart murmur.

data.source_sentence: 본원에서 73번째 LMS 시행하여 후두덮개, 성문 상부에서부터 하부까지 상기도전 범위에 걸쳐 유두종의 재발을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The 73rd LMS was performed in our hospital, and the recurrence of papilloma was confirmed throughout the conductive range from the epiglottis to the lower glottis.
data.target_sentence: The 73rd LMS was performed at our hospital, and a recurrence of papilloma was confirmed in the conduction range from the epiglottis to the lower glottis.

data.source_sentence: 이에 재발한 유두종은 절삭기를 이용하여 절제하였으며 풍선을 이용하여 좁아진 성대, 기관을 넓히고, 병변 부위에 항바이러스제인 시도포비어 0.5 mL를 국소 주입하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, the recurrent papilloma was resected using a cutting machine, the narrowed vocal cords and organs were widened using a balloon, and 0.5 mL of Sidophovir, an antiviral drug, was locally injected into the lesion.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, the recurrent papilloma was excised using a cutter, and the narrowed vocal cords and organs were enlarged using a balloon, and then 0.5 mL of the antiviral agent cidofovir was locally injected into the lesion.

data.source_sentence: LMS 당시 후두의 유두종에 대해 시행한 조직 검사 결과, 경도 이형성 편평 유두종이 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of histological examination of the papilloma of the larynx at the time of LMS, mild dysplastic squamous papilloma was confirmed.
data.target_sentence: Histological examination of laryngeal papilloma at the time of LMS confirmed mild dysplastic squamous papilloma.

data.source_sentence: 수술로 쐐기 절제술을 하였으며, 조직 검사 결과 고등급 이형성 편평세포 유두종(squamous papilloma with high grade dysplasia), 인간유두종 바이러스(human papilloma virus) type 6, 11, 40 (lowrisk type)이 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: A wedge resection was performed surgically, and the histological examination revealed squamous papilloma with high grade dysplasia and human papilloma virus types 6, 11, and 40 (lowrisk type).
data.target_sentence: Wedge resection was performed and histological examination revealed squamous papilloma with high-grade dysplasia and HPV 6, 11, and 40 (low-risk type).

data.source_sentence: 이에 RRP의 후두 병변에 대한 재발 간격을 줄이기 위해 정맥 내 시도포비어를 사용하기로 한 후 퇴원하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Therefore, it was decided to use intravenous cidofovir to reduce the recurrence interval for laryngeal lesions in RRP, and then discharged.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, it was decided to use intravenous cidofovir to reduce the recurrence interval of laryngeal lesions in RRP and was discharged.

data.source_sentence: 이후 단기 입원을 통해 만 10세 5개월부터 2주 간격으로 만 12세 1개월까지 총 39회에 걸쳐 시도포비어 5 mg/kg를 정맥 내 주입하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After that, through short-term hospitalization, cidofovir 5 mg/kg was intravenously injected from the age of 10 years and 5 months to the age of 12 years and 1 month at 2-week intervals for a total of 39 times.
data.target_sentence: After a short-term hospitalization, cidofovir 5 mg/kg was administered intravenously 39 times at 2-week intervals from 10 years 5 months to 12 years 1 month.

data.source_sentence: 정맥 내 시도포비어 치료 중 신독성 및 호중구 감소, 빈혈 발생 여부 등을 확인하기 위해 시행한 혈액 요소 질소, 혈중 크레아티닌, 헤모글로빈, 호중구 검사는 모두 정상이었으며, 오심, 구토, 탈모 등의 부작용은 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: Blood urea nitrogen, blood creatinine, hemoglobin, and neutrophil tests performed to check nephrotoxicity, neutropenia, and anemia during intravenous cidofovir treatment were all normal, and there were no side effects such as nausea, vomiting, and hair loss.
data.target_sentence: Blood urea nitrogen, blood creatinine, hemoglobin, and neutrophil tests performed to check nephrotoxicity, neutropenia, and anemia during intravenous administration of cidofovir were all normal, and there were no side effects such as nausea, vomiting, and hair loss.

data.source_sentence: 정맥 내 시도포비어 치료 중 만 11세 2개월경 시행한 흉부컴퓨터 단층 촬영 검사상 폐 실질에 유두종 병변의 크기와 수가 증가하여 1개월 뒤 비디오 흉강경 수술로 쐐기 절제술을 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: During intravenous cidofovir treatment, the size and number of papilloma lesions in the lung parenchyma increased on chest computed tomography at the age of 11 years and 2 months. One month later, wedge resection was performed by video thoracoscopic surgery.
data.target_sentence: During intravenous treatment with cidofovir, at 11 years and 2 months, the size and number of papillomatous lesions in the lung parenchyma increased on chest computed tomography. One month later, wedge resection was performed by video thoracoscopic surgery.

data.source_sentence: RRP는 현재까지 확실한 치료 방법은 없으며, 후두의 정상 조직을 최대한 보존하면서, 병변을 수술적으로 제거하는 것이 일차적인 치료 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: There is no definitive treatment method for RRP so far, and surgical removal of the lesion while preserving the normal tissue of the larynx as much as possible is the primary treatment method.
data.target_sentence: To date, there is no definitive treatment method for RRP, and surgical removal of the lesion while preserving the normal tissue of the larynx as much as possible is the primary treatment method.

data.source_sentence: 또한 혈관 내 피성장인자에 대한 수용체의 활성화를 막는 역할을 하는 FFF의 경우, 기도 및 폐 실질의 RRP 병변이 있는 성인 환자 2명을 상대로 투여하였을 때 기도와 폐실질의 병변의 크기가 감소함을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, in the case of FFF, which plays a role in blocking the activation of receptors for vascular endothelial growth factor, when administered to two adult patients with RRP lesions of the airways and parenchyma, the size of the lesions in the airways and parenchyma decreased. Confirmed.
data.target_sentence: In addition, in the case of FFF, which blocks the activation of vascular endothelial growth factor receptors, when administered to two adults with airway and parenchymal RRP lesions, the size of the lesion decreased in the airway and parenchyma.

data.source_sentence: FFF1과 FFF2는 소수의 환자만을 대상으로 사용하였으므로, 치료 효과에 관해서는 추가적인 연구가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Since FFF1 and FFF2 were used in only a small number of patients, additional studies are needed on their therapeutic effects.
data.target_sentence: Because FFF1 and FFF2 have only been used in a small number of patients, further studies on their therapeutic effects are needed.

data.source_sentence: 이 증례에서도 LMS를 이용하여 유두종 제거를 시행하는 간격이 정맥 내 시도포비어 치료 후 평균 37.3일에서 평균 74.6일로 2배 이상 증가하였으며 기존에 보고된 정맥 내 시도포비어 사용과 연관된 부작용은 나타나지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, the interval between papilloma removal using LMS more than doubled from an average of 37.3 days to an average of 74.6 days after intravenous trypovir treatment, and no side effects associated with previously reported use of intravenous trypovir were found.
data.target_sentence: In this case, the interval between papilloma removal using LMS increased more than twice from an average of 37.3 days to an average of 74.6 days after intravenous cidofovir treatment. There were no previously reported side effects associated with intravenous cidofovir use.

data.source_sentence: 이를 볼 때 재발이 잦은 후두 유두종을 가진 소아 환자에서의 정맥 내 시도포비어 투여는 비교적 안전하게 후두 유두종의 재발 간격을 늘리는데 도움을 주는 것으로 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In view of this, intravenous administration of cidofovir in pediatric patients with laryngeal papillomas with frequent recurrences can be considered to help increase the recurrence interval of laryngeal papillomas relatively safely.
data.target_sentence: In this regard, intravenous administration of cidofovir in patients with laryngeal papillomas with frequent recurrence in children can be considered to be helpful in increasing the recurrence interval of laryngeal papillomas relatively safely.

data.source_sentence: 정맥 내 시도포비어 사용을 중단한 이후에도 LMS를 이용한 유두종 제거를 시행하는 간격이 길게 유지되는지에 대해서는 추가적인 추적 관찰이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Additional follow-up is needed to determine whether the interval between LMS-based papilloma removal is maintained even after intravenous cidofovir has been discontinued.
data.target_sentence: Further follow-up is required to determine whether the LMS-based papilloma removal interval is maintained after discontinuation of intravenous cidofovir.

data.source_sentence: RRP에서의 폐 침범은 드물게 발생하는데, 9개 국가에서 23개의 코호트 연구 결과에서 1,666명의 소아형 재발성 호흡기 유두종증환자에서 55명(3.3%)이 폐 침범을 하였고, 이들 55명 중 16%에 해당하는 9명(전체 연구대상자의 0.55%)에서 폐암이 발생하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Lung invasion in RRP is rare, with 55 (3.3%) lung invasion in 1,666 pediatric recurrent respiratory papilloma patients in 23 cohort studies in 9 countries, and lung cancer occurred in 9 out of 55 patients (0.55% of all subjects).
data.target_sentence: Pulmonary involvement in RRP is rare. In 23 cohort studies in 9 countries, 55 (3.3%) of 1,666 pediatric recurrent respiratory papillomatosis patients had pulmonary involvement. Lung cancer occurred in 9 (16%) of these 55 patients (0.55% of the total study subjects).

data.source_sentence: 폐침범의 정확한 병태 생리가 알려진 것은 없지만, 내시경적 수술을 통해 제거된 유두종 일부분이 기도를 통해 퍼져 폐 조직으로 침범되는 것으로 추측하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the exact pathophysiology of lung invasion is not known, it is speculated that a portion of the papilloma removed through endoscopic surgery spreads through the airways and invades the lung tissue.
data.target_sentence: Although the exact pathophysiology of lung invasion is not known, it is presumed that a part of the papilloma removed through endoscopic surgery spread through the airway and invaded the lung tissue.

data.source_sentence: 이는 시도포비어가 RRP의 폐 병변의 악성화를 막는 효과를 가지지는 못함을 의미하며, 유두종의 악화와 진행에 따른 폐 침범 병변 발생이나 악성화에 대해서는 지속적인 추적 관찰이 필요함을 시사한다.
data.mt_sentence: This means that cidofovir does not have the effect of preventing the malignancy of lung lesions by RRP, suggesting that continuous follow-up is necessary for the occurrence or malignancy of lung-involving lesions according to the worsening and progression of papillomas.
data.target_sentence: This means that cidofovir is not effective in preventing the malignancy of lung lesions caused by RRP, suggesting that continuous follow-up of the occurrence or malignancy of lung-related lesions is necessary according to the exacerbation and progression of papillomas.

data.source_sentence: 이 증례는 폐 침범이 동반된 RRP 환자에서 정맥 내 시도포비어를 투여함으로써 수술적 방법만으로는 잘 치료되지 않은 후두 병변의 재발이 의미 있게 감소함을 확인하였다는 점에서 그 의의가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This case is significant in that it was confirmed that the recurrence of laryngeal lesions, which were not well treated by surgical methods alone, was significantly reduced by administering intravenous pseudopovir in RRP patients with lung invasion.
data.target_sentence: This case is significant in that intravenous use of pseudofovir significantly reduced the recurrence of laryngeal lesions, which were not well treated with surgical methods alone, in RRP patients with lung involvement.

data.source_sentence: 폐의 악성화 병변에 대한 치료 효과는 없으므로 RRP의 폐 실질 침범이 확인된 경우에는 악성화 여부에 대한 지속적인 평가 및 추적 관찰이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Since there is no therapeutic effect on malignant lesions of the lung, continuous evaluation and follow-up of whether RRP has become malignant is required if the lung parenchymal invasion is confirmed.
data.target_sentence: Since there is no therapeutic effect for malignant lesions of the lung, continuous evaluation and follow-up of whether RRP has become malignant is required when parenchymal infiltration of the lungs is confirmed.

data.source_sentence: 영아 혈관종은 소아기의 가장 흔한 양성 종양으로 3%–10%의 소아에서 발견되며 여아와 남아 발생 비율은 3 는 1이다.
data.mt_sentence: Infantile hemangioma is the most common benign tumor of childhood, found in 3%–10% of children, with a ratio of 3 to 1 in girls and boys.
data.target_sentence: Infantile hemangioma is the most common benign tumor of childhood, found in 3 to 10% of children, with a male to female ratio of 3:1.

data.source_sentence: 영아 혈관종의 60% 이상은 얼굴, 머리, 목 부위의 피부에서 발생하지만, 기도 내 혈관종, 성문하 혈관종은 선천 후두 기형의 약 1.5%를 차지하는 드문 질환이다.
data.mt_sentence: More than 60% of infantile hemangiomas occur on the skin of the face, head, and neck, but intratracheal hemangiomas and subglottic hemangiomas are rare diseases accounting for about 1.5% of congenital laryngeal anomalies.
data.target_sentence: Although more than 60% of infant hemangiomas occur on the skin of the face, head, and neck, endotracheal hemangiomas and subglottic hemangiomas are rare diseases that account for about 1.5% of congenital laryngeal anomalies.

data.source_sentence: 성문하 혈관종은 드물게 들숨 시 협착음을 유발하고 이는 전형적으로 생후 수개월 내 발현하는데, 생후 6개월경 발생한 경우가 85%, 남녀의 비율은 1 는 2이다.
data.mt_sentence: Subglottic hemangiomas rarely cause stenosis on inspiration, which typically develops within the first few months of life, occurring around 6 months of age in 85% of cases, with a ratio of 1 to 2 males and females.
data.target_sentence: Subglottic hemangiomas rarely cause stenosis on inspiration, which usually occurs within the first few months of life and occurs around 6 months of age in 85% of cases, with a male to female ratio of 1:2.

data.source_sentence: 과거에는 영아 혈관종의 치료로 코르티코스테로이드, 인터페론 알파가 사용되었으나 최근에는 프로프라놀롤이 영아 혈관종의 최우선적 치료 약제로 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the past, corticosteroids and interferon alpha were used for the treatment of infantile hemangioma, but recently propranolol has been used as the first-line treatment for infantile hemangioma.
data.target_sentence: In the past, corticosteroids and interferon alpha were used for the treatment of infantile hemangiomas, but recently propranolol has been used as the first-line treatment for infantile hemangiomas.

data.source_sentence: 저자는 생후 1개월 영아에서 호흡 곤란을 주소로 내원하여 상기도 혈관종으로 진단받고 경구 프로프라놀롤로 치료받은 후 병변의 퇴축 및 증상이 호전된 영아 예를 보고하는 바이다.
data.mt_sentence: The authors report the case of an infant with regression of lesions and improvement of symptoms after being diagnosed with upper airway hemangioma and treated with oral propranolol in a 1-month-old infant with respiratory difficulties.
data.target_sentence: The authors reported a case of an infant who was diagnosed with upper airway hemangioma at 1 month of age with dyspnea and showed improvement in symptoms and regression of the lesion after treatment with oral propranolol.

data.source_sentence: 환자는 1개월 여아로 호흡 곤란 및 들숨 시 협착음현이 나타나며 출생 후 건강하게 지내던 중 생후 3주가 지나면서 호흡 곤란 및 들숨 시 협착음이 있어 2차 병원에 입원하여 치료하였으나 증상 호전되지 않아 본원으로 전원되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The patient was a one-month girl with dyspnea and stenosis at inhalation, and after three weeks of birth, she was hospitalized and treated at a secondary hospital for dyspnea and stenosis at inhalation, but was transferred to the hospital as symptoms did not improve.
data.target_sentence: The patient was a 1-month-old girl with dyspnea and constriction during inhalation, and was healthy after birth. However, after 3 weeks of birth, he had difficulty breathing and stridor during inhalation, so he was admitted to a secondary hospital for treatment. However, the symptoms did not improve and he was transferred to the hospital.

data.source_sentence: 타 병원 입원 당시 산소포화도 저하나 무호흡 증상은 없었고 항생제 치료 지속하였으나 증상이 호전되지 않았다고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: At the time of admission to another hospital, there was no decrease in oxygen saturation or no symptoms of apnea, and although antibiotic treatment was continued, the symptoms did not improve.
data.target_sentence: At the time of admission to another hospital, there was no decrease in oxygen saturation or no symptoms of apnea, and although antibiotic treatment was continued, the symptoms did not improve.

data.source_sentence: 그 외에 기침 등의 증상은 없었다고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: There were no other symptoms such as cough.
data.target_sentence: There were no other symptoms such as cough.

data.source_sentence: 환아는 재태연령 40주, 출생 3,200 g, 자연 분만으로 태어 났으며 생후 6일째 고빌리루빈혈증 있어 광선 치료를 받은 것 외 특이 병력이 없었다.

data.source_sentence: NOAC는 비판막 심방세동에 의한 허혈뇌졸중 또는 일과성 허혈발작 환자의 이차 예방 약제로 와파린에 우선하여 권고된다.

data.source_sentence: 다비가트란의 경우 양성자펌프 저해제나 H2 차단제와 같은 제산제와 함께 복용 시 생체 이용률이 12-30%까지 감소된다고 보고되었으나 임상적 효과의 차이는 없었다.

data.source_sentence: P-gp 대사과정의 경쟁적인 억제는 NOAC의 혈중 농도를 증가시키게 되며, NOAC를 가장 많이 사용하는 이유인 심방세동 환자에서 사용하는 약제 중 상당수가 P-gp 억제제이다.
