data.source_sentence: 브라질에서 인공조직 승모판막치환술을 받은 리바록사반군 500명과 와파린군 505명을 무작위 배정하여 2020년 발표된 연구에서는 사망, 뇌졸중을 포함한 주요 심뇌혈관질환, 출혈을 종합한 결과에서 리바록사반이 와파린에 비열등함을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In a 2020 study published by randomly assigning 500 ribaroxabans and 505 warfarin groups who underwent artificial tissue mitral valve replacement in Brazil, ribaroxabans showed meanness to warfarin in the results of combining death, major cardiovascular diseases, including stroke, and bleeding.
data.target_sentence: In Brazil, 500 patients in the rivaroxaban group and 505 patients in the warfarin group who underwent artificial tissue mitral valve replacement were randomly assigned. A study published in 2020 showed that rivaroxaban was non-inferior to warfarin in the comprehensive results of death, major cardiovascular diseases including stroke, and hemorrhage.

data.source_sentence: 인공 조직 승모판막치환술을 받은 220명의 환자들을 대상으로 효과 및 출혈을 주요 결과로 하여 최근 국내에서 수행된 무작위 대조 시험에서는 에독사반이 와파린에 비열등함을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: A recent randomized controlled trial conducted in Korea with efficacy and bleeding as the main results in 220 patients who underwent artificial mitral valve replacement showed that edoxaban was non-inferior to warfarin.
data.target_sentence: A recent randomized controlled trial of 220 patients who underwent artificial mitral valve replacement in Korea, with efficacy and bleeding as the main outcome, showed that edoxaban was not inferior to warfarin.

data.source_sentence: 4개의 주요 무작위 대조 시험을 대상으로 수행된 메타 연구에서 기계 판막 및 중등도 이상의 승모판 협착증을 제외한 다른 심장판막질환을 가진 환자에서 표준용량의 NOAC는 판막 질환이 없는 환자와 유사한 효과와 안전성을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In a meta-study conducted on four major randomized controlled trials, standard doses of NOAC showed similar effects and safety in patients with other heart valve diseases except mechanical valves and moderate or higher mitral valve stenosis.
data.target_sentence: In a meta-study conducted in four major randomized controlled trials, standard doses of NOACs showed similar efficacy and safety in patients with mechanical valves and other heart valve diseases except for moderate or severe mitral stenosis.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라 심장 내 혈전이 있는 환자들을 대상으로 충분한 수의 환자를 모집하여 NOAC와 와파린을 비교한 무작위 대조 시험은 부족한 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, there is a lack of randomized controlled trials comparing NOACs with warfarin in a sufficient number of patients with intracardiac thrombosis.
data.target_sentence: Consequently, there is a lack of randomized controlled trials comparing NOACs with warfarin in a sufficient number of patients with intracardiac thrombosis.

data.source_sentence: 좌심방/좌심방귀의 혈전이 있는 환자들을 대상으로 수행된 소규모 전향 연구들에 다비가트란 하루 2회 150 mg 투여 및 표준 용량의 리바록사반은 헤파린/와파린과 유사한 효과를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In small prospective studies conducted in patients with left atrial/left atrial thrombus, dabigatran 150 mg twice a day and rivaroxaban at standard doses showed similar effects to heparin/warfarin.
data.target_sentence: In a small prospective study of patients with left atrial/left atrial thrombus, dabigatran 150 mg twice daily and rivaroxaban at standard doses had similar effects to heparin/warfarin.

data.source_sentence: 다만 해당 연구들은 잘 통제된 맹검 연구는 아니었다.
data.mt_sentence: However, these studies were not well-controlled blind studies.
data.target_sentence: However, these studies were not well-controlled blinded studies.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 결과들을 종합하여 볼 때 아직 확고한 근거는 부족하나 좌심방/좌심방 귀에 혈전이 있는 환자에서 NOAC의 사용은 와파린의 사용이 어려운 환자에게 유망한 선택지가 될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering these results, although solid evidence is still lacking, the use of NOACs in patients with left atrial/left atrial thrombus may be a promising option for patients who have difficulty using warfarin.
data.target_sentence: Given these findings, although solid evidence is still lacking, the use of NOACs in patients with left atrial/left atrial thrombi may be a promising option for patients who struggle with warfarin use.

data.source_sentence: 심실 내 혈전은 심방세동보다는 심근경색과 같은 이유로 심근의 수축력이 저하되었을 때 잘 발생하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Intraventricular thrombus is more likely to occur when the contractility of the myocardium is lowered for reasons such as myocardial infarction rather than atrial fibrillation.
data.target_sentence: Intraventricular thrombus is more likely to occur when the contractility of the myocardium is reduced due to myocardial infarction rather than atrial fibrillation.

data.source_sentence: 주요 무작위 대조 시험에서 NOAC는 고령 환자에서도 비교적 젊은 환자와 동일한 효과를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In major randomized controlled trials, NOAC showed the same effect as in relatively younger patients in older patients.
data.target_sentence: In a major randomized controlled trial, NOACs were equally effective in older patients as well as in younger patients.

data.source_sentence: 반면 나이가 들수록 출혈 경향이 늘어나므로 NOAC 처방 시에는 출혈에 대하여도 감안하여야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, bleeding tendency increases with age, so bleeding should be considered when prescribing NOAC.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, bleeding tendency increases with age, so bleeding should be considered when prescribing NOAC.

data.source_sentence: 주요 출혈에 관하여는 75세 이상의 환자에서 아픽사반과 에독사반만이 와파린보다 적은 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Regarding major bleeding, only apixaban and edoxaban showed less tendency than warfarin in patients aged 75 years or older.
data.target_sentence: In patients over 75 years of age, major bleeding showed a lower tendency for only apixaban and edoxaban than for warfarin.

data.source_sentence: 저체중은 약물의 혈중 농도에 영향을 끼치며, 이로 인하여 NOAC를 사용하는 환자의 저체중은 보다 많은 출혈과 관련이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Underweight affects the drug's blood concentration, which is why underweight in patients using NOAC is associated with more bleeding.
data.target_sentence: Because low body weight affects blood levels of the drug, low body weight in patients using NOACs is associated with more bleeding.

data.source_sentence: 또한 저체중 환자는 다른 동반 질환을 가지고 있는 경우가 흔하며, 상대적으로 외국에 비하여 저체중 환자가 많은 국내 현실상 NOAC 투여 시 저체중은 고려하여야 하는 주요한 사항 중 하나이다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, low-weight patients often have other comorbidities, and in Korea, where there are relatively many low-weight patients compared to foreign countries, low weight is one of the main considerations when administering NOAC.
data.target_sentence: In addition, underweight patients often have other comorbidities, and in Korea, where there are relatively many underweight patients compared to other countries, low body weight is one of the main considerations when administering NOAC.

data.source_sentence: AAA1 연구에서 50 kg 미만의 저체중 환자에서 효과는 유사하였으나 출혈 경향이 증가하였으며, AAA2 연구는 저체중의 기준을 70 kg 이하로 설정하여, 국내의 일반적인 환자의 체중을 고려하였을 때 국내의 임상에서 실제로 적용하기에는 근거가 부족하다.
data.mt_sentence: In the AAA1 study, the effect was similar in underweight patients under 50 kg, but the bleeding tendency increased, and the AAA2 study set the standard for underweight to 70 kg or less, and considering the weight of general patients in Korea, there is insufficient evidence to actually apply it in domestic clinical practice.
data.target_sentence: In the AAA1 study, the effect was similar in patients weighing less than 50 kg, but the tendency to bleed was increased. The AAA2 study set the criterion for underweight to 70 kg or less, and considering the weight of general patients in Korea, there is insufficient evidence for practical application in domestic clinical practice.

data.source_sentence: 보험 공단의 자료를 사용하여 국내에서 수행된 연구에서 NOAC는 60 kg 이하의 저체중 환자에서 와파린에 비하여 우월한 효과와 안전성을 보였으며, 이는 50 kg 미만의 초저체중 환자에서도 유사한 결과를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In a study conducted in Korea using data from the Korea Insurance Corporation, NOAC showed superior efficacy and safety compared to warfarin in underweight patients weighing less than 60 kg, and similar results were also observed in very low-weight patients weighing less than 50 kg.
data.target_sentence: In a study conducted in Korea using data from the Korea Insurance Corporation, NOAC showed superior efficacy and safety compared to warfarin in low-weight patients under 60 kg, and similar results were observed in ultra-low-weight patients less than 50 kg.

data.source_sentence: 최근 발표된 2021년 EHRA의 진료 지침에서는 50-60 kg 환자에서NOAC를 사용할 경우, 아픽사반과 에독사반을 우선적으로 권고하고 있으며, 다비가트란과 리바록사반을 사용하는 경우에는 투여 시 혈중 농도 측정을 권고하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The recently published 2021 EHRA's medical guidelines recommend apixaban and edoxaban when NOAC is used in 50-60 kg patients, and measurement of blood concentration during administration is recommended when dabigatran and ribaroxaban are used.
data.target_sentence: The recently published medical guidelines of the EHRA for 2021 recommend apixaban and edoxaban when using NOACs in patients 50 to 60 kg, and to measure blood levels during administration when using dabigatran and rivaroxaban.

data.source_sentence: 50 kg 미만의 환자에게서 NOAC를 사용할 경우, 혈중 농도 측정을 권고하고 있으며, NOAC 대신 와파린 사용도 고려할 수 있다고 권고하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When NOAC is used in patients under 50 kg, blood concentration measurement is recommended, and warfarin use instead of NOAC may also be considered.
data.target_sentence: If NOAC is used in patients weighing less than 50 kg, blood concentration measurement is recommended and warfarin may be considered instead of NOAC.

data.source_sentence: 524개의 주요 무작위 배정 연구를 분석한 메타 연구에서 NOAC는 와파린에 비하여 뇌 내 출혈은 더 적었으나, 소화 기관의 출혈은 유의미하게 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In a meta-study that analyzed 524 major randomized studies, NOAC had less intracerebral bleeding than warfarin, but significantly increased bleeding in the digestive tract.
data.target_sentence: In a meta-study that analyzed 524 major randomized studies, NOACs significantly increased gastrointestinal bleeding, although less intracerebral hemorrhage than warfarin.

data.source_sentence: 주요 무작위 대조 시험에서 아픽사반과 저용량 다비가트란 및 저용량 에독사반은 위장관 출혈을 증가시키지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: In major randomized controlled trials, apixaban and low-dose dabigatran and low-dose edoxaban did not increase gastrointestinal bleeding.
data.target_sentence: In a major randomized controlled trial, apixaban plus low-dose dabigatran and low-dose edoxaban did not increase gastrointestinal bleeding.

data.source_sentence: 이후의 메타 연구에서는 NOAC가 와파린에 비하여 주요 위장관 출혈이 증가하지 않는다는 보고도 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Subsequent meta-studies also reported that NOACs did not increase major gastrointestinal bleeding compared to warfarin.
data.target_sentence: A subsequent meta-study also reported that NOACs did not increase major gastrointestinal bleeding compared to warfarin.

data.source_sentence: 개별 NOAC들을 비교한 대규모 무작위 대조 시험은 없으나, 대규모 관찰 연구에서 리바록사반 20 mg은 다비가트란 150 mg에 비하여 보다 많은 위장관 출혈을 보였고, 아픽사반은 다른 NOAC에 비하여 보다 적은 위장관 출혈을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Although there are no large randomized controlled trials comparing individual NOACs, in a large observational study, rivaroxaban 20 mg showed more gastrointestinal bleeding compared to dabigatran 150 mg, and apixaban showed less gastrointestinal bleeding compared to other NOACs. .
data.target_sentence: Although there are no large randomized controlled trials comparing individual NOACs, in a large observational study, rivaroxaban 20 mg caused more gastrointestinal bleeding compared to dabigatran 150 mg, and apixaban caused less gastrointestinal bleeding compared to other NOACs.

data.source_sentence: 심방세동과 같은 뚜렷한 심장성색전 원인이 없으나, 색전성 뇌졸중이 의심되는 ESUS 환자에서 항응고제 투여를 권고하는 의견이 있어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Although there is no clear cause of cardiac embolization such as atrial fibrillation, there have been opinions recommending the administration of anticoagulants in ESUS patients suspected of embolic stroke.
data.target_sentence: Although there is no definitive cause of cardiac embolism such as atrial fibrillation, there is an opinion recommending anticoagulant administration in ESUS patients with suspected embolic stroke.

data.source_sentence: 심방세동이 있는 환자에서 콩팥병의 유병률은 증가하며, 콩팥병은 심방세동의 발생을 촉진한다.
data.mt_sentence: The prevalence of kidney disease increases in patients with atrial fibrillation, and kidney disease promotes the development of atrial fibrillation.
data.target_sentence: The prevalence of kidney disease is increased in patients with atrial fibrillation, and kidney disease promotes the development of atrial fibrillation.

data.source_sentence: 또한 신장은 NOAC의 배출에 주요한 역할을 하는데, 다비가트란은 80%가 신장으로 배설되며, 에독사반은 50%, 리바록사반은 35%, 아픽사반은 27%가 신장으로 배설된다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, the kidneys play a major role in the excretion of NOACs: 80% of dabigatran is excreted by the kidneys, 50% of edoxaban, 35% of rivaroxaban, and 27% of apixaban is excreted by the kidneys.
data.target_sentence: The kidneys also play an important role in the excretion of NOACs. 80% of dabigatran, 50% of edoxaban, 35% of rivaroxaban, and 27% of apixaban are excreted by the kidneys.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라 4가지 NOAC 모두 투여 시에 신장 기능을 고려하여 용량을 조절할 것이 권고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, it is recommended to adjust the dose in consideration of renal function when administering all four NOACs.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, when administering all four NOACs, it is recommended to adjust the dose in consideration of renal function.

data.source_sentence: 4개의 주요 무작위 대조 시험에서 NOAC는 중등도의 만성콩팥병(크레아티닌청소율, 30-49 mL/min)이 있는 환자에서도 와파린에 비하여 유사하거나 우월한 결과를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In four major randomized controlled trials, NOAC showed similar or superior results compared to warfarin in patients with moderate chronic kidney disease (creatinine clearance rate, 30-49 mL/min).
data.target_sentence: In four major randomized controlled trials, NOACs demonstrated comparable or superior outcomes compared to warfarin in patients with moderate chronic kidney disease (creatinine clearance, 30-49 mL/min).

data.source_sentence: AAA 연구에서는 크레아티닌청소율이 25-30 mL/min인 환자 270명이 등록되었는데, 하위그룹 분석에서 효과는 와파린과 유사하였으며, 출혈은 와파린에 비하여 적었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the AAA study, 270 patients with creatinine clearance of 25-30 mL/min were enrolled. In a subgroup analysis, the effect was similar to that of warfarin, and the bleeding was less than that of warfarin.
data.target_sentence: In the AAA study, 270 patients with creatinine clearance of 25-30 mL/min were enrolled. In a small group analysis, the effect was similar to that of warfarin and the bleeding was less than that of warfarin.

data.source_sentence: 미국에서는 약동학적인 연구 결과를 바탕으로 크레아티닌 청소율이 15에서 29 mL/min 사이인 환자에게 다비가트란 75 mg의 투여가 허용되어 있고, 유럽에서는 같은 환자들에게 리바록사반, 아픽사반, 에독사반을 용량 조절하에 주의하여 사용하도록 권고된다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on pharmacokinetic studies in the United States, 75 mg of dabigatran is allowed to be administered to patients with creatinine cleaning rates between 15 and 29 mL/min, and in Europe, it is recommended that the same patients use ribaroxaban, apixaban, and edoxaban under dose control.
data.target_sentence: In the United States, dabigatran 75 mg is permitted for patients with creatinine clearance between 15 and 29 mL/min based on the results of pharmacokinetic studies. In Europe, it is recommended to use rivaroxaban, apixaban, and edoxaban with caution under dose adjustment in the same patients.

data.source_sentence: 약 25,500명의 투석을 받는 메디케어 환자들을 대상으로 미국에서 진행된 관찰 연구에서 아픽사반 5 mg 하루 2회 투여군은 와파린과 유사한 뇌졸중/전신색전증을 보였으며, 주요 출혈은 더 적었다.
data.mt_sentence: In an observational study conducted in the United States of approximately 25,500 dialysis patients on Medicare, apixaban 5 mg twice daily had similar stroke/systemic embolism to warfarin, and fewer major bleeding.
data.target_sentence: In an observational study of approximately 25,500 dialysis patients under Medicare in the United States, the group taking apixaban 5 mg twice daily had similar stroke/systemic embolism and less major bleeding than the group taking warfarin.

data.source_sentence: 간질환이 있는 환자는 출혈 경향이 증가하지만, 이와 함께 혈전이 발생할 가능성도 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: Patients with liver disease have an increased tendency to bleed, but the possibility of blood clots also increases.
data.target_sentence: People with liver disease have an increased tendency to bleed, but they also increase the likelihood of blood clots.

data.source_sentence: 간은 또한 NOAC의 약물 대사에 관여하는데, 73%의 아픽사반이 가장 많은 간대사를 거치며, 리바록사반은 65%, 에독사반은 50%, 다비가트란은 약물의 20%가 간대사를 거쳐 제거된다.
data.mt_sentence: The liver is also involved in the drug metabolism of NOAC, with 73% of apixaban going through the most liver metabolism, 65% of ribaroxaban, 50% of edoxaban, and 20% of dabigatran drugs being removed through liver metabolism.
data.target_sentence: The liver is also involved in drug metabolism of NOACs, with 73% of apixaban undergoing the most hepatic metabolism. 65% of rivaroxaban, 50% of edoxaban, and 20% of dabigatran are eliminated through hepatic metabolism.

data.source_sentence: 암 환자에서는 뇌졸중의 발생이 증가하는 것으로 알려져 있으며, 다양한 기전이 제시되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is known that the incidence of stroke increases in cancer patients, and various mechanisms have been proposed.
data.target_sentence: It is known that the incidence of stroke increases in cancer patients, and various mechanisms have been proposed.

data.source_sentence: 암 환자에서 대규모 무작위 대조 시험은 저분자량 헤파린인 달테파린(dalteparin)과 에독사반, 아픽사반 또는 리바록사반을 비교하여 수행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: A large randomized controlled trial in cancer patients was conducted comparing the low molecular weight heparin, dalteparin, with edoxaban, apixaban, or rivaroxaban.
data.target_sentence: A large randomized controlled trial in cancer patients was conducted comparing the low molecular weight heparin dalteparin with edoxaban, apixaban or rivaroxaban.

data.source_sentence: 에독사반은 정맥 혈전 색전증의 재발과 주요 출혈을 합하였을 때 달테파린에 비하여 비열등하였으나, 주요 출혈만을 분석하였을 때에는 증가하는 경향을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Edoxaban was non-inferior to dalteparin when the recurrence of venous thromboembolism and major bleeding were combined, but showed a tendency to increase when only major bleeding was analyzed.
data.target_sentence: Edoxaban was not inferior to dalteparin in the combined case of venous thromboembolism recurrence and major bleeding, but showed a tendency to increase when only major bleeding was analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 리바록사반은 정맥 혈전 색전증 재발에 있어서 달테파린에 비하여 우월한 경향을 보였으며, 주요 출혈은 약간 증가하였으나, 통계적으로는 의미 있는 차이는 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: Rivaroxaban tended to be superior to dal tepharin in the recurrence of venous thromboembolism, and major bleeding increased slightly, but there was no statistically significant difference.
data.target_sentence: Rivaroxaban showed a tendency to be superior to daltepharin in the recurrence of venous thromboembolism, and there was a slight increase in major bleeding, but there was no statistically significant difference.

data.source_sentence: 아픽사반은 정맥 혈전 색전증의 재발을 예방하는 데 있어 달테파린에 비하여 비열등하였으며, 주요 출혈은 달테파린과 차이가 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: Apixaban was non-inferior to dalteparin in preventing recurrence of venous thromboembolism, and major bleeding was not different from dalteparin.
data.target_sentence: Apixaban was non-inferior to dalteparin in preventing recurrence of venous thromboembolism, and major bleeding was not different from dalteparin.

data.source_sentence: 국내에서도 암 환자에게서 발생한 뇌졸중은 NOAC의 허가 사항이 아니며, 암환자에서 뇌졸중의 재발을 주요 결과로 삼아 에독사반과 달테파린을 비교하는 무작위 대조 시험이 현재 수행 중이다.
data.mt_sentence: In Korea, strokes occurring in cancer patients are not approved by the NOAC, and a randomized controlled trial comparing edoxaban and dalteparin with the recurrence of stroke in cancer patients as the main outcome is currently being conducted.
data.target_sentence: In Korea, a randomized controlled trial comparing edoxaban and dalteparin as the main outcome for stroke recurrence in cancer patients is underway without NOAC approval for stroke occurring in cancer patients.

data.source_sentence: 임상 현장에서 심방세동에 의한 허혈뇌졸중을 예방하기 위한 항응고제로서 NOAC는 널리 쓰이고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: NOACs are widely used as anticoagulants to prevent ischemic stroke caused by atrial fibrillation in clinical settings.
data.target_sentence: NOACs are widely used as anticoagulants to prevent ischemic stroke caused by atrial fibrillation in clinical settings.

data.source_sentence: NOAC는 주기적인 프로 트롬빈 시간의 추적 검사가 필요가 없고, 비교적 약물 상호 작용이 적으며, 약물의 효과 예측이 비교적 단순한 점 등의 장점이 있어 와파린의 위치를 대체하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: NOAC is replacing warfarin because it does not require periodic follow-up of prothrombin time, has relatively few drug interactions, and is relatively simple to predict drug effects.
data.target_sentence: NOACs are replacing warfarin because they do not require periodic tracking of prothrombin time, have relatively few drug interactions, and are relatively straightforward to predict drug effects.

data.source_sentence: 특히 우리나라에서는 비타민 K와 무관한 NOAC의 약물 작용 기전 덕분에 음식물과의 상호 작용으로 인하여 와파린의 치료 범위에서 잘 조절되지 않아 적절한 항응고치료를 받지 못하던 환자들에게 좋은 대체제가 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, thanks to the drug action mechanism of NOAC unrelated to vitamin K in Korea, it was a good substitute for patients who were not receiving proper anticoagulant treatment because of its interaction with food.
data.target_sentence: In particular, in Korea, due to the drug action mechanism of NOAC independent of vitamin K, it has become a good substitute for patients who do not receive adequate anticoagulant treatment due to interaction with food.

data.source_sentence: NOAC 도입 초기에는 비판막 심방세동을 동반한 환자에서만 사용되었으며, 금기에 해당하는 질환도 많았으나, 다양한 임상 연구를 통하여 심방세동 이외의 다양한 질환으로 적용 범위가 점차 넓어지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the early days of NOAC introduction, it was used only in patients with non-crystalline atrial fibrillation, and there were many taboo diseases, but the scope of application is gradually expanding to various diseases other than atrial fibrillation through various clinical studies.
data.target_sentence: At the beginning of the introduction of NOAC, it was used only in patients with nonvalvular atrial fibrillation, and there were many diseases that were contraindicated. However, through various clinical studies, the application range is gradually widening to various diseases other than atrial fibrillation.

data.source_sentence: 현재 우리나라에서 처방 가능한 NOAC는 네 가지이다.
data.mt_sentence: Currently, there are four NOACs that can be prescribed in Korea.
data.target_sentence: Currently, there are four NOACs that can be prescribed in Korea.

data.source_sentence: 와파린보다는 적지만, 다른 약물과의 상호 작용은 NOAC의 농도에 영향을 줄 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Less than warfarin, but interactions with other drugs can affect the concentration of NOAC.
data.target_sentence: Although less common than warfarin, interactions with other drugs may affect NOAC levels.

data.source_sentence: 약물 간의 상호 작용에 대하여도 숙지할 필요가 있으며, 추가적으로 NOAC의 처방 또는 유지 시, 현재 복용 또는 새로 시작하는 약물에 대한 확인도 필요할 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is also necessary to be familiar with the interactions between drugs, and additionally, when prescribing or maintaining NOAC, it will be necessary to confirm the current drug or new drug.
data.target_sentence: You will also need to be aware of drug-drug interactions, and if you are prescribing or maintaining NOACs, you will likely need to check for existing or new drugs.

data.source_sentence: NOAC의 적응증은 점차 확대되고 있으며, 현재 응고인자 XI에 작용하는 새로운 NOAC가 개발되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The indications for NOAC are gradually expanding, and new NOACs that act on coagulation factor XI are being developed.
data.target_sentence: The indications for NOACs are gradually expanding, and new NOACs that act on coagulation factor XI are being developed.

data.source_sentence: 아직 밝혀지지 않은 NOAC의 여러 적용 가능한 상황 및 안전한 사용을 위한 여러 연구들이 현재 진행되고 있어 이에 대한 지속적인 관심이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Various applicable situations and studies for safe use of NOAC, which have not yet been identified, are currently underway, and continuous attention is needed.
data.target_sentence: Various application situations and studies for the safe use of NOAC, which have not yet been identified, are in progress, and continuous attention is required.

data.source_sentence: 우리나라 성인 인구 중에서 38.4%가 이상지혈증을 가지고 있으며, 5명 중에서 2명이 약물 치료를 받는다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the Korean adult population, 38.4% have dyslipidemia, and 2 out of 5 people receive drug treatment.
data.target_sentence: 38.4% of the Korean adult population suffers from dyslipidemia, and 2 out of 5 are receiving drug treatment.

data.source_sentence: 약물 중에서 가장 많이 사용하고 있는 것이 스타틴이며, 약물 치료를 하고 있는 5명 중에서 4명이 스타틴을 사용하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Among drugs, statins are the most used, and 4 out of 5 people who are on drug treatment are using statins.
data.target_sentence: Among drugs, statins are the most used, and 4 out of 5 people who are on medication are using statins.

data.source_sentence: 이상지질혈증의 치료에는 스타틴이 탁월한 효능을 가지고 있으나, 동시에 여러 가지 부작용을 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Statins have excellent efficacy in the treatment of dyslipidemia, but they have various side effects at the same time.
data.target_sentence: Statins have excellent efficacy in the treatment of dyslipidemia, but at the same time have various side effects.

data.source_sentence: 스타틴을 이용한여러 임상 연구에서 근육 손상이 발생한다고 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Several clinical studies using statins are known to cause muscle damage.
data.target_sentence: Several clinical studies with statins are known to cause muscle damage.

data.source_sentence: 근육통(myalgia)은 크레아틴인산화효소(creatine phosphoki-nase) 농도의 증가가 동반되지 않는 근육의 통증(muscle pain)을 말한다.
data.mt_sentence: Myalgia refers to muscle pain that is not accompanied by an increase in creatine phosphoki-nase concentration.
data.target_sentence: Myalgia is muscle pain that is not accompanied by an increase in creatine phosphokinase concentration.

data.source_sentence: 근육괴사(myonecrosis)는 크레아틴인산화 효소 농도가 증가된 경우를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Muscle necrosis (myonecrosis) refers to a case in which the concentration of creatine kinase is increased.
data.target_sentence: Myonecrosis refers to an increased concentration of creatine kinase.

data.source_sentence: 분포, 근육통 발생과 스타틴 복용과의 시간적 상관관계, 스타틴 중단 후의 호전 여부, 스타틴을 다시 복용한 후 근육통 재발 여부 등을 감안하여 점수를 계산한다.
data.mt_sentence: The score is calculated by considering the distribution, the temporal correlation between muscle pain occurrence and statin administration, improvement after statin suspension, and recurrence of muscle pain after taking statin again.
data.target_sentence: The score is calculated considering the distribution, temporal correlation between the occurrence of myalgia and statin administration, improvement after discontinuation of statin, and recurrence of myalgia after statin re-administration.

data.source_sentence: 의사는 근육통이나 근육병증이 발생하면 스타틴을 중단하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Doctors stop statins when muscle pain or muscular disease occurs.
data.target_sentence: When a patient develops muscle pain or myopathy in the body, the doctor gives the patient a statin

data.source_sentence: 스타틴을 중단할 경우 혈관 질환의 발병 가능성이 증가하므로 근육통 등이 발생할 경우 스타틴의 부작용 때문인지 다른 원인에 의한 근육통인지를 감별하는 것은 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: When statins are discontinued, the likelihood of developing vascular disease increases, so it is important to determine whether muscle pain is caused by side effects of statins or other causes when muscle pain occurs.
data.target_sentence: Since stopping statins increases the likelihood of vascular disease, it is important to determine whether muscle pain is due to side effects of statins or other causes when muscle pain occurs.

data.source_sentence: 캐나다, 대만, 미국의 임상 진료 지침은 스타틴에 의한 근육통의 진단에 스타틴 근육통 임상 지수를 근간으로 한 점수 시스템을 사용할 것을 권고하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Clinical practice guidelines in Canada, Taiwan, and the United States recommend using a scoring system based on the Statin Myalgia Clinical Index for the diagnosis of statin-induced myalgia.
data.target_sentence: Clinical practice guidelines in Canada, Taiwan, and the United States recommend the use of a scoring system based on the Statin Myalgia Clinical Index for the diagnosis of statin-induced myalgia.

data.source_sentence: 동의를 받기 전에 환자에게 근육통의 발병률을 보는 연구임을 설명하였고, 동의 후 배부한 안내문에 근육통을 비롯한 아토르바스타틴의 부작용에 대해 기재하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Before consent was obtained, it was explained to the patient that the study looked at the incidence of myalgia, and side effects of atorvastatin, including myalgia, were described in the information distributed after consent.
data.target_sentence: Before obtaining consent, the incidence of myalgia was reviewed and side effects of atorvastatin, including myalgia, were explained to the patient, and the information distributed after consent was explained.

data.source_sentence: 중간 방문 시에 총 콜레스테롤, 중성 지방, 저밀도 지질 단백질 콜레스테롤, 고밀도 지질 단백질 콜레스테롤, 아스파트산아미노기 전달효소(aspartate aminotransferase), 알라닌아미노 전달 효소(alanineaminotransferase), 크레아틴인산화 효소 검사를 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Total cholesterol, neutral fat, low-density lipoprotein cholesterol, high-density lipoprotein cholesterol, aspartate aminotransferase, alanine aminotransferase, and creatine phosphorylation were tested during the interim visit.
data.target_sentence: Total cholesterol, triglycerides, low-density lipoprotein cholesterol, high-density lipoprotein cholesterol, aspartate aminotransferase, alanine aminotransferase, and creatine phosphorylation were tested during the interim visit.

data.source_sentence: 아토르바스타틴의 투여 용량은 80 mg 이하의 범위에서 연구 대상자의 상태에 따라 연구자의 판단으로 정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The dosage of atorvastatin was determined by the researcher's judgment according to the condition of the study subject in the range of 80 mg or less.
data.target_sentence: The dosage of atorvastatin was determined at the discretion of the investigator according to the condition of the subject in the range of 80 mg or less.

data.source_sentence: 근육통이 발생하는 경우 추가적으로 외래를 방문하도록 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If muscle pain occurred, an additional outpatient visit was made.
data.target_sentence: If muscle pain occurred, an additional outpatient visit was made.

data.source_sentence: 근육통을 호소할 경우 근육통의 발현일, 종료일, 근육통의 위치를 기록하고 혈청 크레아틴인산화 효소 농도 검사를 시행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In case of complaint of muscle pain, the onset date, end date, and location of myalgia were recorded, and serum creatine kinase concentration test was performed.
data.target_sentence: In case of complaints of muscle pain, the start date, end date, and location of the myalgia were recorded, and serum creatine kinase concentration was tested.

data.source_sentence: 근육통이 발생한 환자의 치료는 2017년에 유럽심장학회/유럽죽상경화학회에서 제안한 치료 알고리듬을 기본으로 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The treatment of patients with muscle pain was based on the treatment algorithm proposed by the European Society of Cardiology/European Atherosclerosis Society in 2017.
data.target_sentence: The treatment of myalgia patients was based on a treatment algorithm proposed by the European Society of Cardiology/European Society for Atherosclerosis in 2017.

data.source_sentence: 크레아틴인산화 효소 농도가 정상 상한치의 4배보다 낮으면 2주 이상 아토르바스타틴을 중단하고, 4배 이상이면 6주 이상 중단하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If the creatine kinase concentration was lower than 4 times the upper limit of normal, atorvastatin was stopped for 2 weeks or more, and if it was 4 times or more, it was stopped for 6 weeks or more.
data.target_sentence: If the creatine kinase concentration was less than 4 times the upper limit of normal, atorvastatin was stopped for 2 weeks or more, and if it was 4 times or more, it was stopped for 6 weeks or more.

data.source_sentence: 6주 이상 중단하여도 증상 호전이 없으면, 스타틴에 의한 증상이 아닐 것으로 판단하여 다시 스타틴을 투여하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If symptoms did not improve even after stopping for more than 6 weeks, it was judged that the symptoms were not caused by statins and statins were administered again.
data.target_sentence: If symptoms did not improve after stopping for more than 6 weeks, it was judged that the symptoms were not caused by statins, and statins were administered again.

data.source_sentence: 아토르바스타틴을 중단한 후 근육통이 사라진 경우 아토르바스타틴을 중단하기 직전 크레아틴인산화 효소 농도에 따라 다르게 치료하였다.
data.mt_sentence: If muscle pain disappeared after Atorvastatin was discontinued, it was treated differently depending on the concentration of creatine phosphorylation enzyme just before Atorvastatin was discontinued.
data.target_sentence: If myalgia disappeared after discontinuation of atorvastatin, treatment was performed differently depending on the creatine kinase concentration immediately before discontinuation of atorvastatin.

data.source_sentence: 크레아틴인산화 효소 농도가 정상 상한치의 4배 이하이면, 곧 다른 종류의 스타틴, 다른 기전의 지질 저하 약물 또는 더 낮은 용량의 아토르바스타틴을 시작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the creatine kinase concentration was less than 4 times the upper limit of normal, another type of statin, a lipid-lowering drug of a different mechanism, or a lower dose of atorvastatin was started immediately.
data.target_sentence: If the creatine kinase concentration was less than 4 times the upper limit of normal, another type of statin, a lipid-lowering drug of a different mechanism, or a lower dose of atorvastatin was immediately started.

data.source_sentence: 크레아틴인산화 효소 농도가 정상 상한치의 4배 이상이면 크레아틴인산화 효소 농도, 크레아티닌이 모두 정상화한 것을 확인한 후 다른 종류의 스타틴, 다른 기전의 지질 저하 약물 또는 더 낮은 용량의 아토르바스타틴을 시작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the creatine kinase concentration was 4 times or more of the upper limit of normal, it was confirmed that both the creatine kinase concentration and creatinine were normalized, and then another type of statin, a lipid-lowering drug of a different mechanism, or a lower dose of atorvastatin was started.
data.target_sentence: If the creatine kinase concentration was more than 4 times the upper limit of normal, after confirming that both the creatine kinase concentration and creatinine were normalized, another type of statin, a lipid-lowering agent of a different mechanism, or a lower atorvastatin administration was started.

data.source_sentence: 스타틴 근육통 임상 지수는 근육통의 분포, 근육통 발생과 스타틴 복용과의 시간적 상관관계, 스타틴 중단 후의 호전 여부, 스타틴을 다시 복용한 후 근육통 재발 여부 등을 감안하여 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The statin muscle pain clinical index was calculated in consideration of the distribution of muscle pain, the temporal correlation between muscle pain occurrence and statin administration, improvement after statin suspension, and recurrence of muscle pain after taking statin again.
data.target_sentence: The statin myalgia clinical index was calculated considering the distribution of myalgia, the temporal correlation between the occurrence of myalgia and statin administration, improvement after discontinuation of statin, and recurrence of myalgia after statin re-administration.

data.source_sentence: 스타틴과 관련이 있는 근육 증상의 가능성은 가능성이 적음(7점 미만), 가능성이 있음(7 또는 8점), 상당히 확실함(9-11점)으로 다시 분류하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The likelihood of statin-related muscle symptoms was reclassified as unlikely (less than 7 points), likely (7 or 8 points), and fairly certain (9-11 points).
data.target_sentence: The likelihood of statin-related muscle symptoms was reclassified as unlikely (scores less than 7), likely (scores 7 or 8), and fairly certain (scores 9-11).

data.source_sentence: 중간 방문을 하지 않은 환자는 연구에서 제외하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Patients who did not have an intermediate visit were excluded from the study.
data.target_sentence: Patients without an interim visit were excluded from the study.

data.source_sentence: 종료 방문을 하지 않은 연구 대상자에 대해서는 마지막 자료 수집 시점까지의 모든 자료를 분석에 포함시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: For study subjects who did not have a termination visit, all data up to the time of the last data collection were included in the analysis.
data.target_sentence: For study subjects without a termination visit, all data up to the time of the last data collection were included in the analysis.

data.source_sentence: 분석에 포함되는 전체 환자들 중에서 근육통이 발생한 환자의 분율을 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among all patients included in the analysis, the proportion of patients with muscle pain was calculated.
data.target_sentence: The proportion of patients with myalgia among all patients included in the analysis was calculated.

data.source_sentence: 근육통 환자들의 스타틴 근육통 임상 지수를 계산하여 근육통이 스타틴에 의한 것일 ‘가능성이 있음’이거나 ‘상당히 확실함’에 해당하는 환자의 분율을 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The statin muscle pain clinical index of muscle pain patients was calculated to calculate the fraction of patients who were "possibly" or "pretty sure" that muscle pain was caused by statins.
data.target_sentence: The Clinical Index of Statin-Related Muscle Symptoms in Patients with Myalgia was calculated to calculate the proportion of patients who were “likely” or “very confident” that myalgia was induced by a statin.

data.source_sentence: 이 중 10명의 환자는 외래를 재방문하지 않았으므로 89명의 환자를 분석에 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Of these, 10 patients did not revisit the outpatient clinic, so 89 patients were used for analysis.
data.target_sentence: Of these, 10 patients did not return to the outpatient clinic, so 89 patients were used for the analysis.

data.source_sentence: 아토르바스타틴을 투여하기 전에 측정한 저밀도 지질 단백질 콜레스테롤의 평균값은 151 ± 34 mg/dL였다.
data.mt_sentence: The mean value of low-density lipoprotein cholesterol measured before atorvastatin administration was 151 ± 34 mg/dL.
data.target_sentence: The mean value of low-density lipoprotein cholesterol measured before atorvastatin administration was 151 ± 34 mg/dL.

data.source_sentence: 가장 많이 사용한 아토르바스타틴의 용량은 10 mg (53%)이었고 그 다음으로 많이 사용한 용량은 20 mg (19%)이었다.

data.source_sentence: 스타틴을 사용한 무작위 배정 임상 시험 12개를 메타 분석을 하였을 때 스타틴을 사용한 환자군과 위약을 사용한 환자군에서 근육통의 발생에는 의미 있는 차이가 없었다.

data.source_sentence: 이것은 4개의 실행 역량으로 구성되는데, 신뢰가 바탕이 되는 치료 관계 형성, 치료 계획 수립에 참여, 환자 및 환자 가족의 가치·선호·필요의 존중, 차별 없는 공정한 대우이다.

data.target_sentence: It consists of four execution capabilities: forming a treatment relationship based on trust, participating in treatment planning, respecting the values and preferences of patients and their families, respect for their needs, and fair treatment without discrimination.

data.source_sentence: 환자와 환자 가족의 말을 경청하고 공감적으로 의사소통하는 것이다.

data.target_sentence: Accurately and accurately accepting the feelings, thoughts, and expressions of a patient or patient's family without bias, understanding and retransmitting it from the patient's point of view.

data.mt_sentence: Empathic communication makes it possible for the other person to feel respected and understood, thus enabling the formation of positive relationships.
data.target_sentence: Empathic communication allows the other person to feel respected and understood, thus building positive relationships.

data.source_sentence: 이것은 2개의 실행 역량으로 구성되는데, 환자와 환자 가족의 입장에서 경청하는 것과 이를 공감하여 언어적, 비언어적으로 표현하는 것이다.

data.target_sentence: It consists of two executive competencies: listening from the patient's and patient's family's point of view, empathizing with it, and expressing it verbally and non-verbally.

data.mt_sentence: It consists of three executive competencies: fully explaining to patients and carers before seeking consent, responding appropriately to questions or complaints, and seeking understanding and cooperation.

data.source_sentence: 이것은 효과적인 협진과 의뢰를 통한 동료 의사와의 협력 및 최선의 치료 결과라는 목적을 가지고 진료팀 내에서 함께 협력하여 활동할 수 있는 의사의 역량을 말한다.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통하여 마일스톤과 EPA 개발이 더 구체적인 대상을 향한 것으로 만들어질 수 있도록 하였다.

data.mt_sentence: Important aspects of public health activities include infection prevention, environmental hygiene, nutrition, and physical strength promotion activities.
data.target_sentence: Important aspects of public health activities include infection prevention, environmental hygiene, nutrition and fitness promotion activities.

data.source_sentence: 환자를 대상으로 할 때는 환자의 돌봄이 진료실에서 치료의 차원에 멈추지 않고, 지역 사회가 가진 다양한 자원과 서비스를 통해 건강을 증진할 수 있도록 연계할 수 있어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: When targeting patients, patient care should not stop at the level of treatment in the clinic, but should be linked to improve health through various resources and services that the community has.
data.target_sentence: When it comes to patient care, patient care goes beyond clinic treatment and must be linked to the resources and services communities need to improve their health.

data.source_sentence: 지역 사회의 주민에 대해서는 보건 의료의 필요(요구) 상황에서 공중 보건 활동(예방, 개선 등)에 의료 전문가로 참여한다.
data.mt_sentence: For residents of the community, they participate as medical experts in public health activities (prevention, improvement, etc.) in the context of the need (demand) for health care.
data.target_sentence: Engage as health care professionals in public health activities (prevention, improvement, etc.) in the context of health care needs (demand) for community residents.

data.source_sentence: 의사는 의료 전문가로서 사회가 요구하는 사항에 대하여 응할 책임을 갖는다.
data.mt_sentence: As a medical professional, doctors are responsible for responding to the demands of society.
data.target_sentence: As healthcare professionals, doctors have a responsibility to serve the needs of society.

data.source_sentence: 국가적인 수준에서는 올바른 의학 정보를 가지고 국민의 건강을 보호하고 증진할 수 있도록 전문성을 발휘할 수 있어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: At the national level, it is necessary to be able to exercise expertise to protect and promote the health of the people with the right medical information.
data.target_sentence: At the national level, in order to protect and promote the health of the people with correct medical information, it is necessary to exercise expertise.

data.source_sentence: 형평성이란 동등한 자를 동등하게, 동등하지 않은 자를 동등하지 않게 취급하는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Equity means treating equal people equally and unequal people equally.
data.target_sentence: Equality means treating equals equally and treating unequal people unequal.

data.source_sentence: 보건 의료 리더로서 의사의 역할은 사회적-경제적 불평등이 건강의 불평등을 초래하지 않도록 보건 의료 형평성을 강화하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The role of physicians as health care leaders is to strengthen health care equity so that social-economic inequalities do not lead to health inequalities.
data.target_sentence: The role of physicians as healthcare leaders is to strengthen healthcare equity so that socio-economic inequality does not lead to health inequality.

data.source_sentence: 보건 의료 분야에서의 취약 계층은 의료 서비스 자원 이용에 제약이 있거나 질병에 걸릴 위험이 큰 인구 집단으로 정의할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Vulnerable groups in the health care sector can be defined as population groups with limited access to health care resources or a high risk of disease.
data.target_sentence: Vulnerable populations in healthcare can be defined as populations with limited access to health care resources or a high risk of disease.

data.source_sentence: 어린이와 노인, 임산부 등은 건강한 성인 남성보다 더 자주 감염성 질환에 걸릴 수 있고 장애나 후유증이 클 수 있기 때문에 건강 취약 계층으로 분류된다.
data.mt_sentence: Children, the elderly, and pregnant women are classified as vulnerable to health because they can develop infectious diseases more often than healthy adult men and have greater disabilities or aftereffects.
data.target_sentence: Children, the elderly and pregnant women are classified as vulnerable to health because infectious diseases occur more frequently and have greater disability or sequelae than healthy adult men.

data.source_sentence: 이 밖에도 환경 유해 인자에 노출되었을 때 민감한 인구 집단인 생물학적 약자와 사회·경제적 약자인 저소득층도 보건 의료 취약 계층에 포함된다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, the biologically weak, which are sensitive population groups when exposed to environmental harmful factors, and the low-income class, which are socio-economically weak, are included in the vulnerable group in health care.
data.target_sentence: In addition, when exposed to environmental harmful factors, the biologically weak and socioeconomically vulnerable low-income class, which are sensitive population groups, are included in the medically vulnerable class.

data.source_sentence: 국가는 보건 의료 발전 계획을 수립하여 시행해야 하는 것으로 되어 있으며, 평생 국민 건강 관리 사업을 통해 여성과 어린이, 노인, 장애인의 건강 증진 등에 대한 규정을 두어 국민의 건강권을 보호하도록 하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The state is supposed to establish and implement a health and medical development plan, and through lifelong national health management projects, regulations on health promotion of women, children, the elderly and the disabled are in place to protect the people's right to health.
data.target_sentence: The state establishes and implements health and medical development plans and protects the people's right to health by preparing regulations on health promotion of women, children, the elderly and the disabled as a lifelong health management project.

data.source_sentence: 국민의 건강권을 보호하는 데 있어서 건강 불평등이 있다면 이를 개선하고, 보건 의료의 형평성을 강화하는 것은 의사가 사회 속에서 리더로서의 역할을 수행하며 지향해야 할 목표이다.
data.mt_sentence: When it comes to protecting the people's right to health, improving health inequality, if any, and strengthening equity in health care are the goals that doctors should aim for as they perform their role as leaders in society.
data.target_sentence: Improving medical inequalities in relation to the protection of the people's right to health and strengthening medical equity are the goals that doctors should aim for while fulfilling their role as leaders in society.

data.source_sentence: 보건 의료 자원은 건강을 잘 지속시키거나 손상된 건강을 복구시키기 위하여 전문가나 의료 서비스 기관이 사용할 수 있는 총체적인 인적, 물적 자원을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Health and medical resources refer to the total human and material resources that can be used by specialists or medical service institutions to maintain health well or restore damaged health.
data.target_sentence: Health and medical resources refer to the totality of human and material resources that experts or medical institutions can use to maintain health or recover damaged health.

data.source_sentence: 효율성의 범주에는 임상적 효과, 비용-효과성, 재정 영향 등이 있고, 형평성의 범주에는 치료받을 권리, 취약 계층에 대한 보호, 희귀 질환에 대한 고려 등이 주로 언급된다.
data.mt_sentence: The categories of efficiency include clinical effectiveness, cost-effectiveness, and financial impact, and the categories of equity mainly mention the right to treatment, protection against vulnerable groups, and consideration of rare diseases.
data.target_sentence: Efficiency categories include clinical effectiveness, cost-effectiveness, and financial impact, while equity categories primarily include rights to treatment, protection of the vulnerable, and consideration of rare diseases.

data.source_sentence: 보건 의료의 형평성을 강화하기 위한 소역량에는 보건 의료에 투입되는 모든 자원을 배분하는 데 있어서 공정한 활용을 통해 불균형을 해소하여 보건 의료의 형평성을 확보하는 것이 포함된다.
data.mt_sentence: The small capacity to strengthen equity in health care includes securing equity in health care by resolving imbalances through fair use in allocating all resources invested in health care.
data.target_sentence: A small capacity to strengthen health equity includes ensuring health equity by resolving disparities by using all resources invested in health care fairly.

data.source_sentence: 보건 의료 사회의 변화는 필연적으로 의사에 대한 기대 역할의 변화를 불러온다.
data.mt_sentence: Changes in the health care society inevitably lead to changes in the expected role of doctors.
data.target_sentence: Changes in the medical society inevitably lead to changes in the expected roles of doctors.

data.source_sentence: 의사는 보건 의료의 리더로서 미래 변화에 대응할수 있도록 준비를 해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Physicians, as leaders in health care, must be prepared to respond to future changes.
data.target_sentence: Physicians, as leaders in healthcare, must be prepared to respond to the changes of the future.

data.source_sentence: 의사는 의학 지식과 기술을 환자에게 잘 적용하여 질병을 치유해야 하는 동시에 직업의 특성상 질병을 가지고 있는 환자를 직접 다루어야 하기 때문에 그 과정에서 의학 전문 직업성(medicalprofessionalism)을 실천해야 하는 책무를 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Doctors have a responsibility to practice medical professionalism in the process because they have to directly deal with patients with diseases due to the nature of their jobs while at the same time applying medical knowledge and skills to patients.
data.target_sentence: Physicians are responsible for practicing medical professionalism in the process because they must directly deal with sick patients and apply medical knowledge and skills to them due to the nature of their profession.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 의학 전문 직업성이란 대중이 의사 또는 의료 시스템에 대하여 가지고 있는 신뢰를 증진시키는 일련의 가치, 행동, 관계를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, medical professionalism refers to a set of values, behaviors, and relationships that enhance the public's trust in doctors or the health care system.
data.target_sentence: Medical professionalism here refers to a set of values, behaviors, and relationships that increase public trust in doctors or the health care system.

data.source_sentence: 즉 의학 직업 전문성은 의사가 대중으로부터 신뢰를 받을 자격이 있다는 것을 증명하는 태도로 구성할 수 있는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: In other words, medical professional expertise can be constructed as an attitude that proves that doctors are worthy of public trust.
data.target_sentence: In other words, doctors can build the professionalism of medical professionals with the attitude that they can receive the trust of the public.

data.source_sentence: 이 정의에 따라 의학 전문 직업성은 의사가 가져야 하는 신념과 철학으로도 설명될수 있기 때문에 관념적인 개념으로 간주되기도 한다.
data.mt_sentence: According to this definition, medical professionalism is also regarded as an ideological concept because it can also be explained by the beliefs and philosophies that a physician should have.
data.target_sentence: According to this definition, medical professionalism is also considered an ideological concept because it can also be explained by the beliefs and philosophies that a physician should have.

data.source_sentence: 의학 전문 직업성은 의사가 실제로 무엇을 해야 하고, 개별적으로 또는 집단적으로 어떻게 행동해야 하는지에 근거하여 다루어져야 하기 때문에 실제적 개념에 따라 정의될 필요가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Medical professionalism needs to be defined in terms of practical concepts because it must be dealt with based on what physicians should actually do and how they should behave individually or collectively.
data.target_sentence: Medical professionalism needs to be defined as a pragmatic concept because it must be dealt with according to what physicians are actually supposed to do and how to behave individually or collectively.

data.source_sentence: 본 ‘한국의 환자 중심 의사 역량’에서는 의사가 의학 전문 직업성을 실천할 수 있는 역량을 ‘전문 직업인으로서 자신에 대한 역량’으로 제시하면서 범위를 분명하게 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this 'patient-centered physician competency in Korea', the scope was clearly set by presenting the competence of a doctor to practice medical professionalism as 'competence for oneself as a professional'.
data.target_sentence: In this 'Patient-Centered Korean Physician Competency', the scope of doctors practicing medical expertise is clarified by presenting them as 'one's own competence as an expert'.

data.source_sentence: 의학 전문 직업성을 실천하는 활동 영역은 개별 의사가 할 수 있는 부분과 개별 의사가 모인 의사 집단(또는 단체)이 할 수 있는 부분으로 구분되어 제시되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The area of activity for practicing medical professionalism was presented as a part that individual doctors could do and a part that a group (or group) of individual doctors could do.
data.target_sentence: The areas of activity for practicing medical professionalism were presented as what individual doctors can do and what individual groups of doctors (or groups) can do.

data.source_sentence: 의사 개인이 전문 직업인으로서 보건 의료 활동을 수행하면서 갖추어야 하는 개인의 신념과 가치, 규범, 행동을 윤리성, 자율성, 자기 관리로 구체화하여 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The personal beliefs, values, norms, and behaviors that an individual doctor must have while performing health care activities as a professional are concretely presented as ethics, autonomy, and self-management.
data.target_sentence: The personal beliefs, values, norms, and behaviors that an individual doctor should have while performing health care activities as an expert are specifically presented as ethics, autonomy, and self-management.

data.source_sentence: 윤리성 관련 역량은 ‘의료 윤리 준수’로, 자율성 관련 역량은 ‘의사 주도의 자율 규제 참여’로, 자기 관리 역량은 ‘자기 관리 및 동료 보호’로 구성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Ethics-related competencies consist of 'compliance with medical ethics', autonomy-related competencies consist of 'doctor-led participation in self-regulation', and self-management competencies consist of 'self-management and peer protection'.
data.target_sentence: Ethics-related competency consists of 'medical ethics compliance', autonomy competency consists of 'doctor-led self-regulation participation', and self-management competency consists of 'self-management and peer protection'.

data.source_sentence: 이것은 5개의 실행 역량으로 구성되는데, 진료 과정에서 발생할 수 있는 윤리적 차원의 문제 인식과 대응, 의료 윤리를 준수하기 위해 인지해야 하는 규정 및 지침, 이해 상충에 대한 인식과 관리, 개인 정보 보호, 환자 비밀 보호 등이다.
data.mt_sentence: It consists of five executive competencies: recognition and response to ethical issues that may arise in the course of care, regulations and guidelines that must be recognized to comply with medical ethics, awareness and management of conflicts of interest, privacy, and patient confidentiality.
data.target_sentence: Consists of five management competencies: awareness and response to ethical issues that may arise during the treatment process, regulations and guidelines that must be recognized for compliance with medical ethics, awareness and management of conflicts of interest, protection of personal information, and maintenance of patient confidentiality became.

data.source_sentence: 의료 행위의 적절성에 대한 판단은 의학 전문 지식을 갖춘 의사만이 정확하게 판단할 수 있는 부분이 있기 때문에 외부 집단에서 관여하는 것은 오히려 오류를 범할 가능성이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the judgment on the appropriateness of medical practice can only be accurately judged by doctors with medical expertise, involvement in external groups is rather likely to make errors.
data.target_sentence: Since only a doctor with medical expertise can accurately judge the adequacy of treatment, participation of an outside group is more likely to make an error.

data.source_sentence: 더욱이 진료실이라는 공간은 의사 개인이 진료하는 곳이므로 외부의 감독으로부터 자유로울 수밖에 없기 때문에 의사 스스로가 의료 행위에 대하여 엄격한 기준을 적용해야 하는 측면이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Moreover, since the space called the treatment room is a place where individual doctors treat themselves, there is no choice but to be free from external supervision.
data.target_sentence: In addition, since the space called the treatment room is a space where individual doctors perform treatment, they must be free from external supervision, so doctors must apply strict standards for treatment themselves.

data.source_sentence: 사실에 근거할 때 의사 주도로 이루어지는 자율 규제에 의사가 참여하는 것은 매우 중요한 의미를 가지며, 의사가 주도적으로 자율 규제에 참여했을 때 환자의 안전과 이익에 더 긍정적인 영향을 미칠 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the facts, it is very important for doctors to participate in self-regulation led by doctors, and when doctors take the initiative in self-regulation, it can have a more positive effect on patients' safety and interests.
data.target_sentence: In light of the facts, it is very important for doctors to participate in self-regulation led by doctors, and if doctors take the lead in self-regulation, it can have a more positive effect on the safety and benefits of patients.

data.source_sentence: 이것은 3개의 실행 역량으로 구성되며, 자율 규제의 이해 및 관련 활동, 자신의 의료 행위에 대한 성찰, 동료 의사의 비윤리적 행위에 대한 대응 역량들이다.
data.mt_sentence: It consists of three executive competencies: understanding self-regulation and related activities, reflecting on one's own medical practice, and responding to the unethical behavior of fellow doctors.
data.target_sentence: It is composed of three executive competencies: understanding self-regulation and related activities, reflecting on one's own medical treatment, and responding to unethical behaviors of fellow doctors.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라 의학 전문성을 성공적으로 발휘하기 위해 의사 개인이 갖출 수 있는 역량으로서 ‘자기 관리 및 동료 보호’를 직업 전문성의 세 번째 역량으로 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, 'self-management and protection of colleagues' was presented as the third competency of vocational expertise as a competency that an individual doctor can possess in order to successfully demonstrate medical professionalism.
data.target_sentence: Accordingly, 'self-management and peer protection' is a competency that individual physicians must have in order to successfully demonstrate medical expertise, and is presented as the third competency of professional expertise.

data.source_sentence: 이 역량은 의사 자신의 전문성을 최대한 발휘하기 위하여 자신의 건강 상태 및 주변 진료 환경이 최상의 상태로 유지되도록 관리하는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This competency means managing a doctor's health condition and surrounding care environment to maintain the best possible condition in order to maximize his/her professionalism.
data.target_sentence: This competency means maintaining your best health by managing your own health and the surrounding medical environment to maximize your professionalism.

data.source_sentence: ‘의학 발전에 기여하는 사람’은 의학이라는 학문에 대한 역량으로, 학문적 전문성을 지속적으로 개발하고, 동료 및 예비 의사들의 학습을 촉진하며, 의학의 발전을 위한 탐구에 참여하는 의사 역량을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: A 'contributor to the development of medicine' refers to the competence of the discipline of medicine, which means the competence of doctors to continuously develop academic professionalism, to facilitate the learning of fellow and prospective doctors, and to participate in the quest for the advancement of medicine.
data.target_sentence: Contributor to medical advancement' refers to competence in the field of medicine, the capacity of physicians to continue to develop academic professionalism, to facilitate the learning of peers and prospective physicians, and to engage in the quest for advances in medicine.

data.source_sentence: 이 역량은 대학에서 근무하는 의사들에게만 해당되는 내용이 아니라 봉직의 또는 개원 의사에게도 필수적인 내용으로 규정된다.
data.mt_sentence: This competency is defined not only for doctors working at universities, but also as essential for practicing doctors or practicing doctors.
data.target_sentence: This competency is defined as essential not only for physicians working in universities, but also for physicians on a stipend or owning a private hospital.

data.source_sentence: 특히 ‘연구’ 대신 ‘탐구’라는 용어를 사용하여 봉직의, 개원의도 의료 현장 속에서 비판적․ 과학적 접근을 통해 의학 발전에 기여하는 사람으로서의 역량을 강조하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, by using the term 'investigation' instead of 'research', the intention to open a hospital is critical and critical in the medical field. He emphasized his competence as a person who contributes to the advancement of medicine through a scientific approach.
data.target_sentence: In particular, the term 'inquiry' is used instead of 'research' to emphasize the competence of people who contribute to medical development, such as salaried doctors and private hospital-owned doctors, through a critical and scientific approach in the medical field.

data.source_sentence: 유사한 내용을 한국의 의사상(2014)에는 교육과 연구 두 항목으로 기술하였는데, 교육은 본 역량 제안에서의 ‘의사의 학습 촉진’과, 연구는 ‘의학적 탐구’와 비슷하다.
data.mt_sentence: Similar contents were described in the Korean Physician Award (2014) in two categories: education and research. Education is similar to 'promoting doctor's learning' and research is similar to 'medical inquiry' in this competency proposal.
data.target_sentence: The role of doctors in Korea (2014) describes similar content in two categories: education and research. In this competency proposal, education is analogous to 'facilitating physician learning' and 'medical inquiry' to research.

data.source_sentence: 캐나다 역량(CanMEDS, 2015)은 scholar 영역하에 지속적 전문성 개발, 의사의 학습 촉진, 의학적 탐구 역량 내용을 모두 포함하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Canadian competency (CanMEDS, 2015) includes all contents of continuous professional development, doctor's learning promotion, and medical inquiry competency under the scope of Scholar.

data.mt_sentence: Empathize with the suffering of patients and their families and express them appropriately verbally or non-verbally.
data.target_sentence: Physicians must empathize with the suffering of patients and their families and express them verbally or non-verbally as appropriate.

data.source_sentence: 환자와 그 가족에게 질문이나 발언할 시간을 충분히 주고, 질문이나 요구에는 적절한 응대를 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Give patients and their families enough time to ask questions or speak, and respond appropriately to questions or requests.
data.target_sentence: Physicians should give patients and families sufficient time to ask or speak questions and respond appropriately to questions or requests.

data.source_sentence: 최선의 진료를 위하여 필요하면 다른 의사에게 협진을 요청하거나 진료를 의뢰한다.
data.mt_sentence: For the best treatment, if necessary, ask another doctor for cooperation or referral.
data.target_sentence: For best treatment, doctors should ask other doctors for help or referrals when necessary.

data.source_sentence: 협진 의사와 의뢰 의사를 존중하며 환자와 그 가족의 동의를 받은 환자 관련 정보를 충분히 제공한다.
data.mt_sentence: It respects the cooperative doctor and the willingness to request, and sufficiently provides patient-related information with the consent of the patient and his family.
data.target_sentence: Physicians must cooperate and respect the referring physician and provide sufficient information about the patient with the consent of the patient and family.

data.source_sentence: 진료팀의 구성원으로서 맡은 역할과 책임을 충실히 수행한다.
data.mt_sentence: As a member of the medical team, faithfully fulfill their roles and responsibilities.
data.target_sentence: Doctors faithfully perform their roles and responsibilities as a member of the medical team.

data.source_sentence: 진료팀의 구성원으로서 팀원들의 직무 전문성을 존중하며, 그들이 역할을 잘 수행할 수 있도록 협력한다.
data.mt_sentence: As a member of the medical treatment team, we respect the professionalism of the team members and cooperate so that they can perform their roles well.
data.target_sentence: Physicians, as members of the medical team, respect the professionalism of the medical staff and cooperate to perform their duties well.

data.source_sentence: 팀원들 사이에 있을 수 있는 갈등과 이해 상충 상황 등을 인지하며 그 해결을 위하여 노력한다.
data.mt_sentence: Recognize potential conflicts and conflicts of interest among team members and strive to resolve them.
data.target_sentence: Physicians should recognize and work to resolve potential conflicts and conflicts of interest among team members.

data.source_sentence: 환자 돌봄의 질을 향상하기 위하여 지속적으로 팀을 평가하고 개선한다.
data.mt_sentence: Continuously evaluate and improve the team to improve the quality of patient care.
data.target_sentence: Physicians must continually evaluate and improve their team to improve the quality of patient care.

data.source_sentence: 의사는 리더(leader)로서 사회에 대하여 다음과 같은 역량을 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: Doctors, as leaders, have the following competencies for society.
data.target_sentence: Doctors, as leaders, should have the following competencies for society.

data.source_sentence: 건강 증진을 위하여 다양한 공중 보건 활동과 사회적 의사 결정에 참여한다.
data.mt_sentence: Participate in a variety of public health activities and social decision-making to promote health.
data.target_sentence: Physicians should participate in various public health activities and social decision-making for health promotion.

data.source_sentence: 보건 의료의 형평성 강화(improving equity in healthcare)란 의료 자원의 효율적 배분을 통하여 건강 불평등을 개선한다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Improving equity in healthcare means improving health inequality through efficient allocation of medical resources.
data.target_sentence: Improving equity in healthcare means improving health inequality by allocating health care resources efficiently.

data.source_sentence: 미래의 보건 의료 변화에 대응할 수 있는 준비를 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Prepare to respond to future health care changes.
data.target_sentence: Physicians must be prepared to respond to future medical changes.

data.source_sentence: 의사 주도의 자율 규제 참여(participating in doctors-ledself regulation)란 의사 주도의 자율 규제 원칙을 준수하고 관련 활동에 적극적으로 참여한다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Participating in doctors-led self-regulation means that they comply with the principle of self-regulation led by doctors and actively participate in related activities.
data.target_sentence: Participating in doctors-led self-regulation means complying with the principles of doctor-led self-regulation and actively participating in related activities.

data.source_sentence: 의사는 의학 발전에 기여하는 사람(scholar)으로서 학문에 대하여 다음과 같은 역량을 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: As a scholar who contributes to the advancement of medicine, a doctor has the following competencies in the field of study.
data.target_sentence: Doctors, as scholars who contribute to the development of medicine, must have the following abilities in the field of research.

data.source_sentence: 지속적 전문성 개발(developing medical expertise)이란 학술 활동을 통하여 지속적으로 전문성을 개발해야 한다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Developing medical expertise refers to the need to continuously develop expertise through academic activities.
data.target_sentence: Medical professional development refers to the need to continuously develop professionalism through academic activities.

data.source_sentence: 국민의 건강을 보호하고 증진하기 위한 정책 수립이나 입법 과정에 참여하여 의료의 전문성을 발휘한다.
data.mt_sentence: Participate in policy-making or legislative processes to protect and promote the health of the people to demonstrate medical expertise.
data.target_sentence: Physicians must demonstrate medical expertise by participating in policy-making or legislative processes aimed at protecting and promoting public health.

data.source_sentence: 보건 의료 자원의 공정한 활용을 통하여 건강 불평등 해소에 기여한다.
data.mt_sentence: Contribute to resolving health inequality through fair use of health and medical resources.
data.target_sentence: Physicians contribute to reducing health inequality by using health and medical resources fairly.

data.source_sentence: 사회 변동과 과학 기술 발전으로 인한 미래 보건 의료 변화에 대응할 수 있도록 준비한다.
data.mt_sentence: Prepare to respond to future health and medical changes caused by social change and scientific and technological development.
data.target_sentence: Physicians must be prepared to respond to future health and medical changes driven by social change and advances in science and technology.

data.source_sentence: 진료 과정 속의 윤리적 측면을 인식하고, 윤리적 문제가 발생하였을 경우 적절한 대응을 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Recognize ethical aspects in the treatment process and take appropriate actions when ethical problems arise.
data.target_sentence: Physicians must be aware of the ethical aspects of the treatment process and take appropriate action when ethical concerns arise.

data.source_sentence: 의사 윤리 강령 및 의사 윤리 지침을 숙지하고 이를 바탕으로 진료한다.
data.mt_sentence: Be familiar with the Code of Physician Ethics and the Physician Ethics Guidelines and treat them based on them.
data.target_sentence: Physicians should be familiar with the Code of Physician Ethics and Physician Ethics Guidelines for treatment based on the Code of Ethics.

data.source_sentence: 전자 정보화 된 환자의 정보는 개인 정보 보호 원칙 및 공익 목적에 맞게 다룬다.
data.mt_sentence: Electronically-informed patient information is handled in accordance with the principle of privacy and public interest purposes.
data.target_sentence: Patient information provided electronically is processed in accordance with the principles of privacy and public interest.

data.source_sentence: 환자 비밀 보호의 원칙을 알고 이를 준수한다.
data.mt_sentence: Know and observe the principles of patient confidentiality.
data.target_sentence: Physicians must know and adhere to the principle of patient confidentiality.

data.source_sentence: 책임 있는 보건 의료 활동을 위한 의사들의 자율 규제 원칙을 이해하고 관련 기구 활동에 참여한다.
data.mt_sentence: Understand the principles of self-regulation of physicians for responsible health care practices and participate in the activities of related organizations.
data.target_sentence: Physicians must understand the principle of self-regulation of doctors for responsible medical practice and participate in the activities of related organizations.

data.source_sentence: 자신의 의료 행위에 대하여 사회의 객관적이고 합리적인 비판이 있으면 이를 성찰하고 조정한다.
data.mt_sentence: If there is objective and reasonable criticism from society about one's medical practice, reflect and adjust it.
data.target_sentence: If there is an objective and reasonable criticism from society for one's own medical practice, the doctor should reflect on it and make adjustments.

data.source_sentence: 자신과 동료 의료인들의 안전한 진료 환경을 조성하기 위하여 노력한다.
data.mt_sentence: Efforts are made to create a safe medical environment for oneself and fellow medical personnel.
data.target_sentence: Physicians should strive to create a safe healthcare environment for themselves and their colleagues.

data.source_sentence: 효과적 교육, 객관적 평가, 건설적 피드백 등을 통하여 동료 및 예비 의사의 학습을 돕는다.
data.mt_sentence: It helps colleagues and prospective doctors learn through effective education, objective evaluation, and constructive feedback.
data.target_sentence: Physicians should help their peers and prospective physicians learn through effective training, objective assessment, and constructive feedback.

data.source_sentence: 의료 현장 속에서 학문적 의문을 제기하고, 근거의 비판적 검토를 통하여 과학적 해결을 시도한다.
data.mt_sentence: It raises academic questions in the medical field and attempts scientific solutions through critical review of evidence.
data.target_sentence: Physicians must raise academic questions in the medical community and attempt scientific solutions through critical examination of evidence.

data.source_sentence: 학술 연구 활동을 할 때에 연구 윤리 원칙 및 지침을 준수한다.
data.mt_sentence: Observe research ethics principles and guidelines when conducting academic research activities.
data.target_sentence: Physicians must comply with the principles and guidelines of research ethics in conducting academic research activities.

data.source_sentence: 특정 연령 또는 성별을 고려하면 매우 흔한 질환이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is a very common disease considering a particular age or gender.
data.target_sentence: It is a very common disease given a certain age or gender.

data.source_sentence: 수면무호흡증이 환자 개인과 사회적으로 중요한 이유는 수면무호흡증이 수면무호흡증으로 끝나지 않고 다양한 질환과 연관성을 가지고 교통사고 등 다양한 사회 문제와도 연관이 있다는 점이다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason why sleep apnea is so important to individuals and society is that sleep apnea does not end with sleep apnea, but is also related to various diseases and various social problems such as traffic accidents.
data.target_sentence: The reason sleep apnea is important for individuals and society is that sleep apnea does not end in itself, but is also related to various social problems such as various diseases and traffic accidents.

data.source_sentence: 수면무호흡증의 치료는 개인의 관점뿐 아니라 사회 경제적으로도 중요한 문제로 인식되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The treatment of sleep apnea is recognized as an important socioeconomic problem as well as an individual's point of view.
data.target_sentence: The treatment of sleep apnea is recognized as an important socioeconomic problem as well as the individual.

data.source_sentence: 성인에게 고려되는 주된 치료 방법들은 각각 많은 장점에도 불구하고 단점 또한 명확하여 장기적인 치료 효과 및 지속적인 치료 순응도를 담보하기가 쉽지 않다는 문제가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Although each of the main treatment methods considered for adults has many advantages, the disadvantages are also clear, so there is a problem in that it is not easy to guarantee long-term treatment effect and continuous treatment compliance.
data.target_sentence: Each of the major treatments for adults has many advantages, but also has obvious disadvantages, making it difficult to ensure long-term effectiveness and lasting compliance.

data.source_sentence: 반면에 소아 수면무호흡증에서는 편도 및 아데노이드 절제술이 주된 치료이다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, in pediatric sleep apnea, tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy are the main treatments.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, for sleep apnea in children, tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy are the main treatments.

data.source_sentence: 상기도 근기능 운동은 등척성(isometric) 운동과 등장성(isotonic) 운동을 모두 포함하여 구성하며, 근기능 운동의 대상은 상기도를 구성하는 구강(입술과 혀)과 구인두(연구개와 측인두벽) 근육의 운동, 삼킴과 저작, 호흡, 발성 기능 등이 모두 포함된다.
data.mt_sentence: Upper airway muscle function exercise consists of both isometric and isotonic exercise, and the target of muscle function exercise is the muscles of the oral cavity (lip and tongue) and oropharynx (soft palate and temporalis wall) that make up the upper airway. Movement, swallowing and mastication, respiration, and vocal functions are all included.
data.target_sentence: Upper airway muscle function exercise includes both isometric exercise and isotonic exercise. The subjects of muscle function exercise include movements of the oral cavity (lips and tongue) and oropharynx (soft palate and lateral pharyngeal wall) muscles that make up the upper respiratory tract, swallowing and mastication, breathing, and vocalization functions.

data.source_sentence: 상기도 근기능 강화 운동의 유래는 1900년대 초 안면 근육과 부정 교합과의 연관성에 대해 관심에서 유래되었으나, 1918년 Rogers에 의해 하악의 성장을 촉진하고 비강 호흡을 개선시키려는 시도로 근기능 운동이 처음으로 기술되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The origin of upper airway strengthening exercise was derived from interest in the relationship between facial muscles and malocclusion in the early 1900s, but in 1918, Rogers attempted to promote mandibular growth and improve nasal respiration. became
data.target_sentence: Although the origins of upper airway strengthening exercises stemmed from interest in the relationship between facial muscles and malocclusion in the early 1900s, the first muscle functional exercises were described by Rogers in 1918 in an attempt to promote mandibular growth and improve nasal respiration.

data.source_sentence: 수면 수술 또는 구강 내 상기도 확장기 등은 상기도의 단면적을 늘려주어 Pcrit를 낮춰줄 수 있으나 그 외 기전을 개선시키는 효과에 대해서는 불확실하다.
data.mt_sentence: Sleep surgery or intraoral upper airway dilators can reduce Pcrit by increasing the cross-sectional area of the upper airway, but the effect of improving other mechanisms is uncertain.
data.target_sentence: Sleep surgery or oral upper airway dilators can decrease Pcrit by increasing the cross-sectional area of the upper airway, but the effect of improving the mechanism is uncertain.

data.source_sentence: 즉, 수술이나 구강 내 상기도 확장기와는 다른 기전으로 수면무호흡증을 개선시킬 수 있으므로 서로 보완적인 효과를 기대할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: That is, since sleep apnea can be improved by a mechanism different from surgery or oral upper airway diastole, complementary effects can be expected.
data.target_sentence: In other words, since sleep apnea can be improved by a mechanism different from intraoral surgery or upper airway diastole, a complementary effect can be expected.

data.source_sentence: 이후 목관 악기 연주와 성악 활동을 통해 수면무호흡증이 개선된다는 효과 또한 체계적 문헌 고찰 및 메타 분석으로 발표되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Since then, the effect of improving sleep apnea through playing woodwind instruments and vocal activities was also announced through a systematic literature review and meta-analysis.
data.target_sentence: Afterwards, through systematic literature review and meta-analysis, the effect of improving sleep apnea through playing woodwind instruments and vocal activities was also reported.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 연구 결과는 OSA 치료에 있어 상기도 근육의 강화 훈련이 일정 부분 긍정적인 영향을 미칠 수 있으며, 이는 OSA의 병태 생리를 고려할 때 타당할 것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of this study suggest that upper airway muscle strengthening training may have a positive effect on OSA treatment to some extent, which is reasonable considering the pathophysiology of OSA.
data.target_sentence: The results of this study suggest that upper airway strengthening exercise can have a positive effect on OSA treatment to some extent, which is reasonable considering the pathophysiology of OSA.

data.source_sentence: 이후 많은 연구에서 성인 OSA 치료로서의 효용성을 밝힌 논문들이 다수 발표되었고, 이에 2014년 AAA는 그동안의 연구 결과를 종합한 체계적 문헌 고찰 및 메타 분석 연구를 발표하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Since then, a number of papers have been published that reveal the efficacy of OSA treatment in adults in many studies, and in 2014, AAA published a systematic literature review and meta-analysis study that synthesized the results of previous studies.
data.target_sentence: Since then, many studies have published many papers elucidating the efficacy of OSA treatment in adults, and in 2014 AAA published a systematic literature review and meta-analysis study that gathered all the results of previous studies.

data.source_sentence: 해당 연구에서는 9개의 성인 대상의 연구가 포함되었으며, 결론적으로 상기도 근기능 운동은 50%의 AHI 감소 효과를 보였으며 최저 산소 포화도(4.19% 상승), 코골이, 주간 졸림 등(ESS 점수 6.81 감소)을 개선시켰다는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The study included nine adult studies, and in conclusion, it was confirmed that the upper airway muscle function exercise showed a 50% reduction in AHI, and improved the minimum oxygen saturation (4.19% increase), snoring, and daytime sleepiness (ESS score 6.81 decrease).
data.target_sentence: In this study, 9 adult studies were included, and in conclusion, upper airway muscle function exercise showed an AHI reduction effect of 50%. In addition, it was confirmed that the minimum oxygen saturation (4.19% increase), snoring, and daytime sleepiness (ESS score 6.81 decrease) were improved.

data.source_sentence: 소아 OSA의 주된 원인은 성인과 다르게 상기도 단면적에 비해 임파선 조직이 차지하는 비율이 상대적으로 높은 것이 주된 원인으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: Unlike adults, the main cause of childhood OSA is thought to be the relatively high proportion of lymphatic tissue compared to the upper airway cross-sectional area.
data.target_sentence: Unlike adults, the primary cause of OSA in children is thought to be a relatively high proportion of lymphoid tissue relative to the upper airway cross-sectional area.

data.source_sentence: 그 결과 상기도 근기능 운동을 시행한 군에서 설근의 근긴장도, 설근 인내력(endurance)이 상기도 근기능 운동 비시행군에 비해 유의하게 개선되었고, 수면무호흡증 증상, 구강 호흡 산소 포화도가 개선되었다는 결과를 발표하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, it was reported that in the group that performed upper airway muscle function exercise, the glossopharyngeal muscle tone and endurance were significantly improved compared to the group that did not perform upper airway muscle function exercise, and the symptoms of sleep apnea and oral respiration oxygen saturation were improved.
data.target_sentence: As a result, the muscle tone and endurance of the tongue muscles in the upper airway muscle function exercise group were significantly improved compared to the upper airway muscle function exercise group. In addition, the results were announced that sleep apnea symptoms and oral breathing oxygen saturation were improved.

data.source_sentence: 기본적으로 설근부, 연구개, 하악, 얼굴, 경부의 근기능 운동과 비강 호흡을 증진하는 운동으로, 다음과 같이 구성하는 것이 좋을 것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: Basically, it is an exercise that promotes muscle function exercise and nasal breathing of the tongue root, soft palate, mandible, face, and neck.
data.target_sentence: Basically, it is recommended to configure the following exercises for muscle function exercises of the root of the tongue, soft palate, mandible, face, and neck, and exercises that promote nasal breathing.

data.source_sentence: 이를 위해 정기적인 외래 방문을 통해 환자들의 순응도 확인 및 재훈련 과정, 제대로 된 운동 방식의 준수 여부 확인 등 피드백 과정이 필수적이다.
data.mt_sentence: For this purpose, regular outpatient visits are essential for a feedback process, such as confirming patient compliance and retraining, and confirming adherence to proper exercise methods.
data.target_sentence: To this end, regular outpatient visits are essential for the feedback process, such as checking patient compliance, re-education, and adherence to appropriate exercise methods.

data.source_sentence: 운동을 지속적으로 해야 하는 문제가 있어 지속적인 효과에 대한 우려가 있고, 일반적인 치료 순응도에 대한 연구 또한 향후 필요할 것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: There are concerns about the lasting effect because there is a problem of having to exercise continuously, and it is thought that a study on general treatment compliance is also needed in the future.
data.target_sentence: Because continuous exercise is required, there are concerns about whether the effect will last, and a study on general treatment compliance is likely to be necessary in the future.

data.source_sentence: 후각 저하와 무후각증과 같은 후각 장애는 전체 인구의 약 20% 가량이 겪는 장애라고 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Olfactory disorders such as decreased olfactory sense and anaesthesia are known to be experienced by about 20% of the total population.
data.target_sentence: It is known that about 20% of the total population experience olfactory disorders and olfactory disorders.

data.source_sentence: 후각 장애는 장애가 생기는 원인에 따라 크게 2가지로 나누어 진다.
data.mt_sentence: Olfactory disorders are largely divided into two types depending on the cause of the disorder.

data.source_sentence: 감각신경성 후각 저하는 후각 신경이나 중추 신경의 기능 이상으로 야기되며, 전도성 후각 장애는 물리적으로 냄새 입자가 이동하는 통로의 폐색으로 유발된다.
data.mt_sentence: Sensorineural olfactory dysfunction is caused by dysfunction of the olfactory nerve or central nerve, and conductive olfactory dysfunction is caused by blockage of the path through which odor particles move physically.

data.source_sentence: 전자의 경우 바이러스에 의한 상기도 감염, 두부 외상이 대표적이며 그 외, 알츠하이머나 파킨슨병과 같은 퇴행성 질환, 독성 물질의 노출과 내분비 질환, 선천성 질환 등이 원인이 될 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 지속적인 산업화로 인해 교통사고나 산업 재해가 증가하여 후각 장애의 유병률은 증가하는 추세였으며, 2019년 12월부터 시작된 코로나 바이러스 감염증-19(COVID-19)의 증상 중 하나로 후각 장애가 생기면서 그 유병률은 더욱 증가하고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 후각 장애에 대한 표준 치료는 합의점(consensus)에 기초한 가이드 라인이 없어 명확히 정립되어 있지 않지만, 임상적으로 약물 치료가 널리 시행되고 있으며 대표적인 약물로는 전신 및 국소 부신피질호르몬제제, 비타민 B, theophyllin, zinc 등이다.
