data.source_sentence: 한편 증상클러스터에 관한 연구로는 여러 가지 암을 대상으로 한 연구와 대장암, 간암 등 특정암을 대상으로 한 연구가 이루어졌으며 특정암에서도 치료방법이나 치료 후 경과 시기에 따라 증상클러스터를 규명하는 연구가 시행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Meanwhile, studies on symptom clusters were conducted on various cancers and specific cancers such as colon and liver cancer, and studies were conducted to identify symptom clusters according to treatment methods or elapsed time after treatment in specific cancers.
data.target_sentence: Meanwhile, research on symptom clusters was conducted on various cancers and specific cancers such as colon cancer and liver cancer, and studies were conducted to identify symptom clusters according to treatment methods for specific cancers or time elapsed after treatment.

data.source_sentence: 비호지킨 림프종 환자를 대상으로 한 증상클러스터 연구는 국내에서는 찾아보기 어려웠고 국외에서 2편만을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: Symptomatic cluster studies targeting patients with non-Hodgkin's lymphoma were difficult to find in Korea, and only two studies were available abroad.
data.target_sentence: Symptomatic cluster studies targeting non-Hodgkin's lymphoma patients were difficult to find in Korea, and there were only two overseas studies.

data.source_sentence: AAA1의 연구에서는 7개의 증상클러스터를 분류하였으나 항암화학요법 후 시간의 경과를 고려하지 못하였고, AAA2의 연구에서는 20명 미만의 환자를 대상으로 증상클러스터를 규명하여 연구 결과를 일반화하기에 다소 제한적이었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the study of AAA1, seven symptom clusters were classified, but the passage of time after chemotherapy was not considered, and in the study of AAA2, the symptom clusters were identified in less than 20 patients and the results of the study were somewhat limited.
data.target_sentence: In the AAA1 study, 7 symptom groups were classified, but the course after chemotherapy was not considered. In the AAA2 study, symptom groups were identified in fewer than 20 patients, so the study results were rather limited.

data.source_sentence: 각각의 증상클러스터별 중증도에 따라 분류된 하위 집단에서의 증상 점수를 확인한다.
data.mt_sentence: Symptom scores in sub-groups classified according to the severity of each symptom cluster are checked.
data.target_sentence: Determine the symptom scores for subgroups classified according to the severity of each symptom cluster.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 항암화학요법을 받는 비호지킨 림프종 환자를 대상으로 시간의 경과에 따라 증상클러스터를 규명하고 증상클러스터별 중증도를 확인하기 위한 서술적 조사 연구이다.
data.mt_sentence: This study is a descriptive investigation study to identify symptom clusters over time and confirm the severity of each symptom cluster in non-Hodgkin lymphoma patients undergoing chemotherapy.
data.target_sentence: This study is a descriptive investigational study to identify symptom clusters over time and to determine the severity of each symptom cluster in patients with non-Hodgkin's lymphoma receiving chemotherapy.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 서울 소재 S 상급종합병원에서 비호지킨 림프종으로 진단받고 적어도 1주기 이상 항암화학요법 치료를 받는 환자로서 만 19세 이상인 자, 의사소통이 가능하여 설문 조사에 응답이 가능한 자를 대상으로 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study targeted patients aged 19 or older who were diagnosed with non-Hodgkin's lymphoma at S Advanced General Hospital in Seoul and received chemotherapy for at least one cycle, and those who could respond to the survey because they could communicate.
data.target_sentence: This study was conducted with patients over the age of 19 who were diagnosed with non-Hodgkin's lymphoma and received at least one cycle of chemotherapy at S General Hospital in Seoul and who could communicate and respond to questionnaires.

data.source_sentence: 새로운 암이 생기거나 조혈모세포이식을 시행한 지 3개월 미만의 환자는 제외하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Patients with new cancer or less than 3 months after hematopoietic stem cell transplantation were excluded.
data.target_sentence: Patients with new cancer or less than 3 months after hematopoietic stem cell transplantation were excluded.

data.source_sentence: 조혈모세포이식의 경우 통상적인 항암화학요법보다 고강도의 전처치를 시행하고, 그 외에도 무균실 사용 등의 경험을 하므로 제외하고자 하였고, 이식 후 3개월이 지나면 대체로 부작용이 회복된다는 선행 연구 결과를 참고하여 제외 기준을 정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of hematopoietic stem cell transplantation, high-intensity pretreatment is performed compared to conventional chemotherapy and other experiences such as using a clean room were excluded. The standard was set.
data.target_sentence: Hematopoietic stem cell transplantation patients are excluded because they use high-intensity pretreatment compared to conventional chemotherapy and use a clean room. Exclusion criteria were established with reference to the results of previous studies that side effects generally recover after 3 months after transplantation.

data.source_sentence: 질병 관련 특성으로는 병기, 국제 예후 인자, 일상 생활 수행 능력, 항암화학요법 변경 횟수, 현재 항암화학요법, 림프종 세부 아형, 치료 장소를 확인하였으며, 일상 생활 수행 능력은 East-를 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As disease-related characteristics, stage, international prognostic factors, daily living performance, number of chemotherapy changes, current chemotherapy, lymphoma subtype, and treatment location were identified. East- was investigated for daily living performance.
data.target_sentence: For disease-related characteristics, clinical stage, international prognostic factors, daily living performance, number of chemotherapy changes, current chemotherapy, detailed subtype of lymphoma, treatment location, etc. were investigated.

data.source_sentence: 이때 증상 점수가 높을수록 증상의 중증도는 심한 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, the higher the symptom score, the more severe the symptom severity.
data.target_sentence: In this case, the higher the symptom score, the more severe the symptom.

data.source_sentence: 연구의 목적과 과정을 충분히 설명하고, 설문 도중 언제든지 그만둘 수 있음을 설명하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The purpose and process of the study were fully explained, and it was explained that it could be quit at any time during the survey.
data.target_sentence: The purpose and process of the study were fully explained, and it was explained that the survey could be stopped at any time.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라 자발적으로 참여하기로 한 대상자에게 연구 동의서 서명을 받았다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, the research consent form was signed by the subject who decided to voluntarily participate.
data.target_sentence: Subjects who voluntarily decided to participate signed the research consent form.

data.source_sentence: 설문의 소요 시간은 약 15분이 었고, 질병 관련 특성은 연구자가 동의서를 취득한 뒤 전자의무기록을 통해 확인하였다.

data.target_sentence: The time taken for the questionnaire was about 15 minutes, and after the researcher obtained informed consent, the disease-related characteristics were confirmed through the electronic medical record.

data.source_sentence: 수집한 자료의 분석은 FFF 통계 분석 프로그램을 이용하여 실시하였고, 모든 분석은 양측 검증, 유의 수준은 .05로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The analysis of the collected data was conducted using the FFF statistical analysis program, and all analyses were verified by both sides and the significance level was .05.
data.target_sentence: The analysis of the collected data was performed using the FFF statistical analysis program, and all analyzes were verified on both sides, and the significance level was .05.

data.source_sentence: 증상 발생률은 전체 응답자 중 증상 경험이 있다고 한 대상자의 비율을 백분율로 분석하였고, 증상별 빈도, 심각도, 괴로움과 증상 점수는 평균, 표준 편차로 분석하였으며, T1, T2 시점별 증상 점수는 paired t-test로 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The symptom incidence rate was analyzed as a percentage of all respondents who said they had symptom experience, the frequency, severity, distress, and symptom scores were analyzed by mean and standard deviation, and the symptom scores by T1 and T2 were compared as paired t-test.
data.target_sentence: Symptom incidence was analyzed as the proportion of all respondents who reported experiencing symptoms. Frequency, severity, pain, and symptom scores for each symptom were analyzed as mean and standard deviation, and symptom scores according to T1 and T2 were compared with paired t-test.

data.source_sentence: 증상클러스터별 증상 점수는 평균과 표준 편차로 분석하였고, 증상클러스터별 중증도에 따른 하위 집단은 계층적 군집 분석 및 K-means 군집 분석을 이용하여 분류하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Symptom scores by symptom cluster were analyzed by mean and standard deviation, and sub-groups according to severity by symptom cluster were classified using hierarchical cluster analysis and K-means cluster analysis.
data.target_sentence: The symptom scores for each symptom group were analyzed with the mean and standard deviation, and subgroups were classified according to the severity of each symptom group using hierarchical cluster analysis and K-means cluster analysis.

It was found that the symptom score on the 7th day of chemotherapy was significantly higher than the symptom score on the next day of chemotherapy for all symptoms except for concentration difficulties, coughing, itching, and hair loss.

data.target_sentence: After chemotherapy, factor analysis was performed to identify clusters of symptoms experienced by subjects over time.

data.source_sentence: 공통성의 추출값이 0.5 미만이면 요인 분석에서 제외한다는 선행연구를 참고하여 T1 시점에서는 총 23개 증상, T2 시점에서는 총 25개 증상이 요인 분석에 포함되었다.
data.mt_sentence: A total of 23 symptoms at time T1 and a total of 25 symptoms at time T2 were included in the factor analysis, referring to previous studies that excluded from factor analysis if the extracted value of commonality was less than 0.5.

data.target_sentence: In T1 and T2, factor 1 had the highest confidence coefficients of .88 and .91, respectively.

data.mt_sentence: Factor 1 at the time of T1 consists of anxiety, diarrhea, sadness, dizziness, irritation, and 'I am not like myself', and was named as a 'negative psychological-diarrhea cluster'.

data.target_sentence: As a result of K-means cluster analysis, they were classified into mild and severe groups.

data.source_sentence: 비호지킨 림프종 환자를 대상으로 MSAS 도구를 이용하여 증상을 측정한 연구는 거의 없어 다른 선행 연구와 결과를 비교하는 것은 어렵지만 본 연구의 결과를 선행 연구와 비교해 보면 다음과 같다.

data.mt_sentence: Among the symptom clusters identified at T1, the most explanatory factor 1 consisted of anxiety, diarrhea, sadness, dizziness, irritation, and 'I am not like myself', and was named as a 'negative psychological-diarrhea cluster'.
data.target_sentence: Among the symptom groups identified in T1, the most explanatory factor 1 consisted of anxiety, diarrhea, sadness, dizziness, irritability, and 'I am not like me', and was named 'Negative Psycho-Diarrhea Cluster'.

data.source_sentence: 요인 1에서는 심리 증상과 신체 증상인 설사가 하나의 증상클러스터를 형성하였는데, 이는 항암화학요법 초기에 심한 심리적 스트레스와 항암제로 인한 위장관 자극이 서로 관련되어 나타날 수 있다고 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: In Factor 1, psychological symptoms and diarrhea, which is a physical symptom, formed a symptom cluster, which is thought to be related to severe psychological stress in the early stages of chemotherapy and gastrointestinal irritation caused by anticancer drugs.
data.target_sentence: In Factor 1, psychological symptoms and physical symptoms, diarrhea, form a symptom cluster and appear to be related to severe psychological stress in the early stage of chemotherapy and gastrointestinal irritation caused by anticancer drugs.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 T1 시점의 증상 경험을 회상에 의해 조사하였으므로 이로 인한 recall bias 가능성이 있어 이 증상 간의 연관성에 관해서는 추가 연구가 필요할 것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, since the symptom experience at the time of T1 was investigated by recollection, there is a possibility of recall bias, so it is considered that further studies are needed on the relationship between these symptoms.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 암 환자를 대상으로 한 연구에서는 피로, 졸림, 근육통, 기력 저하 증상이 하나의 클러스터를 형성하였고, 혈액암 환자 대상의 연구에서도 졸림, 기운 없음, 숨 가쁨, 어지러움 증상이 클러스터를 형성하여 본 연구 결과와 일부 유사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In a study of various cancer patients, fatigue, sleepiness, muscle pain, and weakness formed a cluster, and in a study of blood cancer patients, symptoms of sleeplessness, shortness of breath, and dizziness were partially similar to the results of this study.
data.target_sentence: Fatigue, drowsiness, muscle pain, and energy loss formed clusters in studies of various cancer patients. In a study on blood cancer patients, symptoms such as insomnia, shortness of breath, and dizziness formed a cluster, partially showing results similar to the results of this study.

data.source_sentence: 비슷한 연구 결과로는 비호지킨 림프종 환자 연구에서 통증, 수면 장애, 변비, 체중 감소, 식은땀이 하나의 클러스터를 형성한다는 연구 결과를 들 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Similar studies have shown that pain, sleep disorders, constipation, weight loss, and cold sweat form a cluster in a study of patients with non-Hodgkin lymphoma.
data.target_sentence: In a similar study, a study of patients with non-Hodgkin's lymphoma showed pain, sleep disturbance, constipation, weight loss, and night sweats to form clusters.

data.source_sentence: T2 시점에서 확인된 요인 1은 슬픔, 짜증, 신경과민, 걱정, 집중력 저하, ‘내가 나같지 않습니다’로 구성되어 있으며, ‘부정적 심리 클러스터’로 명명하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Factor 1 identified at time T2 consisted of sadness, irritability, nervousness, worry, poor concentration, and 'I'm not like me', and was named 'Negative Psychological Cluster'.
data.target_sentence: Factor 1 identified in T2 consisted of sadness, irritability, nervousness, anxiety, poor concentration, and 'I am not like me', and was named 'Negative Psychological Cluster'.

data.source_sentence: T2 시점의 요인 1은 설사를 제외하면 T1 시점의 부정적 심리-설사 클러스터와 유사한데 이를 통해 항암화학요법으로 인한 부작용이 대체로 회복되는 시기에도 여전히 부정적인 심리를 경험하는 것을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: Factor 1 at the time of T2 is similar to the negative psychological-diarrhea cluster at the time of T1, except for diarrhea, and through this, it can be seen that negative psychology is still experienced even when side effects from chemotherapy are generally recovered.
data.target_sentence: Factor 1 in T2 is similar to the negative psycho-diarrhea cluster in T1, except for diarrhea. In general, it helps to understand that even if the side effects of chemotherapy recover, negative psychology is still experienced.

data.source_sentence: 요인 2는 설사, 입 통증, 통증, 삼키기 어려움, 체중 감소로 구성되어 있으며, ‘위장관-통증 클러스터’로 명명하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Factor 2 consists of diarrhea, mouth pain, pain, difficulty swallowing, and weight loss, and was named as a 'gastrointestinal-pain cluster'.
data.target_sentence: Factor 2 consisted of diarrhea, oral pain, pain, dysphagia, and weight loss, and was named the 'gastric pain cluster'.

data.source_sentence: 이는 연하 곤란, 인후통, 입 통증이 하나의 클러스터를 형성한 선행연구와 유사한 결과로, 항암제 투여 후 위장관 손상 등으로 인한 증상이 클러스터로 형성될 수 있음을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: This is similar to previous studies in which dyskinesia, sore throat, and mouth pain formed a cluster, and shows that symptoms due to gastrointestinal damage after administration of anticancer drugs can be formed into clusters.

data.source_sentence: 난소암 환자 대상의 연구의 연구에서는 오심, 구토, 말초신경염이 하나의 클러스터를 형성하였고, 비호지킨 림프종 환자 대상의 연구에서도 오심, 구토, 식욕 저하, 설사가 하나의 클러스터를 형성하여 본 연구 결과가 일부 지지되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In a study of ovarian cancer patients, nausea, vomiting, and peripheral neuritis formed one cluster, and in a study of non-Hodgkin lymphoma patients, nausea, vomiting, loss of appetite, and diarrhea formed one cluster, and the results of this study were partially supported.

data.source_sentence: 요인 5는 T1 시점에서도 동일하게 규명되었는데 비호지킨 림프종 환자들은 항암화학요법 후 회복기에도 지속해서 영양 섭취 문제를 경험하는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: Factor 5 was also identified at the time of T1, and it was confirmed that non-Hodgkin's lymphoma patients continued to experience nutritional problems even during the recovery period after chemotherapy.
data.target_sentence: Factor 5 was identically identified in T1, confirming that non-Hodgkin's lymphoma patients continued to experience nutritional problems during recovery from chemotherapy.

data.source_sentence: 호흡기계 증상과 성욕 저하가 클러스터를 형성한 기전에 대해서는 추가적인 연구가 필요하다고 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: Further research is needed on the mechanism by which respiratory symptoms and decreased sexual desire formed clusters.
data.target_sentence: Further studies are needed on the mechanisms by which respiratory symptoms and decreased libido form clusters.

data.source_sentence: AAA에 따르면 항암화학요법 초기 단계에서의 일부 핵심 증상이 1, 2차 주기 동안 안정적인 증상클러스터를 형성하는데, 시간이 지남에 따라 핵심 증상에 다른 증상이 더하여 발현되기도 하고, 소실되기도 한다고 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to AAA, some key symptoms in the early stages of chemotherapy form stable symptom clusters during the first and second cycles, and over time, other symptoms may be added to the core symptoms and disappear.
data.target_sentence: According to the AAA, in the early stages of chemotherapy, some key symptoms form stable symptom clusters during the first and second cycles. Over time, other symptoms may add to or disappear from the core symptoms.

data.source_sentence: 이렇듯 시간의 경과에 따라 반복하여 나타나는 증상클러스터를 여러 선행연구에서는 ‘sta-ble cluster’라고 표현하였으며 이러한 증상클러스터의 기전과 증상클러스터를 형성하는 핵심 증상에 관한 추가 연구가 필요하다고 보고한 바 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, symptom clusters that appear repeatedly over time have been described as 'sta-ble clusters' in several previous studies, and further studies on the mechanism of these symptom clusters and the key symptoms that form them have been reported to be needed.
data.target_sentence: In this way, symptom clusters that appear repeatedly over time have been referred to as ‘sta-ble clusters’ in several previous studies. It has been reported that additional studies on the mechanism of these symptom clusters and the core symptoms forming the symptom clusters are needed.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 대부분의 증상은 시점별로 다른 클러스터를 형성하였으나 부정적 심리, 영양 섭취 클러스터는 일부 증상은 차이가 있었지만, T1, T2 시점에서 모두 안정적으로 나타남을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, most of the symptoms formed different clusters for each time point, but in the negative psychological and nutritional intake clusters, some symptoms were different, but it was confirmed that they all appeared stably at the time points T1 and T2.
data.target_sentence: In this study, most of the symptoms formed different clusters by time point, but the psychological and nutritional intake clusters showed slightly different symptoms in both T1 and T2 and were found to be stable.

data.source_sentence: 부정적 심리 클러스터에 서는 걱정, 슬픔, 짜증, 자기 인식 변화가 시점과 관계없이 포함되어 있었고, 영양 섭취 클러스터에서는 T1, T2 모두 식욕 저하, 미각 변화로 같았다.
data.mt_sentence: In the negative psychological cluster, changes in anxiety, sadness, irritation, and self-awareness were included regardless of the time, and in the nutrition cluster, both T1 and T2 were the same as decreased appetite and taste changes.
data.target_sentence: In the negative psychological group, anxiety, sadness, irritability, and changes in self-perception were included regardless of time, and in the nutritional group, decreased appetite and taste changes were equally included in both T1 and T2.

data.source_sentence: 증상클러스터별 증상 점수를 살펴보면 T1 시점에서는 에너지 저하, 영양 섭취 클러스터의 증상 점수가 가장 높았고, T2 시점에서는 영양 섭취, 부정적 심리 클러스터의 증상 점수가 가장 높게 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Looking at the symptom scores by symptom cluster, the symptom scores of the energy reduction and nutrition cluster were the highest at the time of T1, and the symptom scores of the nutrition and negative psychological cluster were the highest at the time of T2.
data.target_sentence: Looking at the symptom scores by symptom group, the low energy group and the malnutrition group had the highest score in T1, and the nutritional intake group and the negative psychological group showed the highest symptom score in T2.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 전반적으로 T2 시점에서의 증상클러스터별 증상점수가 T1 시점에 비해 낮았으나, 회복기인 T2 시점에서도 중증군의 증상 점수는 여전히 높은 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Overall, in this study, the symptom score for each symptom cluster at T2 was lower than at T1, but the symptom score for the severe group was still high at T2, the recovery period.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the symptom score of each symptom group in T2 was generally lower than in T1, but the symptom score of the severe group during the recovery period was still higher in T2.

data.source_sentence: 특히 T2 시점에서 영양 섭취, 피부 변화, 부정적 심리 클러스터에서 중증군으로 분류된 집단의 증상 점수가 높았는데 이러한 결과로부터 회복기에도 특정 증상클러스터에서 중증의 증상을 경험하는 환자에 대해서는 집중적인 관리가 필요하다고 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, at the time T2, the symptom scores of the group classified as severe in the nutritional intake, skin changes, and negative psychological cluster were high. I think.
data.target_sentence: In particular, the symptom score of the group classified as severe in nutrition intake, skin change, and negative psychological group was higher in T2; Considering these results, it is necessary to intensively manage patients with severe symptoms in a specific symptom group.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같은 결과를 통해 영양 섭취 클러스터는 지속적으로 나타나고 중증도가 높은 클러스터로 항암화학요법을 받는 비호지킨 림프종 환자에서 치료 전 과정에 걸쳐 주의 깊게 관리해야 하는 주요한 증상클러스터임을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: These results confirmed that the nutrition cluster is a continuous and severe cluster and is a major symptom cluster that needs to be carefully managed throughout the treatment process in non-Hodgkin lymphoma patients undergoing chemotherapy.
data.target_sentence: Through these results, it was confirmed that the nutritional intake group is a persistent and severe cluster, and it is a major symptom group that must be carefully managed throughout the treatment process of non-Hodgkin's lymphoma patients receiving chemotherapy.

data.source_sentence: 비호지킨 림프종 환자 대상의 반복 연구를 통해 영양 섭취 클러스터의 기전과 핵심 증상이 무엇인지 규명하여 핵심 증상을 중심으로 간호 중재를 개발할 필요가 있겠다.
data.mt_sentence: Through repeated studies of non-Hodgkin's lymphoma patients, it is necessary to develop a nursing intervention focusing on the core symptoms by identifying the mechanism and key symptoms of the nutritional intake cluster.
data.target_sentence: It is necessary to develop a nursing intervention focusing on the major symptoms by identifying the mechanism and major symptoms of the nutritional community through repeated studies of non-Hodgkin's lymphoma patients.

data.source_sentence: 제한점으로 인해 증상클러스터와 대상자의 일반적 특성, 질병 관련 특성의 차이를 규명하지 못하여 분석에서 제외하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to limitations, it was not possible to identify the difference between the symptom cluster, the general characteristics of the subject, and the disease-related characteristics, so it was excluded from the analysis.

data.source_sentence: 추후 다양한 병기와 보편적인 약제로 치료를 받는 환자를 대상으로 대상자의 특성을 명확히 한 반복 연구가 이루어진다면 증상클러스터 발생 기전과 환자 특성에 대한 이해를 높일 수 있을 것으로 생각한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the future, if repeated studies are conducted on patients receiving treatment with various stages and universal drugs to clarify the characteristics of the subjects, we believe that understanding of the mechanism of symptom cluster occurrence and patient characteristics can be improved.
data.target_sentence: In order to clarify the characteristics of subjects in the future, if repeated studies are performed on patients receiving treatment with various stages and general drugs, it is hoped that the understanding of the mechanism of symptom clustering and patient characteristics will be improved.

data.source_sentence: 항암화학요법을 시행 중인 비호지킨 림프종 환자 110명을 대상으로 항암화학요법 7일째(T1), 다음 주기 항암화학요법 시행일(T2)에 증상을 측정하고 증상클러스터를 규명한 결과, T1 시점에서는 7개, T2 시점에서는 6개의 증상클러스터가 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of measuring symptoms on the 7th day of chemotherapy (T1) and the next cycle of chemotherapy (T2) in 110 non-Hodgkin lymphoma patients undergoing chemotherapy, 7 symptom clusters were identified at the time of T1 and 6 at the time of T2.
data.target_sentence: In 110 patients with non-Hodgkin's lymphoma undergoing chemotherapy, symptoms were measured on the 7th day (T1) of chemotherapy and the next day (T2) of chemotherapy, and symptom clusters were identified. As a result, 7 symptom clusters were identified at the T1 time point and 6 symptom clusters at the T2 time point.

data.source_sentence: T1, T2 시점에서 부정적 심리 클러스터와 영양 섭취 클러스터가 공통으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: At time points T1 and T2, the negative psychological cluster and the nutritional intake cluster were common.
data.target_sentence: Negative psychological clusters and nutritional intake clusters were common in T1 and T2.

data.source_sentence: T1, T2 모두에서 영양 섭취 클러스터 중증군의 증상 점수가 가장 높은 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In both T1 and T2, the symptom scores of the severe group of the nutrient intake cluster were found to be the highest.
data.target_sentence: In both T1 and T2, the severe group in the nutritional group had the highest symptom score.

data.source_sentence: 회복기에도 특정 증상클러스터에서 중증의 증상을 경험하는 환자에 대해서는 집중적인 중재가 필요하며, 특히 영양 섭취 관련 증상을 항암화학요법 전 과정에 걸쳐 주의 깊게 관리하는 것이 중요하겠다.
data.mt_sentence: Intensive intervention is needed for patients who experience severe symptoms in a specific symptom cluster even during recovery, and it is especially important to carefully manage nutrition-related symptoms throughout chemotherapy.
data.target_sentence: Even during recovery, intensive intervention is needed in patients who experience severe symptoms in specific symptom clusters, especially careful management of nutritional-related symptoms throughout chemotherapy.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구 결과를 바탕으로 다음과 같이 제언하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the results of this study, I would like to suggest the following.
data.target_sentence: Based on the results of this study, I would like to make the following suggestions.

data.source_sentence: 연구 대상자 수를 확대하고, 다양한 병기의 입원 및 외래 환자 모두를 대상자로 한 반복 연구가 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: It is necessary to expand the number of study subjects and repeat studies with both inpatient and outpatient patients of various stages.

data.source_sentence: 항인지질항체증후군은 다양한 형태의 인지질(phospholipids)과 인지질-결합 단백질(phospholipid-binding proteins)과 반응하여 자가 면역 항체가 생산되는 후천성 혈전 장애(acquiredthrombophilic disorder)이지만, 혈관 병변은 대개 혈전증(thrombosis)이나 미세혈관병증(microangiopathy)과 관련되어 염증(inflammation)과는 큰 관련은 없는 것으로 알려져 있다.

data.source_sentence: 이와 관련된 자가 면역 항체가 증가함으로 인해 혈관내피 세포, 혈소판, 단핵구 등 혈액 응고 체계 및 보체 체계에서도 영향을 받아 미세 혈전과 관련된 혈관초를 보이는 망막 혈관염이 발생한 것으로 생각된다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to the increase in autoimmune antibodies related to this, the blood coagulation system, such as vascular endothelial cells, platelets, and monocytes, and the complement system are also affected, and retinal vasculitis showing vascular sheaths related to microthrombosis is thought to have occurred.

data.source_sentence: 항인지질항체증후군에서의 일차적인 치료는 항응고제를 통한 혈전증의 재발을 예방하는 데 있으며, 항인지질항체 또한 하이드록시 확인 시 평생 항응고제 복용이 권장된다.

data.source_sentence: 이를 고려하여 임플란트 지지형 보철물을 선택하는 것이 유리하본 증례에서는 하악골 편측 절제 후 재건 부위의 제한된 골 폭과 높이로 인해 의치 수복에는 한계가 있었으므로, 임플란트를 이용한 고정성 보철 수복으로 치료를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering this, it is advantageous to select an implant-supported prosthesis, but in this case, there was a limit to denture repair due to the limited width and height of the reconstruction area after mandible lateral resection, so treatment was performed with a fixed prosthetic repair using implants.

Therefore, treatment was performed with a fixed prosthetic restoration using an implant.

data.source_sentence: 본 증례에서는 임플란트와 골 표면의 결합을 파기하지 않으면서 하부 구조물의 부피 때문에 환자가 불편감을 느끼지 않도록 임플란트 지지형 고정성 보철을 계획하였다.

data.source_sentence: 하악의 운동 시 하악 절치는 구치와 하악 과두보다 더 멀리서 빠르게 움직이므로, 하악 절치에 부착된 자석의 실시간 움직임을 기록하는 JT-3D system은 하악 운동의 분석에 충분한 의미를 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the mandibular incisors move farther and faster than the molars and the mandibular condyle during mandibular movement, the JT-3D system, which records the real-time movement of the magnet attached to the mandibular incisors, has sufficient meaning for the analysis of mandibular movements.

data.target_sentence: The masticatory movement of the mandible, which is difficult to observe directly, can also be observed with the JT-3D system.

data.source_sentence: JT-3D system은 높은 해상도와 재현성을 보이므로, 하악의 운동 분석에 보다 객관적이고 정량화된 분석을 제공해준다.
data.mt_sentence: Because the JT-3D system shows high resolution and reproducibility, it provides a more objective and quantified analysis for the movement analysis of the mandible.

data.source_sentence: 최근 PEKK는 적절한 물리적 성질, 파절 강도, 충격 흡수, 응력 분산 등의 장점으로 인해 다양한 치과 분야에서 적용되고 있다.
